deserves zero stars  the air fryer sent to me has not only been used  but was not even washed  very disgusting  i will never purchase from cosori again  i m very surprised that it came directly from the brand manufacturer itself  not a third party  it was sold as  new   thankfully it can be easily returned but it was needed for the holiday weekend

i guess that it didn t  die   it just decided be lazy  my guess is a faulty temp sensor or some such malfunction  as it will run for   minutes or so  and then shut off until the whole thing cools off again  it literally behaves as it s unplugged   if i set it to a low temp  like     or so  it will work for longer  but what good is that  unfortunately  it s just out of the return window by a couple of weeks or so  and i had just discarded the original packaging thinking that it was good to go after using it every weekend for a month  i figured that i was out of luck cosori customer service contacted me  see comments  and after sending an email as requested  they shipped me a new one right away  i m typing this as delicious corn on the cob is frying in it  yum  they shipped out the new unit quickly via fedex and it got to me fast  i am very  very satisfied with cosori there s going to be a failure rate with everything  even if it s a very small percentage  and great customer service can make up for it  it did with me

when the air fry craze first hit i thought a multi task unit was for me   i used the cuisinart for a year before i decided to buy a dedicated air fryer   the cuisinart gave me a great learning experience but it was an awful chore to clean   also the heating element consisted of   ceramic rods at the top which didn t air fry the whole basket evenly   i settled on the cosori after a week of you tube videos and internet research   in the   days of owning the cosori i ve only been able to fry   items   ie   chicken wings and this morning   breakfast sausages   i can tell you that i do not miss the cuisinart at all   reasons for my liking the cosori are   very easy to clean   the exposed heating element seems to burn off any grease splatter before it hots the fan grid work   the square pan allows more food in a single layer than a round pan   the large heating element eliminates any hot cold spots in the fry basket   much smaller footprint than the cuisinart   there is a learning curve   the   items i fried were a little too well done for my liking   the cosori cooks much faster than the cuisinart so i will adjust my recipes accordingly   i am glad that i had a year s air fry experience   i know how to correct recipe instructions for my liking   the experience is sufficient to allow me to review the cosori without prejudice   between the cosori and my instant pot i can use my range s oven for storage

i don t usually do reviews so i ll keep it short first off  this air fryer for the most part was great   a few coworkers talked me into it so i decided to give it a shot what i liked i don t think there s anything prepared i did not like  some of the best fresh fish i ve ever had  this by far is the one thing that i can say may be worth the purchase alone     phenomenal  potatoes  chicken  the crunch in asparagus and broccoli that i ve never had before but could definitely get used to  just a spritz of olive oil and seasoning  just set and forget  cook time is short and clean up is easy  basket capacity is good enough to cook multiple items at a time what i didn t like    some may not consider this an issue but i can t get over the smell  it s overwhelming and can last for days   it s not a plastic smell that some complain about  that goes away in time  it s a deep fryer smell that permeates through the house and lingers for days  an issue that others i ve talked to don t seem to have with their air fryers  maybe better air filtration would benefit     i found   of the screws in the bottom of the basket after a few uses  this actually didn t bother me as much as      just a small phillips head and problem solved    this contradicts one of the reasons i liked this model but     it s big  make sure you have counter space to accommodate  likely fine for most  just takes up too much space for me personally so in summary  i liked it   recommend it and most probably would agree   but i have to return this one

i ve used it twice   so still getting used to it  last night i made chicken thighs and they took much longer to reach the proper temp than the recipe had called for and i had brought them close to room temp  not quite sure how to get the crispness on veggies like broccoli and brussels sprouts  have to adjust to learning curve  appreciate your interest

just ordered this last week   i have used it at least    times already   as much as i love how it cooks food and everything comes out crispy   the burning plastic smell has not dissipated   it makes my whole house smell terrible and makes me nauseous  i really wanted to love this air fryer fromhow good the reviews were  but the smell is terrible

problems fixed     please see end of review for update i want to love my cosori air fryer   i saw it used on a youtube cooking channel  and so i figured  this must be a pretty mainstream product   i got it seven months ago and it has become a mainstay in the kitchen  and all but replaced the toaster oven  the frying pan  and even the grill the one problem i have is that the buttons  or whatever you call those little circles on the front panel  are very difficult to press  especially with damp fingers   it just doesn t work  what s more  when i press them  they don t activate the function immediately  they seem to work only after my finger is lifted   a kind of delayed reaction  in other words  i can t understand why they couldn t have used an old fashioned set of push buttons  or even a mechanical dial switch   these technologies have been around for at least     years and are pretty well understood i have tried and tried to figure out how to use the buttons but they are just persnickety and only work part of the time   extremely frustrating and that s why i knocked the rating down from   stars to     i m planning to finally contact them and ask whether i have a defective unit  and if they can somehow fix the problem  i ll be happy to alter this rating apart from that  mrs  lincoln  how was the play as a cooking appliance  if you can get past the awful user interface  it s a great cooker   it can cook     chicken drumsticks in    minutes and they come out absolutely delicious  juicy and tender  not raw in the middle  not burned on the outside it makes toast reasonably well  though we don t make a lot of toast in this house    it is great for reheating things   it is wonderful for vegetables  one of our favorites is broccoli florets sprinkled with hoisin sauce and garlic    just don t over cook or you get these nasty black bitter bits that are quite unappetizing there are hundreds of videos out there demonstrating how to make just about anything in these gizmos   i was an air fryer skeptic until i watched a few  then decided to take the plunge and get one  and now i m sold    albeit  i wish i d gotten one that was easier to use they do make an app that allows you to control the air fryer from your phone   it s what i would call a work in progress  the name of the app is  vesync    you run the app and it detects the cosori as one of the appliances it can control   that s fine for them  i suppose  but from the user s perspective  it would be so much better to have an app called  cosori    i have so many apps and it s impossible to remember that vesync means cosori   come on  who decided this was a great idea anyway  more on the app   it sort of works well   i say  sort of   because it promises more than it delivers   there s a  cooking history  section  but no search function    you can tap on a history item and it will start the cosori for you  remotely  you can also alter the temp and cooking time   right now i can see last night s chicken  but it doesn t list this morning s pop tart from    minutes ago  why    maybe it takes a while to retrieve the data    i have no idea   just another annoyance   the app does send you notifications when the cooker is done  if you choose to use that feature i do like that you can add your own recipes to the app   the thing is  it s not rocket science to use this fryer  just set time and temperature and go   the saved recipe thing is mainly to help you not overcook or undercook  and that s a matter of trial and error as far as cleaning and maintenance  it s pretty simple   you pull out the basket and wash in warm soapy water   if you re doing dry stuff like toast or reheating a bowl of soup  there s little or no cleaning   if you re doing meat or wet veggies  you may need to do some cleaning   i use a soft scratch sponge  but a brush also works well  it helps to soak the whole basket in warm soapy water for    minutes  and my wife has run the inner basket through the dishwasher a couple of times  that makes me nervous that it could damage the teflon coating  but so far it seems okay the inner outer basket design has plusses and minuses  you can lift the inner basket out  but if you re doing it one handed  as one tends to do in kitchens  you need a surface under the outer basket or it will fall to the floor   not ideal  it would be nice if the outer basket could be retained in the machine somehow  maybe with a hook  so you don t have to position the air fryer     in from the edge of the counter liquid seems to accumulate sometimes in the space under the outer basket  maybe just condensation   it s probably not a bad idea to wipe that up from time to time  just to prevent rusting or messing up the heat cycle in my opinion  this appliance is still a work in progress  they have some issues to solve regarding the buttons and basket design   air fryers in general are still a new thing  but they ve become very popular for good reason  they work very well for what they do   with a few tweaks  this can be an excellent product worthy of   stars update june        after i wrote to cosori  they generously shipped me a new unit   i m happy to report that the buttons work much better   as a test  i wet my finger and it still works   i will say  the buttons still have a kind of delayed reaction    they don t really engage until you lift your finger  which is odd  but i have gotten used to it   most importantly  the buttons all respond immediately now  and i don t need to repeatedly press the time temp button to activate it   thanks to cosori for properly handling this issue and i ve boosted my rating accordingly

i bought this air fryer after seeing the tons of review in amazon  i was very doubtful that it might be one of those marketing tricks tried chicken and spicy fried peanuts unbelievable results  both cooked to perfection  lb chicken took only  mins to cook with  tsp of oil at    deg  lb raw peanuts     tsp of oil  fried to crisp in    mins    deg  opened and stirred every  mins though i couldn t wait to try all the recipes listed in the cook book that came with the unit i wish manufacturer provided more fixtures like other brands super happy with this product these are the other factors i was worried about before buying   noise  i would say half of microwave  much quieter than my hood at   setting    plastic smell  as soon as i received the unit  washed it with soap water  ran empty cycle for    mins  smelled chemical for first   mins   after that there was no smell at all   smoke  there was no smoke at all while cooking chicken i was super impressed and surprised with the performance

i like it that it is easy to use  first  i used it for fries  it says to preheat for better and faster cooking results  the thing that i did not like was the fact that every time i preheat or just started cooking  it will always smoke up inside my house  my purpose in buying this was for easy cooking and cleaning indoor  i took it outside and tried cooking bacon and chicken eith the pre set setting on the menu display and it cooked well  the tray is easy to clean but the air fryer itself inside wasn t easy to clean

sooo i ve been using my cosori air fryer about two months now  one day i was using it to cook up a few turkey burgers for the kids and out of nowhere  and in the middle of cooking  the basket released itself from the fryer  slid out onto the countertop and since i have granite countertops  it kept sliding right off that surface and crashed to the floor  very random  i was thinking i d done something wrong  this device has to be perfect right  i mean it wasn t exactly cheap  i d done my homework and got one of the top rated  maybe i didn t lock it into place all the way  so from that point  i d made it my business to be sure to push it in all the way until i felt it lock  all was all good for about   weeks and then this afternoon  i was making lunch for me and hubby  i d put in two burgers and was preparing us a salad when   minutes into the cooking process  i heard the fan stop and i turned around quickly but i was too late  the basket popped out  slid onto the countertop and then crashed to the floor  but this time  hot splatter popped onto my foot and leg   ouch  i wasn t badly injured but i m baffled    literally baffled  this is obviously a flaw in the design that can be potentially dangerous  imagine if my kid was in there    realistically  i love this fryer  i love the design  i love ease of use and ease of cleaning and i love the way the food tastes when it comes out  but that right there  that s bad  one other issue   there are about   small screws inside that loosen on their own so i find myself tightening them at least twice a week  and lastly  don t ever and i mean ever hit the button that releases the basket from the tray unless you are holding it over a countertop or something  i made that mistake and the entire tray dropped out and fell on my foot  it wasn t hot but it hurt like hell   update  i contacted cosori directly after my blackened mahi ended up all over my kitchen floor  they need to be aware of this problem  at first i was quite offended that one of the reps told me   we will look into this issue immediately  meanwhile  take a moment to read your cosori air fryer manual   what       so you mean to tell me there is a portion of the manual that mentions this malfunction    because i already read the manual and it was never mentioned  anywho    they handled the situation for me and offered to replace my current air fryer and asked me to ship them the old one so that they could investigate this  so i m feeling that this may not be a common problem as i ve only found a few videos of people complaining about this same malfunction  which apparently becomes progressively worse   so as of today  a new fryer has been sent and is on the way  hoping i don t have these problems again

the food that comes from this air fryer is incredible  i am in love with air frying as a healthy option for quick and crispy food  but  do not buy the touch screen model    i have never wanted to throw something out the window so bad as this thing  it works absolutely perfectly     of the time  the rest it will not turn on or off  i have to unplug to turn it off almost every single time  i want to return it and buy one with a knob  so frustrating  edited to add  cosori customer service is top notch  they are replacing my air fryer with a dial version  the one i wanted  and are refunding me the difference between the two models  they told me to keep the old one to use as spare parts if needed  in my opinion this is above and beyond

i am blown away with the food results  i love it s ease of use  it looks great  holds a decent amount of food  very fast      of it i love however  i bought this as a christmas gift  it s early february at the time of writing this  while handwashing the basket a week ago  i started scrubbing  with a cloth rag  what i thought was baked on food  upon closer inspection  i realized that the nonstick coating was gelling up and easily peeling off with the lightest pressure  i m pretty pissed  i m actually nervous about frying food in it now due to the known risks of ptfe  perhaps the stainless version would ve been a better choice

i had a connectivity  wifi  issue after i moved to my new apartment as i could not connect the air fryer to the same wifi  i contacted their support to try helping me figure it out tia  from the support team  kept in touch for around three weeks trying to help me with this  putting a lot of effort and dedication to solve my problem  they tried everything until they decided to send me a brand new air fryer to make sure it was a hardware problem when the new air fryer arrived  tia notified me that their team kept investigating and they wanted me to try a different thing  which then worked  so  the problem was with my new internet service provider connection  not with the air fryer itself i cannot express how impressed i was with tia s and the support team s dedication to solve a customer problem  they also sent me a prize for being patient as a customer for that long they ve got all my patience because i could see how passionate they were to have their customer s problems solved  also  as i worked on a remote support team in the past  i know how difficult it is to troubleshoot and solve problems remotely  with no access to the customer s environment congratulations on the great product and great  amazing post sale support  you folks are amazing  thank you

i really wanted to love this airfryer  it has a large capacity  heats up well and fast  and easy to clean  it was slightly louder than the one my friend has  but that one has a smaller capacity than what i wanted for my larger family so i decided to overlook that problem  the reason i ended up returning the product is because the yucky plasticky smell just never went away  the first two times  our entire kitchen smelled like burned plastic  so disappointed

i hate hate hate hate the look of this frier  i bought the white one which i paid extra and thought would be a shinny sleak look  it looks like some cheapest matted  d printed parts put together except the digital window looks very nice   i have to be fair   it s too bulky i didn t want to return it  so i m using it and it s working ok so far  made some fast and nice fries  unlike other comments said  it could toast bread  get your fact right people    i bet it could be a dehydrator too if you set the temp low enough  man i m so angry giving review for this air frier i don t know why  i guess it takes me some time to make peace with the ugly look  i will come back and give one star if it breaks on me

sorry  i m not on the   star review bandwagon here   it cooks well  but it s literally a burner coil with a fan that circulates air   you re not going to find one hot fan that adds more flavor than another   i wish i had done more research and bought something else instead first off  it s loud   we have a smaller house with an open concept kitchen dining living area   when this is going it s totally disruptive to watching tv  kids doing homework  listening to music  etc   wifi   why did i pay extra for this   i never use it   i can t think of a practical reason for it   i get random notifications when i m at work that my wife is cooking stuff in the air fryer the buttons are hard to use   they don t always register that i touch them more often than not   the presets are useless   they give you a general idea of temp and cook time  but you cannot blindly trust them it s huge   despite it s huge size you ll find yourself limited in cooking space   for   adults i have to cook fries or tots in   batches construction seems cheap   the screws that hold the handle on are inside the basket   one of them fell into the cooking basket and ended up in my mouth  the other two were extremely loose if you re looking for one  look for something a little more basic   a simple time temp knob is all that s needed   look for something a little more quiet if you re cooking near your living area   save your money on fancy feature  you won t find yourself using them

this product has excellent reviews and i would love to believe that my order is not defective  i saved money and waited for long until they discounted this air fryer but was slightly disappointed  i m having the same issue as one of the reviews mentioned that it has a burning plastic smell while operating  it s still my first try and will keep trying it for a few times and see how it goes

as a working parent  i don t have an hour to spend in the kitchen preparing dinner  nor do i particularly enjoy cooking  yet i want to provide a good nutritious meal for my child  i bought an instant pot thinking it ll reduce my dinner prep times  but most of the recipes have a long list of ingredients that i don t have time for     so when i received this air fryer and the recipe book with super easy instructions and fewer than    ingredients needed  i was overjoyed  so far i have tried frozen chicken nuggets  frozen sweet potato fries  grilled cheese sandwich and teriyaki salmon  my daughter loves every dish made in it  i couldn t be happier

your browser does not support html  video                          i have used this air fryer a lot over the past half a year  at first  i wondered if air fryers were worth the hype  and i can attest to the fact that they are  i loved this thing for the first couple months  recommended it to friends who went and bought it too  now  as much as i want to be loyal and keep the brand  find myself worried about longevity i don t know if i would consider this air fryer to be expensive  because with as much as we use it  it is worth every penny and is about the price of a mid range microwave  but it was a purchase i didn t have a lot of excess money for and i was bummed it hasn t lasted six months  it doesn t appear cheaply made so i wonder if i have a lemon or something so let me jump into the issues i have after many  many uses  the worst is that the air fryer drawer pops open sometimes while cooking    almost shoots out a foot or more  clear out of the fryer itself  it had issues remaining shut previously  with steam coming out the bottom sides  i remedied that by firmly pushing it back in again and it typically  sealed  up  now it just pops completely out of the unit onto the counter up until that point  the only thing i disliked is the touch screen interface it uses for programming time  temperature etc  it is finicky and doesn t always register a finger press    sometimes pressing more than a few times to get it to register  sometimes it will not register prints at all so  i m unsure if i got the lemon of the bunch  and i really want to love this air fryer  i still use it    just with caution and while i am around

i don t typically write reviews but i love this thing  so first the disclaimer    this review is for the parents because well that s me what i love the wifi connection with the app  when i saw this feature my first thought was who would need this much gadgetry come on  but then there s the fact you can preheat it before u get home so it s ready or i can start it and walk away and get alerts that hey i have something cooking  you don t think it s a big thing but once you use it your like man i wish every appliance reminded me i was doing something the basket some reviews complained about the plastic piece and feeling flimsy or that the basket came apart too easy  that clear plastic piece covers a button  you have to slide that piece all the way up which can only be done when you have the basket out  then you have to push the button all the way down and that releases the basket which you still have to pull out  again that s my experience    i know things happen but that s how i worked for me  plus the thing is huge  i easily feed my family of   or   when friends are over the food there is a learning curve with already prepared food like chicken nuggets or french fries from a bag  yes i cook that stuff because i have kids and am comparable to their favorite restaurants now with this thing  i have learned to cut the cooking time in half and that s pretty accurate  the app has a ton of recipes too that are super easy for parents and not too gourmet  i do cook things that aren t in a bag and they come out amazing i read reviews for this item and about    other ones  this one looked good on paper but then some of the reviews gave me concerns so i waited a month to purchase it  i m sure there are flukes and things go wrong but for my experience it was as good as it is on paper  from a single mom point of view who has very little free time    this thing rocks

this is my first air fryer so i am totally amazed with the technology   instant  perfect results   i was contemplating a new toaster oven when i got this  but one week later i unplugged the toaster oven to be replaced with my cosori air fryer  it makes breakfast bagel sandwiches to rival panera     toast the bagel  fry the egg  and grill up sausage in the cosori     and cleanup is wiping out two baskets   hash browns  fries and onion rings brown to perfection     way crispier than deep fry   corned beef hash cooks up great   turkey burgers from frozen to grilled in    minutes  and the bread toasts up in the same pan   fried chicken is wonderful with panko bread crumbs   hot dogs are perfectly grilled and buns are toasted to perfection   i chose the cosori based on customer reviews on amazon but i checked out other brands in stores and none meet cosori quality   if you are new to air frying like me  an instant read thermometer is a must and something to lift dishes and pans out of the basket is good   i use a lifter that came with a insta pot accessory set   i found most of my cookware works fine    that is  if it fits in the basket   this air fryer has improved the way i toast  grill  bake and fry   it s a popular cooking trend  you can google any recioe you want online       how do you make a baked apple in an air fryer

i just finished making the most amazing batch of buffalo style wings in our new cosori air fryer   honestly  about the best i ve ever had   it is easy to use  easy to clean  and has earned a permanent spot on our kitchen counter   it re heats food like it was made fresh  think pizza etc    doesn t require an oven preheat  no oil now  the customer support part   we ordered this online and used it first for some fried chicken   it was delicious  but it behaved a little strangely   would suddenly cut out for a few seconds  and then come back on   i thought that s weird  but maybe that s what it s supposed to do   anyway  it got worse and eventually stopped working after the  th or  th use   by this time it was too late to return to amazon so i contacted customer support via their website chat within about    minutes we had a new one on the way  no charge  no return required  and   days later we received the properly functioning we have now   i wanted to wait until we got the new one to check out before i reviewed that s how customer service is supposed to work when things go wrong   you back up your product when something s not right   so kudos to cosori for a really great kitchen appliance  and triple kudos for their customer support i would not hesitate to buy another anything from cosori

definitely don t buy a smart air fryer if you don t need it  this is an unnecessary purchase but if you re willing to splurge    bucks for something that ll help you cook in the kitchen this is ideal i m not the best chef in the world  in fact  i think the worst part of cooking is how long it takes and having to sit in a hot kitchen for hours  this air fryer is so quick and easy and it notifies your phone so you don t have to sit in the kitchen or wait on it not to burn  you can go about your day and it will let you know when your food is ready  and you ll really have to play around with the settings  the presets are really good guideline but you ll have to take it upon yourself to really cook certain dishes properly now the main setback i have is actually cleaning it  i don t have a dishwasher so i have to hand wash it myself and if i cook with oil or anything that stains even when i use parchment paper and foil all of that gunk sticks to the slits in the side of the basket  i would let it soak in ajax and dish soap and come back scrub it out and it would still be dried grease stuck in between the cracks  this thing is almost impossible to clean entirely after the first use without a dishwasher another con would be cooking fries in this is not ideal  frankly like all air fryers all fries come out super dry and dehydrated  since many air fryers do this i m not faulting this brand specifically  however i couldn t help but mention it
this unit continuously overheats and turns off after barely a few minutes in  takes      minutes to restart

so  ive had two of these both had touch display issues  the  st the touch screen didnt respond unless you like wipe your hand across the display then random buttons would activate  however when u touch those buttons  lite  firm   hulk smashing  didnt respond  power button wouldnt respond at all  however it worked via app n with alexa   nd one responded to touch for most of the display  power worked but the manual temp n time touch buttons would work intermittently  sometimes lite pressure worked  one time holding your finger for like   sec activated it but not the follow up attempts  hulk smash finger press worked but none of those worked consistently   returned both went with ninja  this was top rated n bunch of good reviews n cheaper then the ninja  after some googling found this is a known and common issue  so much so that i called the manufacture n after describing what was happened just offered to replace it  no try this or that just okay we will send u a new one but it would take upto   business days  returned thru amazon quick and easy  the features it has if touch display works would b a awesome machine  however if your touch display does work then setup to the app  once downloaded  was easy  setup with alexa  once skill for fryer app enabled via alexa app  was easy n part of setup process  it responded to the app n alexa no issues  i loved the features plus having the wireless abilities thats why i opted for a  nd to see if just a bum machine which happens but   for   pretty much same issue moved on  gave   stars just due to fact it semi worked but not everyone has alexa or wants to use an app  mom hates using both   so id say buy it see if you get a working machine if not move on

i ve had this air fryer for about a week  and so far it hasn t disappointed  i like the square basket i think it fits food better  i was able to easily fit   chicken tenders with room for at least     more  cleaning the basket  and the base that the basket rests in  has been very easy  but i do use a soft bristle kitchen brush on a long handle to get into all the openings in the basket  the air fryer is big and does take up counter space  but it s not heavy to move around  i keep it on my rolling kitchen cart and move it to my counter to use it  i do rest it on a large  wooden cutting board when using just in case the bottom gets warm  the instructions are easy to understand  and using the control panel is fairly intuitive  i haven t used the pre settings  i prefer to set my own temperature and time  the vent in the back releases hot air when in use  i was able to put my hand about two inches from the vent without difficulty  still  i give about    of space on all sides just to be safe  i didn t find it too loud  i mean  it circulates hot air with a fan so there s going to be some noise  but it didn t annoy me so far i ve made french fries with russet potatoes  a chocolate cake  see photo  and chicken tenders  homemade  not frozen  see photo   all three items turned out delicious  the cake was divine especially the second day  i have no idea why   the chicken tenders were crunchy on the outside and not the least bit dry on the inside  the fries would have been over cooked had i left them in for the full amount of time the recipe called for  they were crisp on the outside  the cake recipe stated    minutes at     degrees  my attempt took    minutes at     degrees  i wasn t surprised by this  i thought    minutes seemed too short  my advice is  check your food often at first to get a feel for the fryer  this is really no different than getting used to a new oven or other cooking appliance  you need to play around with times and temperatures a bit  also  get a good air fryer cookbook or some highly rated recipes online pros  easy to use  intuitive easy clean up keeps kitchen cool in summer don t have to heat up your oven for a small amount of food   to   minutes to preheat or no preheating for some recipes large basket  and square shape seems to fit food very well basket has a safety feature so you won t accidentally release it from the base it sits in much healthier than deep fried foods  but you can still get that crispy crunchinesscons  it s large  you will lose counter space unless you can store it somewhere and take it out when needed  if you are cooking for a large group  you re going to be cooking in batches  the basket size works fine for our family of three with two light eaters  but even one more person at the table would have me cooking in batches  if your looking for something to give you the same  exact taste as genuine fried food  this isn t for you  it s not an actual fryer  the name is deceiving  it s really a countertop convection oven  the recipes use minimal oil    tbsp for the fries i made and several sprays of olive oil on the chicken tenders with an olive oil spritzer  i would recommend this model so far without hesitation  but it s only been one week and three recipes  if anything changes  i ll update my review  i hope this helps you make a decision

good capacityeasy to useafter first use the plastic front of the unit separated warped from the basket   interestingly after unit heats up the plastic moves back in placeflaking of whatever material is used to make up the non stick coatinginner basket warped after a few uses   does not interfere with cooking thoughhandle has fallen apart   have to click back in place on two sides before each usebasket has actually ejected on its own while cooking despite being latched   the unit does not operate unless it is latched so it is not operator error   one ejection actually threw the food onto the floorwill be replacing this air fryer with another brand   really like the results of air frying and don t want to do without

we bought the cosori airfryer seven months ago as a replacement for a cheap but sturdy one we used for   years  heavy users   and now we re getting a new one because it makes us nervous  despite that  i m still giving this fryer three stars  because it executes its core function really well despite its quirks the good great fantastic air frying capabilities   the crispy outside to juicy inside ratio is always perfect or near to it and cooks pretty evenly even when we re too lazy to flip items  makes beautiful fries great cooking area   the shape makes for a good surface to put lots of itemsvery easy to clean   cleans well in the dishwasher as well as by hand  easy to wipe up mess pleasing design   i like it s square  shiny red finisheasy to operatethe bad why we re replacing it   months in it blows out of fuses  this has happened several times  and the main reason we re getting rid of it   it s blown out fuses on its own and when other appliances are on the same circuit  our wiring is pretty sturdy  so it s disturbing it s falling apart  from the beginning the basket and the basket tray sorta rattled a bit  and what they ve been doing over time is undoing the screws  we tightened it but one went missing  maybe in the dishwasher   and there s two holding on for dear life  we re constantly having to tighten it  it seems to simply be a side effect of how its built the tray sometimes rattles itself out of place and stops cooking   the tray sometimes rattles itself out and will stop the cooking process  probably a bit of operator error  howeveri would have definitely given this machine   stars when i first got it  but it unfortunately hasn t held up very well

so  i ve had this for almost four months  overall i m very pleased with the air fryer  i use it almost daily  i ve made chicken  corn  eggplant  fries  of course   spaghetti squash  meat balls and more and everything comes out amazing  juicy on the inside  crispy on the outside  there are however a few design flaws that need to be addressed by the company  one is major  the screws in both baskets become loose after almost every use and i constantly have to tighten them  i discovered this when i found one of the screws in my food  the other issue  is that the material of the inner basket  with the holes   is different than the material of the drip basket  the drip basket is a non stick material that is very easy to clean  the basket with the holes  roasting basket thing  does not appear to be  the first few times of use  it was easy to clean and with each subsequent  use  it becomes more and more difficult  i use a variety of cooking sprays when using the fryer and eventually the basket ends up with a sticky  oily residue that is impossible to remove unless you use an abrasive scouring tool  which would obviously ruin the basket  so i haven t done that and try to ignore the fact that i m cooking in a pan that is less than clean  just fyi  i clean both baskets after each use  i hope you find this helpful

a reasonable air fryer  it is very easy to use and produces reasonable air fried food  it can be somewhat tough to clean  but i imagine this is a problem with just about any air fryer  the non stick coating is wearing off in a few places because of how the machine is designed and the basket is supported  but this isn t a deal breaker i wish i could disable the beeps  but i understand this isn t a ubiquitous feature yet  so it s ok the biggest problem is the durability  i used this machine moderately for   year    maybe once per week  i was always gentle with it  never abused it  really fair use  but after just over   year of use the handle cracked off  rendering the fryer useless       yr is a lot to pay for an air fryer  i urge you to find another option

i have had this long enough to use it almost ten times  always for frozen food  despite running it empty a few times and these actual instances of cooking with it  there remains a very unpleasant plastic smell that really makes it unusable  the smell gets into the food and stinks up the house to the point where i feel the need to open windows and air out the house  i really wanted to like this air fryer but unless i can bake this smell off somehow i will not be able to use it anymore

update   i initially rated this   starts   i am sorry that i need to update the review   the air fryer is not consistently recognizing when the basket is inserted   while doing a    minute cook  it turned off after   minutes thinking the basket was not present   i have had problems with this before but this time jiggling the basket would not resolve the problem   i had to resort to using  a kitchen knife to get the fryer to recognize that the basket was installed  see photo  i have also had issues with the touch panel not recognizing when a button is pushed but that wasn t a problem as i could use my iphone and the wifi connection to set the temp  time  etc original review i highly recommend the wifi version of the cosori     quart air fryer   we have had ours for the less than a month and use it almost daily while we try out new recipes the iphone app connects with the cosori smart wifi air fryer   you can select a recipe illustrated in the app or you can manually set the time and temperature and start cooking   the app updates you on the progress of the cooking    how many minutes are left  when to shake  when cooking is done if the air fryer did not have the wifi feature  i would have returned the air fryer because the buttons for manually changing cooking time and temperature on the fryer are difficult to use   the time and temperature buttons on  don t always register when you push them   this is not a problem if you have a smart phone and purchase the wifi enabled air fryer i have recommended this air fryer to several family members

your browser does not support html  video                          i was excited when i found out that you can operate this from an app  the app itself is great  the problem was that the buttons on the fryer was not responsive  the power button did not work no matter how hard i pressed  so i returned it and got another one  the buttons on the second one worked but not all the time and you really had to press them hard  but i was ok with that because i still had the app to operate it  the thing that alarmed me was after soaking the inner basket and the outer basket in the sink  it was rusted underneath the edges  look at the attached video  so i didn t even get a chance to cook with it  i m going to return it  that will be   that i have returned  i will have to try another brand

i decided to start with the fried chicken  my thought was  if it can t do well with this  i don t want it  wow  it exceeded my expectations   amazingly  it looked like it might be a little dry because the outside didn t have the usual fried sheen  not only was the skin crispy and tasty  inside was some of the juiciest fried chicken i ve had in recent years  the air fryer was a little intimidating  especially when removing it during the cooking process to flip it over  it was super easy to clean which also surprised me  i m really glad i bought it  since then  i ve tried the fries and they were wonderful as well

works great once you figure out how long you want to cook your food for the way you like it  i mean the first steak i cooked in there i murdered it but then the next time i figured out what temperature to pull it out the way i like it and then it was actually pretty good for cooking basically in a tiny electric oven with a fan  great for potatoes and my wife is asian and she loves fish and cooks all kinds different fishnet and it s really good some nice moist salmon  i find stuff to cooking it at this point just because it s fun to use and it s easy but the timing and walk away  i m seriously contemplating on getting another one if i just have the room for it  good chicken wings too  if you get my point now i really like it you can go on rambling just like i already have but in the end it s worth buying

i m super happy with the easy operation and performance from the corsori air fryer i think the    l capacity is ideal and would encourage anyone shopping for one to stay away from the smaller capacity air fryers   i think you get more bang for your buck with the larger capacity overall  i m quite happy with it and have been cooking with it     times per week   thus replacing my oven it s a lot faster to cook with also word of advice for simu frying with this air fryer purchase an oil spritzer   mister and liberally spray down your food before cooking in the air fryer   increase your cook time by an additional   minute using the cooker s presets i think you would be very happy using an air fryer   definitely worth one s attention

this is my second unit so these issues aren t with my air fryer only   i sent my first one back thinking i must have had a defective unit first   the screws in the basket will fall out frequently   they will fall into your food   you will need to check and tighten them frequently or you risk choking on the screws   i m not sure how they can even continue to sell this like with this problem   the screws on the outer portion  the basket holder  will come out too but not as frequently second the timer resets everytime you  shake    those who have air fryers know you are to pull out the tray and shake it around while cooking to maximize air flow and crispiness   air fryers will continue right where you left off when you put the basket back in that s one of air fryers biggest conveniences   the problem with this one is it resets back to a full minute each time you do that   for example  say you are cooking something for    minutes and you  shake    times   if you pull the basket out and there s       left when you put it back in it starts back at       seconds   after   times you might be adding around     minutes extra cooking time third the least of the problems but still a problem   the buttons are really weird on the front and you have to almost press through the panel to get them to work   it was worse on my first one other than the big problems the air fryer is awesome   i love the shape of the basket and the way the basket is designed to maximize air flow

my halogen convection air fryer finally died and after a little research i decided to purchase the cosori     wifi air fryer set up was a breeze and the af worked really well  clean up is fast and easy  i used the wifi connection via my phone and the vesync app to control the af  but when i tried to use the actual touch pad on the af to control the cooking the time temp button did not function properly  sometimes it would work and more often than not it didn t work at all  that meant i could not adjust the cooking time or cooking temperature manually  amazon did a quick exchange and sent me a new af promptly  cudos and thanks to amazon  no down time  when i received the new unit first thing i did was check the touch pad for function and it worked fine  fast forward to the  nd time i used the af and the time temp button was malfunctioning again  the problem is not as bad as before but there is still a problem  sometimes it works and sometimes it doesn t  there is a cosori air fryer group on fb and more than a few people have indicated that they have had the same problem with the touch pad on their wifi models  i did not see any posts indicating problems with the non wifi models  so  not sure what do now  on my  nd af and undecided whether to keep it and use the vesync app or exchange it for the non wifi model  my hope is that cosori will find and correct the issue with a firmware update  if you are thinking about getting a cosori af i would definitely recommend the non wifi model  also  i recommend the     size and you may want to shop for some accessories like wire racks to place inside the af basket for multi level cooking  all things considered i think it is still a good af  if you want help  inspiration or cooking ideas check out the cosori air fryer group on fb update  received  nd cosori smart air fryer and temp time button still does not function properly  have to use wifi app to control cooking

the machine looks good and looks easy to clean however  the the machine makes very strong burning plastic smell in the first several runs we experienced  the smell makes the entire family headache and did not go away after tried   times   the temp we run is not high   we run    f and    f but all times the smell is very strong and penetrates the food certain reviews said that the smell will  go away  after several use but it should not be there at the very beginning because this is something processing things we put in our mouth at where we live not recommend

i ve been wanting an air fryer for awhile  mostly to make crispy pork belly in half the time without heating my entire kitchen up from the oven  my brother got the cosori a few months before me  so i figured i d get the same so that we could try things out and make sure our temps were consistent since air fryers vary  i love this air fryer  the buttons are easy to use  i like the pre sets  i like the shake reminders  i like the overall size as well as the size of the basket  i ve made cornish hens  a whole chicken  spareribs  french fries  kabobs and yes    i ve made the crispy pork belly  customer service is great and they ve got a group on facebook with more recipes and lots of sharing from other cosori owners

we purchased the cosori air fryer  the one with the app  though we don t use the app very often so far  for christmas  mostly because we had amazon gift cards that we haven t used in several years  we have had no problems with the air fryer so far  the touchscreen is pretty easy to figure out  the user guide helps as well  of course  and responds from especially light touches  cleaning is surprisingly easy  we wait until it s cool  roughly    minutes  then put in the sink  fill with hot water and a squirt of dawn  wait until we ve finished eating  then wipe with a soft rag or sponge and rinse  done now  about recipes  you can find a stunning amount of recipes on the web  even recipes specific to the cosori  however  our experience is that we have to test recipes until we get results we like  this is where we think air fryers really shine  you can always adjust the temperature and or cook for a couple of minutes longer  so we check it every   minutes or so  for example  we tried english muffin pizzas and had to cook them twice as long as the recipe called for  same for parmesan red potatoes  chicken tenders took   minutes less than the recipe called for  so it s best to assume you will have to tinker with time temperature rather than count on the recipe being perfect first time every time we found fabulessly frugal  on youtube  to be a pretty reliable source for air fryer info  especially since the host has a cosori    oz and she is very good about giving clear instructions     and because we like her sense of humor  worth a quick search

update    july        i still have not received my refund as promised by cosori   at this point i would give zero stars if that were possible thank you to the customer support team at cosori for their help in diagnosing my touchpad issues   apparently i got a defective one  and they are issuing a refund so i can purchase another    i am beyond amazon s    day return window  this air fryer has a nice  large basket  so i rarely need to cook things in batches  i love the presets and wifi connection  which makes cooking easier   i can monitor the cooking process on my smartphone   however  i find that the  buttons  do not always respond to touch  especially when i want to increase or decrease the time temp   the touch pad just doesn t work   don t know if i am doing something wrong or if the devices is not working properly

i consider myself to be a tough cookie when it comes to reviewing products but also i m fair  i ve had a couple of different machines similar to this one and i wasn t happy with them  if you re thinking of buying one of these  i highly suggest it  you won t be disappointed  i absolutely love this machine   if i could give it      i definitely would  i m a happy customer

we had heard great things and read some good reviews and i decided to try an air fryer  after looking around it seemed that cosori has a decent reputation for support and that their non stick has a good rep for not de laminating  enter a good sale and i purchased one i think we have had it a little over a month and it has been used anywhere from once to four times  a day  we cook a range of stuff from garlic bread to fried chicken   vegetables  fish sticks  hot dogs  fish  beef  french fries etc  in it i gave up eating fried chicken a few years ago  my digestive tract isn t as friendly to greasy foods as it once was  i grew up in the south and fried chicken was a staple at my grandmothers house and my mom made it a lot also  when i left home i made it though not as often as i get irritated cleaning the spattered grease up  finally with the digestive change it left my menu but i really missed it  now it is back on the menu  i cook chicken a couple times a week now at least and it is great for better than my mom s or grandmothers breaded fried chicken i take oil of choice and rub a light layer onto a couple large chicken breasts  sprinkle with salt and pepper  or other seasoning of choice  and then sift a heavy layer of flour and pat it in   i can no longer eat wheat so use rice or oat flour and it is absolutely wonderful   place the chicken in the air fryer and just use the stock setting for chicken  it is crispy on the outside and moist and tender on the inside  if you cut the chicken up into smaller portions you probably want to reduce the cooking time from    min to maybe    to      you ll have to get a feel for it french fries took a few tries get right   fresh vs frozen are two different ways of cooking  fresh use the recommended setting depending on how thick   if thinner then reduce time a little maybe  frozen you need to reduce time by about a     fish sticks such as gortons frozen i use the chicken setting but reduce it to about    minutes   they are lightly crunchy on the outside and moist and tender inside  other brands with thinner fish sticks need reduced cooking time so that they dont dry out sausage dogs i use the chicken setting with about    minutes to get a bit of blackening and cracking of the skin going  for just cooked but not till the skin breaks probably    min maybe anyways it is up there with our rice cooker and electric pressure cooker for devices we use a lot

this air fryer has a very large basket  i easily fit in    chicken wings  single layer  they are  by far  the best wings i ve ever had  it does a great job with frozen french fries  too  with the frozen french fries  there is a fair amount of condensation that comes out the bottom of the air fryer  not a big deal  but still added wiping up  fortunately  the air fryer is super easy to clean  nothing sticks to it  spray and a little suds and you are done  the only complaint i have is that it still produces a  plastic  odor while being used  i am hoping that goes away over time  i am still getting used to using the air fryer and putting it into my weekly routine  i recommend this air fryer to all the skeptics out there

alright     first the positive     the food tastes amazing  when it works properly you ll love it  it has a large basket compared to other so you can cook a decent volume of food too  now for the reality check     the screen buttons work about     of the time    almost useless  it forces you to use the app    which works great until it doesn t work anymore    i bought this and i m ready to replace it   months later  look for something that is higher quality and easy to use    the malfunctioning screen and app are enough to make you pull your hair out

as my first air fryer  i was very excited when i started learning the  ins  and  outs  of this thing  i am a stay at home mom of three that babysits so it s important to have food fast when littles are hungry  this was definitely the answer  but   after a year of use i realized how extremely difficult it was becoming to clean  i would scrub and scrub after each use and it would still hold this terrible greasy feeling  everyone assured me it was normal and our food still tasted great  so i considered it only a minor set back then one day while cooking lunch  i had put fries in the basket  i set the fries setting and had already shook the basket   the setting gives you a warning to  shake  halfway through your desired time temperature  a few moments passed when i noticed the screen started malfunctioning  the back of the machine started smoking and i immediately unplugged the item from the wall as quickly as possible  after letting it cool down i opened the basket to inspect  fries were still slightly cold inside  but it looked like a french fry had fallen out of the basket and was stuck between the inside of the machine and the basket  i m assuming it was laying on just the right spot to fry the machine  and the fry  because it was black   had i not been nearby  we may have just had a house fire  i counted my blessings and the machine went in the garbage  i upgraded to a ninja foodi and am so thankful their basket system is not made the same  while i miss my handle   i use tongs to  flip  and i feel it s much safer

unfortunately this didn t work for us  the things were either overdone or underdone  it was however very easy to clean  we tried it   times  the food was not crispy even with the tip of adding   tablespoons of oil  so we ended up returning it

left overs like pizza and fries actually  taste better a day or two old once warmed up in the air fryer  chicken thighs are more crispy in    minutes vs an hour in the oven  less time and taste better  so moist  utilize you tube videos   so helpful baked potatoes so yummy  asparagus awesome in like   minutes  my husband loves crispy chicken wings in the air fryer   best he has ever tasted    easy clean up  so many wonderful videos on youtube   for how long to cook and at what temperature  would highly recommend the cosori air fryer     qt   we had our first one for a couple of weeks and noticed a vibration  we sent it back at no charge and ordered another one that is working perfectly  would make a terrific gift

i ve run this thing for hours now trying to get the awful plastic smell out  after using it in my kitchen for    minutes and getting that nasty smell all through my house i spent the day today running it outside on my porch and then cleaning it with hot soapy water  rinse and repeat  hours  food still taste of plastic  and now so does my porch  i can t see that i ll ever be able to use it so i consider it a waste of       and don t believe the manufacturer responses in here that says there s no way the plastic smell is getting into the food  it does  and has continued to do so all day  after hours and hours i admit that i m a bit sensitive to smells  but from the reviews on here i m not the only one  before you order  if you think you might be one of those people  don t ignore the warning reviews on here like i did  save yourself some money and don t bother

i purchased this unit after internet research on reviews of the best units  this one is rated by many sites as the best of the best  now that i ve had mine for a few weeks  and have used it daily  i am very pleased with my purchase  most of today s kitchen appliances have presets that are actually quite hard to figure out  but not on this unit  the preset choices are extremely easy to use  the temp time menu is so simple that even this old man can do it without getting confused  the basket is square  which gives it a bigger capacity for more food than a round one  it has a higher power rating than many others  so it cooks fast and thoroughly  to clean it  all i do is put the basket in the dishwasher  that s it  nothing else  i have a cabin where i spend half my days  so after i bought my first one for the house and used it for a week  i knew i needed one at the cabin too  so i bought a second  identical one  that way i can cook in it pretty much every single day  this is the best kitchen gadget i ve purchased in years

love this air fryer  we had the power xl air fryer in the   qt model and the   qt model  we used the power xl on a daily basis but began to have trouble with the switch located at the bottom where you put the basket in early on  you had to put the basket in and sort of jiggle it to get it to toggle the switch on to allow the air fryer to operate  eventually  that stopped working and the power xl would no longer turn on  so  it was time to replace it   the cosori air fryer max xl does not have this problem  there is no switch at the bottom  the basket slides in easily without having to maneuver it to catch the switch   i believe it does a better job air frying than the power xl   the preset cooking times and temperatures are great  it is easy to change time and temperatures and it has a pause feature   the basket handle is sturdy and locks into place easily   it is non stick and easy to clean   i like the design of the square basket  it can easily fit a   lb chicken  it is easy to use and does a better job than the power xl   wish i would have bought  this one to begin with   if you are looking for an air fryer this is the one

i had the airfryer xl for years and i told everyone i came in contact with that it was the best thing since microwaves and ovens  and that i would take it to my grave because i loved it so much  lol  having said that  i have ceramic tile floors and i dropped it    or more times  anyone who has that type of floor knows it is rare for anything to survive such a fall  but the xl hanged on   over time the xl became so banged up that i decided once i move i would re purchase it  however  after moving  amazon was having a sale and my pocketbook was tugging at me to make a change   i could always return it if i hated it and buy the xl again   i said to myself  well           i love the cosori more        it has a square basket which fits items much better than the oval one  it s quieter  it s still a spaceship in size but it is very nice looking with the matte textured black plastic  it s truly awesome and is my addiction for life  i use it to warm up food  toast bread  make pizzas  cookies  fries  onion rings  etc   you name it  you can do almost anything with this gorgeous machine and it is super fast  which saves you on electricity and cooking heat in your house   if you are questioning some brands  i strongly encourage you to just buy the cosori because you will be happier sooner than later  lastly  please be sure to take out all the cardboard after unpacking and before cooking anything  i washed the basket but i was so excited to try it i had blind eyes to the cardboard which was still  underneath  the basket area  very careless of me  all is well  and i use my cosori every day

first use was to cook french fries   instructions followed precisely   some fries were overdone while others were under done   second use was to cook grated potatoes for use as a bed for pulled pork   followed an air fryer recipe   noted that the potatoes were becoming very brown and crisp on the outside but not cooking on the center   tried to stir them and continued   checked again before time was up   they were over done  very brown and dry    placed on warm cycle while pork and corn were heated    minutes    potatoes continued to cook and were just shy of being charcoal   third try was broccoli   it also turned out overdone and somewhat charred   last attempt was an egg test   cooked egg in a silicon muffin cup   egg was overdone and uncooked  possibly according to the burner pattern   this is unacceptable   returned the unit

great air fryer   one thing i disliked was the super loud menu beeps   i scoured the internet and emailed the company to no avail   however i did take matters into my own hands and fixed the loud beep   this was very easy to do  however  be warned and do not do this if you feel at all uncomfortable with the steps there is no built in way to lower or disable the beeps from pressing menu buttons   here s what i did   you can pop the top off which is held on with plastic clips all around  oh btw do this at your own risk  i m only reporting what i did which most certainly was dangerous risky voided warranty etc  and for goodness sake people  unplug it and leave it be to cool down and stuff  anywho  pop the top and locate the round black speaker on the circuit board  you can take a pair of needle nose pliers and pull off the black cover to the speaker  you can identify the speaker by seeing the board notated as buzr next to it  the black cover piece to speaker has a hole in center of it  after pulling it off  gentle force  there is a circular flat disc  seen in pic  appears to be possibly magnetic  simply pick it off and replace the black speaker cover  boom no sound  here s the downside  there is no sound at all for anything anymore

i just had to write a review   i have a nuwave af  but didn t like it as much as my cosori   i love the basket vs the nuwave  so much easier to clean   the non stick coating appears to be better as well  my nuwave started to peal just after a few uses   over this past weekend  i used it all weekend   i made chicken drums that turned out perfect and made some honey glazed carrots from the awesome cosori cookbook that it came with   i also  made some muffins and two cornish hens   came out awesome as well   last night i made pizza s     delish   this af is so easy  you won t be disappointed if you bought one for yourself   a very satisfied customer   i have a cosori pressure cooker as well and love it too

love this product  if you are thinking of buying an air fryer this is probably the best on the market  here s why you are going to love it   easy to use  not rocket science   lots of video supports on youtube  easy clean up  lots of recipes to try  two year warranty if you register the product right away  the presets  shake reminder  large basket      more heat distribution which means a faster cooking time  you can pull out the bin to check foot without having to reset the temp time  impressive basket design that makes air flow productive  online af community presence  smart technology  which provides a real time cooking display and tons of recipes and the ability to creat your own    this    and great accessories to purchase  it is fun to use  it has easily become favorite go to gadget we cooked chicken  cookies  kabobs  and so much more  this was so easy the product exterior is not hot to the touch  only the back where the hot air comes out we have tried several air fryers and this was the best

i made salmon and green beans after receiving this yesterday and i was not comfortable with the smoke steam i cant tell which coming from the basket area  the food was not greasy frozen salmon and fresh green beans   i know the steam is supposed to come out the back and i have another air fryer that never has steam or smoke from the basket area and so i have experience with air fryers i just wanted the larger capacity   i will try cooking again but now i am worried how much is will smoke if i actually use oil to coat food ie potatoes etc   i immediately took out the basket and rechecked everything to make sure there was no overlooked packaging that perhaps was left inside

i wanted a new  larger air fryer as my og philips was getting old  albeit still running great     so i decided against my better judgment to try a cheaper brand based on the great reviews    but ended up regretting it immensely  initial impression was that it looked great out of the box  but when using it i noticed the build of the machine was of much lower quality than my old philips just some cons to note  tried it for   month   the basket was really hard to pull in and out of the air fryer as well as difficult to detach from the bottom basket like other reviews mentioned  the touchpad is wonky and unresponsive  i had to touch buttons multiple times repeatedly for it to respond and it was really annoying biggest con for me    the smell  immediately when opening the basket  i noticed a very strong  unpleasant chemical plastic smell  based on instructions  it said to run the air fryer empty on high for      min  however  the smell would not go away and seeped into my food  making it inedible  not to mention making my kitchen smell terrible   i tried washing multiple times  running with lemon vinegar water  running on empty for multiple times  etc  this chemical smells reinforces my feeling that the materials they use are cheap and low quality  final straw    i finally got the smell to be bearable  but when i tried heating up some food  the machine started only blowing cold air and wouldn t work   tldr  smelled gross   stopped working after a month with less than    uses so i returned it and am going to buy a new phillips xxl instead

plugged in  excited to cook  waited a few minutes  only displayed the wifi icon and power icon  push hold power icon does not change state of device  put some food in the basket  insert for operate  and waited a few minutes  provided the same result  instructions did not indicate wifi and app are required for operation  was interested in newest model  fail

i bought this air fryer to assist in making chicken nuggets and fries for the kids   what i learned is it does so much more   i have evolved in to using it daily and cooking almost anything i would normally fry or bake using my stove oven with much less cleanup and hassle   i have to admit  i am a sucker for new appliances   i jumped on sous vide  which i actually think is the most delicious way to cook cuts of meat especially when entertaining or cooking large cuts but it takes time and some preparation and some mess  mainly in that you still have to use the stove or grill to sear the meat    still love it but use less often than at first  it doesn t take much room so no bother    i then jumped on the insta pot   tried to use it a lot but now it has ended up mostly just being a smaller slow cooker than the one i have   the pressure cook feature  and other features  can be convenient but not worth having a bulky extra appliance for if you already have a slow cooker   now comes to the air fryer   i had big concerns because of it s size   larger than the previous two things i mentioned   i saved all the packing material with expectation that i would ship it back   much to my surprise  not only does it cook the fries nuggets  and chicken wings i might add  much better than the oven  it cooks hamburger  chicken  steak  seafood  vegetables  garlic bread       almost everything you could cook on the stove oven quickly and with a really good result  once you get a handle on the temp time requirements    on top of that  the cooking is all contained so it doesn t make a mess of your stove  oven  countertops  or pans and it  s cooking tray is very easy to clean   imagine no grease to clean up from the stove area after frying    i often make     different things sequentially which makes me at times wish i had two   that way i could cook the main and side dishes  ie  nuggets fries  at the same time  although you probably can do it with just one but i have done that yet due to capacity    my stove oven usage has dropped by at least          because of that  i leave this unit out all the time   it is bulky for a small kitchen  like mine  but fortunately i have a small table just off the kitchen in the breakfast area where this fits without being in the way   yes  in the breakfast area because this makes no mess outside of the cooker and it looks attractive enough not to be an eye sore   now lets talk size   i bought the    qt and am so glad i did   one of the only two wishes i had for this unit is that it held more  although i find this to be mostly adequate for a family of four and i don t think i would want it to take up any more space   it can cook       large chicken breasts or   hamburgers at one time and i am sure it would cook bacon very well but you may not get more than      slices in there   i don t think this brand is any better or worse in this regard compared to other brands of the same volume spec   i believe there are some models that have a rack so you can increase food capacity   i m not sure how well this works but from simple observation of how air fying works i think it would   also note  the smaller volume  ie   qt  versions are not that much smaller on the outside but noticeably smaller in cooking capacity now for the fryer review   having not had another  i am very pleased with this model and would recommend   as i have noted  i like the way it cooks and looks   food is very crispy on the outside and finished nicely on the inside and it cooks the entire contents very evenly   it seems to be well built and the cooking pan parts are very easy to clean   the controls are logical and the buttons are touch sensitive   my second minor wish is that the buttons would be more consistent in their sensitivity but i realize they were designed this way for easy cleaning   so probably a worthwhile trade off   in short i highly recommend this brand   i ve only been using it a month and so far no problems   if i have any problems in quality or durability moving forward i will update this review   most of all  i highly recommend having an air fryer   this is an appliance i can see myself using every day and for a long time

the air fryer works great  i use it everyday and i know there s plenty more that i can cook bake in it  i fully recommend the product  however buyers need to be aware of the following    it is not the easiest to clean  the slots on the sides to allow air flow will routinely build up grease and it is not easy to get off    and this is a warning  there are a few screws that attach the handle to the basket  these screws become loose and will fall out   this is a common issue for other people that have purchased this air fryer  this could potentially cause the handle to fall off while carrying extremely hot food  be sure to check and tighten them frequently

i got this air fryer  cosori air fryer max xl     quart  and used it to fry chicken drumsticks and root vegetables  i had to fry the drumsticks in   batches because of the quantity  there were    drumsticks  so i thought that this would be  a great way to quickly fry and save time without having to deep fry  as the unit cooked there was a smell of plastic but the top of the unit is plastic  i figured that the smell was coming from the top plastic   heat rises  however  the frying basket is metal and coated with a nonstick application  i did not think or believe that the smell was coming from the basket as well  well  all the food cooked in this air fryer tasted like plastic  i had to throw it all away  even my    year old grandson who will eat pretty much anything  wouldn t eat it after tasting it  so    batches of chicken drumsticks and   batch of root veggies was wasted  that s   uses of the cosori air fryer max xl  save your money and time and invest in a deep fryer or oven fry to save on fat consumption  i live in arizona  so running the oven is rough in      temperatures

have never been able to get the touchscreen front to respond  the app keeps making me reload and resume  it mainly just sits there and makes me wish i bought another brand the very few times it has worked the food has been excellent  which is a shame as i cannot use it as intended  to work vs a taken up counter top space spot

the touch controls on the fryer are a joke   they hardly recognize touch so it s very frustrating trying to change the cook time or temperature  usually takes pressing   or   times hunting for the  sweet spot  that works for the button it took me   hours to get the device connected to my wifi network because the application sucks the non stick is starting to rub off where the basket and bottom tray touch  there is no filter or anything on the back so the wall behind the air fryer has grease and small food bits all over it  luckily the wall has tile so i can scrub it off with harsh cleaning chemicals  if it were a painted wall it would never come off on a positive note  the fryer cooks nicely

had this for about a week and have been using it daily  so far it works well  i made simple food like fries  various vegetables  and some marinated chicken  not together  all were separate meals  my fries certainly cooked through but were a bit limp the first time around and i expect this was because i used too much oil when i coated them in spices  the second time i didn t use oil at all and even patted the potatoes dry before cooking  and they came out very crispy  next time i ll try for something in the middle  all of the fried veggies were tasty but nothing that i can t get from baking them on a sheet pan in the oven  they took less time in the air fryer so that is a benefit  the chicken would have benefited from less time in the fryer but that is my own trial and error since meat cuts can vary in size  still came out tasty and moist since they ve been marinating for a few hours cleanup is simple  just have to wait for the whole thing to cool down  then i ve been giving it a gentle wipe down but haven t made anything messy enough to warrant a full scrub yet overall i m happy with the purchase  it hasn t done anything unexpected yet  i saw some reviews about it leaking steam but have not had that happen  my coffee machine makes more visible steam than this thing does   its been a good addition to my kitchen so far

awesome  i have never used an air fryer and did not actually know anything about them  then my daughter described her experience and how much she liked it  she told me the brand and size she used  i started doing my own research and found this cosori had really good ratings and the size seemed about right  i honestly do not have enough words to describe this air fryer  i have been testing it and trying different things ever since it arrived  we are making homemade bagels  tater tots in here are awesome  the list goes on  i am extremely happy i chose this air fryer
