my first meal was two frozen veggie burger patties  and about two cups of frozen broccoli and frozen brussels sprouts i d rate the fryer  promising but not mind blowing   keep in mind the meal choice  at best  is a   out of    no matter how you cook it the fryer made the outside of the frozen veggies sorta charred and crisp  but moist in the center  frozen sprouts are always mushy in the middle so they sucked as usual   i didn t use any oil  but lightly coating them i think would improve the results veggie patties are essentially hockey pucks regardless of cooking method  fryer did nothing to improve them nor make them worse the fryer connects to alexa  but i can t think of a scenario where i d have to remotely tell it to cook or stop cooking with better ingredients  i think it could be pretty decent  though i think figuring out cooking times will be key  gonna go grocery shopping and maybe try some of the recipes it comes with recipes are accessible via the app  then after you prep the food  you control the fryer through the app to cook the recipe to the recommended settings  kinda cool lastly i got the    q size which i think is the largest from cosori in the  cooking bucket  format  personally think is fine for cooking for one person  maybe   depending on what you re making

i was originally going to purchase another brand since it was   qtz in size which was much more ideal for me  however it has been out of stock for a while so i decided to get this one instead and honestly     im not disappointed  this air fryer actually hold its own in terms of size  and functionality  for reference you can fit a whole small chicken or   large chicken legs with no issues  and the pre sets are on point with the cooking time  food cooks pretty fast  within    minutes you can get a few things done  such as roasted potatoes and some fried roasted chicken  totally time efficient cons  the only issue i have with this air fryer is that the heat tends to flow more on a specific side  so food that tends to settle on the  weak spot  usually end up unevenly cooked  not horribly uncooked however  ive had an easy time fixing that by just shaking the basket and setting up   extra minutes to cook  i do like that the air fryer will tell you on the screen at some point to  shake the basket   it will almost always tell you this  so that you can redistribute the food evenly  especially important if you re cooking things like french fries loose foods  another con would be the material for the basket     it seems to be teflon or some sort of cheap non stick material which are usually not that great for our health so id caution everyone to never scrub the basket and simply just use a soft sponge to avoid the material from scraping off over time all in all  the air fryer is doing an amazing job  i havemt used my stove in over a week because i ve been roasting all my food on this  however  if you re looking for something to bake a large cake  casserole etc  then this is not it  its simply too small for larger dishes or a big family  a   to   q air fryer or convection oven might be more ideal  the air fryer also looks nice on the kitchen and doesn t take too much space  the noise isn t too bad either  it won t replace your stove altogether  but it makes an amazing addition for smaller  side dishes  that would otherwise take forever to make on a normal oven or stovebelow for reference are some photos of a medium and mini loaf pans you can fit in the basket both mini pan dimensions         in  x       in  x      in medium    in  x       in  x         in i will update you all in regards to the durability and functionality over time and see if anything changes

i have had   air fryers at this point  different sizes and different brands and so far this one has been my favorite  i love how big it is and the square shape  however  what inspired me to buy it was the fact you can press a release button and the basket comes out  this makes it easy to dump the food right onto a plate or dish  my old ninja  which worked great  just had an attachment that fit snug in the bottom so i couldn t dump the food out with out getting the crumbs  juices  and oil that had accumulated at the bottom on top of all the food  this is easy to use also  there are pre set settings or you can change the temperature and cook time manually  just have to press a button once or twice  i have made frozen snack type food in it and food i battered or breaded myself  both come out amazing  i bought an oil spritzer off amazon and fill it with olive oil or coconut oil and spritz the food every   minutes then shake the basket and continue cooking  that really makes a difference in the final product when it comes to homemade breaded dishes  if you are thinking of buying an air fryer i highly recommend this one  this is even great to reheat leftovers   pizza may even be better the next day if you are warm it up in the air fryer   i haven t had any issues but i have only had it for like two weeks  with in those two weeks i have used it almost everyday  my kids love it and my   year old uses it by herself constantly   chicken nuggets  fish sticks  frozen popcorn shrimp  pizza pockets  cheese sticks all that junk  so yes i d definitely recommend this air fryer

let me start by saying this is my go to for cooking lots of things  we even use it to reheat drive thru fries that have gotten cold by the time we get home which make them just like they came out of the fryer  i really enjoy is it being the wifi model and it works with alexa on the down side  after almost a year of use  the front panel is very hard to use  i m glad i have the wifi model because that still works perfectly  i press on front panel buttons and sometimes have to do it hard  i often cannot adjust time or temperature  i m afraid it fail completely soon  we wash the basket in dishwasher and found the screws holding the basket to he handle worked out  i lost two and was able to find substitutes and ended up buying another basket since i sometimes will cook different things for the same meal there is a bit of learning curve but the included recipe book and the app are very helpful  you have to experiment because some things come out great and some do better cooking in the oven i would have given it   stars but i m afraid it will not be a long lasting appliance

i bought this air fryer two weeks ago  the item arrived fast  it was very well packed no damage  when i opened the box the air fryer looked brand new  however  the display was all scratched like someone has grabbed their keys and scratched all over the display  i called cosori customer serviced  the gentlemen was so polite and professional  they offered a replacement right away  they grabbed my information and amazon order number  i give an a  for their customer services the replacement arrived   days later  brand new no scratch  i am still learning how to use it  but we already love it  i cooked fries  chicken and steak  this air fryer is very hot so you have to be very careful with timing  i love how it beeps when you have to flip or shake as for the taste  i don t know if it is because it is new  but my food tasted a little bit like the cosori  i don t know how to explain in  but i m guessing it is because the product is new  because the same thing happened with my pressure cooker my husband and i definitely recommend this air fryer

after   months  this product is falling apart  the basket inside the drip pan moves and vibrates during cooking  it has chaffed away significant sections of the teflon coating on the drip pan  this immediately rusted  also the crimp at the top of the fryer basket has rust all of the way around under the lip  when you do the   minute preheat  very often the pan  pops  out of the heating area  it moves very far  if you have the fryer on the edge of a counter  the basket will fall to the floor  the plastic on the handle broke on mine after a few of these falls  the flavor of the food is incredible  but i will look for another brand than cosori

i love  love  love my cosori air fryer     fried foods are my favorites  but i hate cleaning up the mess   even though i am on the keto eating plan  i still don t like cleaning up the mess of frying food  especially bacon   i knew a year ago i wanted an air fryer  and it took me awhile to pick out which one was right for me   i researched  and i read reviews   finally i decided upon the cosori   the main reason i picked this one were the reviews  not only for the air fryer  but for the positive cosori customer service reviews i waited to write this review because i wanted to see how i liked it   i ve had it for two months now  and i purchased it at the regular price   i also have not had any reason to contact their customer service   i have used it everyday now  sometimes     times a day it is sooo easy to clean   after cooking  any grease i pour into an old coffee container  and then wipe it with paper towel before i use soap and a sponge  the soft side  not the scouring side    the baskets can go into the dishwasher  but so far i have washed it by hand each time because i use it so often  and i don t run the dishwasher every day i have cooked bacon  steaks  sausage patties  frozen chicken wings  frozen chicken breasts  hamburgers  hotdogs  vegetables  etc   i plan on experimenting with desserts eventually     just haven t done it yet   the first week of using the air fryer  i overcooked a few items  especially frozen vegetables like broccoli  trying to figure out the time of cooking   no big deal   i ate it anyway   it has preset times  which i use every so often  but i wanted to understand the fryer so i experimented more   i only cook for three people  sometimes four  so the size is just right   if there is something in particular that i want to cook in it  i read air fryer recipes and ideas from others  then i adapt it to my likes and eating needs   i am so very happy with my purchase      i hope this review helps make your decisions easier

not sure if it cooks good or not yet     i will let you know  but when you get it and they tell you to remove the plastic from inside it   the big piece of plastic was stuck to the top as if it was put on while hot   appears the plastic is attached to the coil while it was still hot because it is hard hard to get it off   had to take twizzers and pull it from around those coils and very unhandy   hope i got it all   it seemed as if it had been heated the plastic adhered to the coil

i bought the fryer in november        i registered it for an extra year    years  of warrantee   i recently contact the company explaining the drawer no long locked  clicked  in place as would not operate unless i jammed it closed with something heavy in front of the drawer   i sent a picture of the top of the drawer showing the piece that  clicks  when you try to push the drawer in place   i also sent a copy of the extended warrantee i had registered what i got back from their customer support was instructions to send them a video of the drawer being inserted  and presumably popping back out   a copy of the purchase order and a  re  statement of the problem   i suspect all that is designed to make me just go away   it has  except for this review what the company got from me is a  former  customer who will not replace this fryer with another one from corsori if you think you will like this fryer  roll the dice and hope you never need it warrantee service   other than the lousy customer service and the drawer latch design  it s not a bad fryer

your browser does not support html  video                          i bought this unit from amazon warehouse and it was listed as  used   very good  the unit was brand new and the packaging was damaged  i used it for a few months and it quit working   it was supposed to have a one year warranty so i contacted the manufacturer and explained that the basket latching system had failed   i could  wiggle it and pull up and it would turn on the unit until you let loose   see video   they suggested that i clean the unit  even though i told them that i had already tried that  and they would not honor the warranty because it was listed a s used because  i bought it from amazon warehouse  the bottom line is that i will not purchase anything from cosori  i believe that this product is defective in its design of its latching mechanism   cosori used a loop hole to justify not honoring their warranty   the unit was never used before i received it   it failed within the warranty period and they will not replace or repair the unit  buyer beware  update i reviewed the amazon warehouse policy and i was not eligible for the  company warranty as they had stated i contacted  support noting that the unit was unused when  i received it and that i was disappointed that they wouldn t honor the warranty  in between time  i tore into the defective unit and found a micro switch that signaled the presence of the cooking tray had failed   i ordered a replacement for    and it is on its way  meanwhile cosori contacted me  and made a one time exception  and was shipping me a replacement unit the bottom line is that i changed  this review to   stars because they considered the situation

controls are well laid out   pre heat makes getting set easy   generous basket size   amazingly non stick  even in the base unit with bacon or longer fried foods   i ve used foil to cover the base under the bracket to ease cleanup  but you really don t have to since it washes out so easily   the snowflake icon button for frozen foods is just right and i have developed a habit of delicious frozen brussel sprouts air fried on a regular basis   who would have thought   perfect for households of two or three  or even four   easy and fast chicken breasts or thighs or tenders  shrimp  asparagus  jicama fries  etc   haven t tried steak since i prefer sous vide slower cooking for those followed by a quick pan sear  but burgers were good   most pics show french fried potatoes  which are good  but don t overload the basket like those many photos show   that won t work well   oh  and i love the  shake  reminder which comes on autamically on a few of the icon button foods   when you take the tray out to shake the oven pauses and restarts at the same place on the timer to continue the cook   highly recommend the cosori air fryer

while i love this product up until this week  things have changed based on my ability to contact the company   i have had my air fryer for     months   the food is always amazing  however i was cooking pork chops earlier this week and about   minutes in while i was making some sides  the drawer shot out of the air fryer and onto the floor   the drawer broke and doesn t sit sealed in the air fryer any more i figured i would contact the manufacture and just order a new drawer and bin to go inside the fryer   however  they do not have an email to contact only a phone number   while my work schedule in production i can t call during their business hours   this has caused me to go from cooking with it every night to nothing and i don t know how to fix it   i don t want to buy another complete unit  when only the drawer needs to be replaced on this one

i was very skeptical about purchasing one of these  air fryers  but after a visit to my niece s house  seeing how quick and easy it was to cook frozen chicken strips in less time than it takes my oven to pre heat  i decided to give it a go   after it arrived and i initially washed it found a place for it in the kitchen  i went to the store and purchased a variety of frozen foods to put it through its paces  i made french fries first and they turned out great  very crispy just as i like them   next was jalapeno poppers  chicken strips  and frozen battered fish   i just finished making some breaded mushrooms and turkey burgers in it this evening and everything has turned out either as expected or has surpassed my expectations it s easy enough for just about anyone to use and clean up is a breeze   i m only giving it four stars at this time because i have yet to try out some of the other cooking features but will be happy to up it to five stars if i continue to be as please with it as i have been so far   i also really like the look of it  it s not a shiny black  it is more of a matte black which makes it match better with my other appliances   i also like that it s more square than round  fits better on my counter   it is rather large so if you don t have the counter space you might wish to order a smaller version   so far it s been one of the best things i ve purchased for my kitchen in a long time

our air fryer has served a great purpose and constantly provides us with a delicious meal  i was eager to give this product a   star review but here s why i won t  the french fry button should work for majority of all frozen french fry options  however  this has given us burnt fries on more occasions than i care to admit  i typically use the frozen food button for french fries instead of the fry button due to this issue aside from that flaw  everything else has been a perfect meal  cooked flawlessly and doesn t leave a huge grease mess or pot of fry oil to clean up after later

i looked at specs and reviews of a number of products  but one review in particular recommended this one and remarked on the benefits of a square basket and this one has a square basket  i was originally considering spending less but based on the review i bought the cosori  and i am happy with my decision  i love it and have made a variety of foods in it and everything has turned out great  and it is so easy to clean  simple to operate  doesn t get hot on the outside  and for the internal size  does not have a huge footprint  fantastic product  if i had to select the kitchen appliances that i consider the most useful it would be the cosori air fryer  a grill pan with interchangeable surfaces  a k cup coffee machine and maybe a microwave  do not hesitate to buy the cosori

this air fryer is relatively easy to clean and heats fries  fried chicken  and bread fairly evenly   on par with convection ovens  and better than toaster small ovens  however  the annoying thing about this air fryer is the loud beeps that there is no way to turn off  when i originally purchased this product  i was hoping to use it in the morning  but the loud beeps make it impossible since it will wake everyone in the house up  if the loud beeps are not a concern for you  i can recommend this product  however  for me the beeps are a deal breaker
the instructions book and recipe book are missing  i need these books

my husband wanted an air fryer  he kept seeing the one tv infomercial but i when i read the amazon reviews on it  i didn t like the  toxic death smell  comments   so after many days of research and reading reviews  i finally settled on the corosi  first  i liked the supposed size of it   and i also like the reviews of the preheating and shake features that make a difference from other fryers   when it came in i was surprised at the size and after a couple of months of owning it and using it   i am so glad i bought this   size is perfect for family compared to others   i like the squared deep basket  it is big to keep out on my counter but no biggie to pull out of pantry when needed   the nonstick basket is easy to clean and i even purchase paper cooking liners for it that help with things sticking   why you should buy    preheat  if you preheat like an oven you giving food a jump on being crispy    shake feature   no it does not shake for you  but half way through cooking it beeps to alert you to move  flip  toss  shake  shimmy   whatever your food you will need a little oil for maximum crispness  i bought an oil sprayer that allows to spritz the food with enough to cook crisp food   we have used a lot for frozen items instead of using oven   tip  for exception of potatoes like fries   keep things in one layer  if you throw in on top items  the bottom items may not crisp up enough or you will doing a lot of turning  takes one more run maybe but it s worth having crispy spring rolls or taquitos when they are cooked in one layer did cook burgers once  feel like it really shrunk them but they came out ok   did hot dog and those came out great   my husband has done frozen chicken wings and he loved how they came out i did buy the additional kit that has a pizza pan and other items so will need to try those considering in lock down due to covid    right now update  i have read other reviews of basket handle breaking cracking   with all things you cannot manhandle it   it should not be dropped   all it takes is a gentle push of the button and slide out   if you treat it well and take care of it  it will work fine

the  touch screen  has never worked properly so there is only the pre set     degree for    minutes that works  it takes about       button presses for it to even turn the power on and then start the pre programmed cycle  i have learned to make do and the food really is great when you time it just right  i could never actually get it to sync even though it is wifi compatible    i should have returned it but we were moving just after we got it and it didn t get unboxed until after the returnable timeframe    pretty frustrating for the amount of money spent on it        i gave it two stars because it really does make great toast and frozen fries  you just have to set an alarm to stop it

this thing is legit i ll preface why with a little background info    my wife got an instapot a while back and it slowly became the bane of her existence  she went through six dozen eggs just trying to get consistent hard boiled eggs  ruined two roasts and a litany of other dishes in a little over two weeks  she experienced firsthand the fleeting victory of accomplishing what she set out to do only three times  three  needless to say  once she d finished going through the multiple stages of grief  rage  depression and finally acceptance  i came home from work and saw the thing in pieces scattered across my driveway  she vowed  never  again   and that was that until this   months had passed and she s started noticing her friends using air fryers  she liked what she saw but the ptsd from the instapot was holding on strong  she was leery at first  then decided to pull the trigger    which may or may not have been helped along when i saw the pics of fries and chicken wings    fast forward two weeks and i came home to ridiculously mouthwatering smells and tears  only  this time  they were tears of joy  i looked over and our kids were savagely attacking heaping mounds of fries  nuggets  wings  corn dogs  everything  she even fried half out veggie drawer  the table looked like a cartoon version of thanksgiving  only it was a tuesday and only a week into the covid quarantines  my   year old told me to hurry up  sit and eat before she came to her senses and took it all away  to this day  our family has known no greater homemade feast five stars  would recommend

i found that the easy buttons work for some things and others i use the suggestions online  like pinterest or other sites and blogs about food and recipes  the steak setting worked perfectly for three   oz venison steaks  the veggie and root veggie settings probably should be tweaked and set your own the ease of the basket removal is a great feature and it makes it super easy to clean  i have not put it in the dishwasher  yet  because i clean it right away and it doesn t need any deep cleaning bread under the basket for bacon is a must  after two out of four batches to cook one  lb package of bacon  spread the pieces out to cook thru  it started smoking pretty good  the water method is not really a good one read blogs and especially pinterest for ideas  it s a great tool you must turn things if you want crispy browned on both sides you must oil things  mist  to get a crispy texture

i bought this product and i ve probably used it    times  the last   times i have used it  it cut off completely and goes blank  it won t show any of the digital buttons or anything  it s like it completely died  so  i took the food out  went to use my oven  and then left it plugged up and it started up on its own and continued to count down  what if i wasn t home  the outside of the fryer was hot as well  i will try to get a hold of the tech support for the fryer since it s been over a month for the amazon return

as per the other reviews  our oven has become redundant  had this beauty for over   month now and thought i d share our experiences we had one which cooked everything to perfection but rather than trying to time different ingredients we bought another eg  steak in one fries in the other then we bought one for a family member here s what we cook to absolute perfection   bacon  perfectly crispy  just press the bacon button  it s that easy   chicken thighs  gotta admit it i now eat the chicken skin  never used to but it s crispy and delicious  just press the chicken button  walk away  come back  enjoy   steak  you ll never use a pan again  maintains all the juices with a perfect all round sear  just figure out your own cooking times for how you like it cooked   fries  roast potatoes  potato wedges  fluffy on the inside and crispy on the outside  roasted vegetables  cooked with a little char  breaded fish and chicken  even the thickest pieces of say chicken are done in     minutes  crispy  juicy and delicious  no fat  amazing we pretty much use these little wizard gadgets for every home cooked meal it will take a while to figure out your perfect cooking times for steak  breaded chicken and so on  after that unplug your oven as you won t be using it anything you can cook in an oven  a pan or broiler will cook and taste so much better in the air fryer in more than half the time and with just a coating of spray oil our biggest gamble and success was had cooking beef wellington and it was the best we ve ever made  the pastry was cooked evenly and to crispy perfection while the fillet was beautifully medium rare  that s a lot of expensive ingredients and preparation time to gamble  gordon ramsey s recipe    minutes at     and   at      job done  gourmet give it a quick rinse and it s ready to conjure up the next delicious meal with the press of a button  feels like cheating sometimes especially with steak coming out so well  press a button walk away come back   minutes later and you ve got restaurant quality steak just be sure to always pre heat not sure about other cheaper airfryers  i know preheating is essential to the crispness which i m not sure the others have

have used it a dozen times and can see it s usefulness now  i think getting a good recipe down for the flour dusting used to dredging meats and seafood breading might take a while  i mock fried some butterflied shrimp i d prepped with egg  flour and panko  it came out pretty well but was clear heavily breaded stuff needs to be raised from the bottom of the basket  solution is to purchase the optional kit of accessories  which i did  plus the extra basket definitely seeing the efficiency of this thing hate learning new icons but once you know the relative temps you re good even after you choose and icon setting you can fine tune the time and temp on the fly nice clear alarms  depending on icon mode you select it will beeeep half way to let you flip items in the basket  and beep again when done even after you choose an icon setting you can fine tune the time and or temp on the fly as necessary

this product deserves more than   stars   it s that good  i have been going back and forth with the idea of purchasing an air fryer for about a year now but couldn t justify spending over      for one  this one came up on a prime day deal for around       after reading all the reviews i decided to buy it and give it a try  the reviews did not lie  this thing is great  my   year old loves chicken nuggets and this thing cooked frozen chicken nuggets in    minutes and they came out so crispy   i am so happy that i no longer have to worry about my   year old asking me     times if his chicken nuggets are done cooking  it also came with a recipe book that has so many other recipes and recommendations   i was actually really surprised at how many different things you can cook in here  steaks  meatballs  chicken parm  muffins  french toast  i can t wait to try them all  the presets are really convenient and the manual cooking is also really simple and it preheats in about   minutes which is awesome  although this one is big and does take up a bit of counter space  it was a great purchase especially at the discounted prime day price  i m very happy with this product so far and i ve already recommended it to my friends  i will definitely be purchasing the accessory set to complete this in the near future  this is definitely the best thing i ve ever purchased off of amazon

purchased this air fryer may           i hate cooking  but have enjoyed cooking with this  however  it stopped functioning correctly two weeks ago  it gets     minutes into cooking time and just shuts down  it s very disappointing after initially being so thrilled  before my issues started  i bought one for each of my kids  my fingers are crossed that those units don t crap out on them as well  buy another brand would be my advice

i have gone crazy and been air frying everything  i cooked hamburgers  shrimp  anything frozen  pizza  steak  which turn out awesome and only take    minutes   bacon  sausage and any vegetable i can stick in there  the key is always pre heat  spray with oil and seasoning  the picture i included was all cooked in the fryer  hamburger steak  asparagus  corn on the cob and sauteed mushrooms  well ok  the gravy was done on the stove  i can set the cooking temp or setting on my phone and hit start and there it goes  and the clean up is a breeze  nothing stick  not grease  melted cheese nothing  i have talked my neighbors into buying this model and they must be crazy because they haven t taken it out of the box yet  oh ye of little faith  forgive them lord they know not what they are missing  their loss  but i understand people fear change  this throws everything we have been taught about cooking out the window  the food is done quicker and it actually taste better my only complaint is that maybe just on mine but the buttons are not very responsive  but with always having my phone around this has not been a deal breaker  in fact is much easier to custom set it on my phone i love this and the wife and i have joked that we need more to cook more things at once  but until then it s nothing the warm setting on the oven hasn t solved while i cook more items get one  get two you won t be sorry

the air fryer works well and is taking some time to get used to new cooking times  the rule of thumb of reducing temperature by    degrees and cooking time by    percent does not appear to hold true for this item  i have also found that with only a basket and no additional racks  the space for cooking is limited  i did buy other racks to put into the air fryer but the heat is distributed unevenly with the additional rack and again cooking times and temperatures need to be adjusted  also can only add one additional rack  when i bought i thought a larger size unit would allow for more items to be cooked at once  not the case

i ordered this sept          and received it today  sept   th        i was excited to use it and had the food ready  i preheated it and after   mins  it said e   i called the company and they said its defective     since i just had major surgery  i can not repack it  i called the company and they emailed me information which i sent the information they wanted  i will edit my review when i get a new unit  i tried   times to use the unit and e  kept coming up which is open circuit temperature monitor issue  i am now waiting for a new replacement  such a disappointment since i saw a lot of good reviews for this update           i received a new unit but wanted to wait a few weeks to see how it works  no problems so far  and it works well  i like how it cooks food  i was told that smoke that comes out from the bottom is normal when cooking certain foods like chicken or wings   easy to clean baskets in dishwasher   i look forward to using this product

for the first time we cooked a chicken        pounds   not   piece of dry meat whats good about it is the leftover chicken we will just put it back in and reheat it   i spent at least a week going thru all the reviews and must say it helped alot   i just can t believe it took me so long to get one but i couldn t be happier  now to get my son one   widower with   school age kids  he could get home from work and in   hour have a delicious meal

excellent customer service  basket issue was covered under warranty update  after about a month one of the screws fell out into my food  it stayed tight after screwing it back i m but glad i saw it first   then after about   months it had trouble knowing the basket was closed  if i press down on the handle it turns on but then the basket is tilted out of the dryer  as soon as i let go it turns off original   star  does so much more than appetizers  perfectly cooks chicken  pork  potatoes  anything that you could bake or deep fry  fried chicken in the airfryer is way  better than kfc  reduces prep and cook time with no oil splatter  and an easy to clean basket  dishwasher safe   works well with alexa and the app is handy if you leave the room  very much recommend

i have had this air fryer for   months and use it at least   times a week  i do everything in it  chicken  steak  hambergers  sausage  you name it i use my air fryer  it cooks so fast and clean up is a breeze  when cooking fatty things place a piece of bread between  the baskets this assets to absorb grease  doing this not only gets  the grease but there will be no smoking  the taste with steaks is so good so after   months i noticed that plastic on the outside cover was breaking off and had cracked  no problem i contacted cosori and they sent me a new one  great customer service  i would give it more stars but no way to do that   if you do buy this brand rest assured that cosori has a one year warranty and they do honor it

and it s pretty incredible    minutes or less to pre heat versus my oven that takes    minutes  talk about pizza rolls when needed  i have a large range of foods i ve tried that are better in the oven  some are better in the microwave  and now some foods are better in the air fryer  leftovers are a freaking breeze  just go to the freezer aisle  pick out some random quick meals  like egg rolls  corn dogs  something easy a    year old boy would eat  and i promise the air fryer will not let you down  stick to the oven for meats   the air fryer does seem to dry out more than i d like probably my only complaint about this is the basket itself   the main basket has the handle so even though i m comfortable sticking the metal extras in the dishwasher  the main basket gets pretty gross  it s hard to clean in my opinion because of all the ridges   sponges will be ripped apart  i would definitely recommend purchasing separate dishwasher safe accessories if you re super lazy like me and hate handwashing

as others have reported  mine arrived with a non functioning control panel   everything works fine through the app  this seems to be a recurring issue based on recent reviews   my guess is they ve had a bad batch of hardware as this is an otherwise highly rated product   awaiting a response from cosori support as i type update  support were very responsive and acknowledged the issue   they are sending me a replacement from a new batch once they are available   they also seem genuinely interested in tracing all the bad items and asked for a photo of the etched batch number on the bottom of the unit upgrading to   stars for now   once i get the replacement and verify it works i ll review my rating again update  my replacement arrived very quickly and i m happy to report this unit is fully functional

love this thing   cooking is actually fun again    no more sticking my hands in a hot oven or getting burned by splattering grease on the stovetop   the steaks come out juicy and tender on the inside  as they should  yet they are still cooked properly   and don t even get me started on the fantastic french fries   i even cooked a whole chicken breast in there yesterday   while it just fit in the basket diagonally  i did have to perform a little surgery on the sternum as the basket was not quite deep enough  but it was worth the effort   i have had this air fryer for only a week and a half  but am using it daily to experiment with   as for those complaints about these baskets falling apart easily  i am checking each time i use it to make sure both parts are latched together properly before lifting them  and being careful to not touch the release button  which has a built in safety cover  until i have set the unit down   it seems to be very well built and cleans easily   cosori even provides a customer support phone number  which is rare these days  and they are also offering an extra year warranty for free  if the form they provide is sent in within two weeks of purchase  which i did   all the directions are clear and easily understandable  and the recipe book is quite handy for learning of the possibilities   plus  the machine offers suggested temperatures and cook times on its dashboard  all of which can easily be overridden by any preferred changes   all in all  i am completely satisfied    no  change that to  elated   by this product   if anything changes  i will update this review

although i researched and this came up as one of the better air fryers  i m disappointed with my purchase  biggest qualm is that anything you cook ends up tasting like the smell of the fryer  what i mean by that is  the plastics and material it s constructed from can be smelt and tasted the first time you use  thought that would go away but a month later and all our food still taste like the fryer  wish i could return but we are past our    day return policy

i just recieved my corsori air fryer and i m so excited  it is so large  so much cooking space  came with excellent instruction book and a wonderful cookbook  i m going to have some fun with this i can tell  update    oh my word love this air fryer  love the size and the safety feature from the basket falling out because of hitting release by mistake  i do find it cooks much faster then my old one but that is great   i researched alot of them before buying this one  absolutely   no regrets

this is my second air fryer  my first one i inherited from my parents who love to buy all the gadgets but almost never actually use them i absolutely love it  but one thing drives me insane  the controls  instead of having individual buttons which adjust temperature and time  you have to select the temperature and then use the same   or   to adjust it up or down  then you select time and use the same buttons  it would be much easier to have them separate  also the power button could just as easily serve as the button to turn it on  i can t tell you how many times i have adjusted the time and temperature only to turn it off on accident  it takes a lot of brain power not to  it might be because it is my second and my first had better controls that said  this one is a superior cooker  it is superior at cleaning  it is absolutely beautiful to look at  i love the square basket  the handle and attachment mechanism is much better designed but i must say  if cosori updated the controls  i d buy a new one and pass this onto someone else  it s that annoying

i m not a great cook  but the air fryer is pretty fool proof  there are a few things that catch me off guard when i use it though    the temperature only goes up in intervals of     so if directions tell you to cook at     you have to either go     or     and adjust cooking times  not a huge deal  but still a little off putting if you aren t cooking savvy    cleaning the product is kind of weird  i m very careful about keeping things clean  and this airflow fryer tests me each time  there are these little air hole vents on the part you pull out  whenever i soak the basket to make sure i can get everything off while damaging the basket coating as little as possible  when i go to clean the basket and drawer  little food particulates end up stuck inside  it takes a lot of poking and prodding to get everything out  there are screws holding everything in place  so in theory you could take it apart to clean  but who wants to take something apart each clean aside from that the air fryer itself works wonders  i ve made a couple of chicken dishes that turned out wonderful  crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside  pre made things are good too  like store bought sweet potato fries from trader joe s  i received this as a gift  but i would have little hesitation buying it for myself again

beware  i received the smart air fryer two days ago and every single time i used it  smoke comes out from the sides and smells like burning plastic i reached out to cosori customer service through email because you can t get ahold of them through the phone and sent them a video of the problem  they have an automated message reply to me  i replied and the same exact automated message would reply back  this is ridiculous i do not want my kitchen to catch fire horrible customer service  beware of this fire hazard

easy to use  wish it had quick time buttons in addition to the convenient food buttons  i made a rack from stainless steel grid  amazon     see photo  mesh       cm x    cm  must cut down and bend  for tortillas etc  we love it        btw this is not a star trek food replicator  it uses a heating element and a fan to cook food fast which produces moist hot air and sometimes steam depending on what you re cooking  the steam has to go somewhere  i haven t had much dripping or pooling under this unit but when compared to my grease fryer this is easy to clean  if you find an air fryer that doesn t release moist hot air  steam   it s either not plugged in or is secretly a star trek food replicator       ps  please post link if u find a replicator

this is our first air fryer and it was purchased as a christmas gift  it is incredibly simple to clean and the design and look of the air fryer is very sleek and fit in with our kitchen very well  i found using it to be very simple and the preset buttons seemed to work great after a few weeks of use the fan in the air fryer stopped turning on essentially turning this thing into a big toaster  i contacted cosori about the issue and within    hours they got back to me and after a few photos and videos for troubleshooting i received notice that a new air fryer was being sent to my house from the company  we received our new replacement air fryer in a few days and so far it is working great  it was nice to have a company so quickly respond and rectify the situation

amazon replaced the air fryer and the new one works  this is the best invention since the microwave    we use it at least   times a week for corn on the cob and carrots   it makes egg rolls taste even better since there is no grease       half the buttons did not work  the preheat button would not turn blue   everytime we opened the drawer the fryer turned off  i purchased this because of the great reviews but i am extremely disappointed   i will be returning this product

loved it at first  yay air fryer  super convenient  pretty much used it instead of the oven for about   weeks  then one day while cooking some chicken      degrees for    minutes  pulled the sliding hopper out and the entire thing fell off the handle  luckily didn t burn myself as i freaked myself out and then upon examining the basket and all    the screws heated up so much so that they melted through  nasty messy  refunding it  because the manufacturer wants to try and  troubleshoot  yeah  let s troubleshoot plastic melting and the thing self destructing

i love my air fryer  it cooks most things in about        less time than a conventional oven  it basically is a mini convection oven but it is extremely  efficient and leaves your food crispy but not over cooked  i ve made multiple potato recipes that come out great  a mid size potato takes maybe    minutes to bake through  and chicken comes out great  cooked fully but not dried out at all  i also love cooking vegetables in this thing  a tiny spray of oil and a shake half way through and that s it  the fryer is large so you can fit a fair amount of food at a time in it  it has a release button that is covered by a plastic slide so you don t accidentally release it while it s hot lol which i thought was a nice touch  it does not make your kitchen hot like an oven  it s fairly quiet and fits on a countertop  i find myself rarely using my regular oven unless it s a larger item i can t fit in my air fryer  plus you can find literally thousands of recipes online important  make sure to read instructions fully and run the air fryer on preheat before using  you might notice a smell that will potentially transfer to your food  i ran mine twice and the smell went away  i ve read reviews where people say their food tasted like burnt plastic and that s because they did not do this step

i resisted buying an air fryer for a couple of years because i really didn t want another kitchen gadget that was just going to collect dust after a week of use  well  no worries there  i use it at least once a day now  sometimes twice a day  the basket is super easy to clean and i find no need to put it in the dishwasher  even though they say you can  i never used to understand the big deal about wings  but decided to make some for my husband and son   holy cow  wings are great in this  the skin is crispy and the chicken is juicy  i love making cubed butternut squash as well as potatoes   both white and sweet  asparagus is perfect  i like that the cosori has a square basket and allows you to fit more in than a round basket  the presets are great and easy to use  overall   i couldn t be happier with my purchase

i am glad i got this air fryer from cosori  at first i was hesitant to get it because i didn t know the brand and i never owned any products from cosori  the customer reviews convinced me to get it and i am happy i did  i love everything about it  the size  the square basket  very spacious inside  it s smart  well made and doesn t feel cheap  it is a good product  it cooks food thorougly and even  i have been using this baby everyday ever since i got it  i think this is even better than the panasonic air fryer plus that one is over priced anyway  i realized that cosori makes good products  i hope this brand company will last forever and will be known and popular like kitchenaid  cuisineart  etc  i just ordered my  nd cosori product  which is their pressure cooker  i am excited and i can t wait to get it

so i bought this air fryer at the recommendation of my sister who lives in london  she swears by it   i followed all the inst etc but noticed i had to push the buttons a couple of times before it would register and work  when it did it was amazing  food tasted good  chicken was moist  fish was good  fries  omg anyway you get the picture  of course i had to show my sister on facetime  she was the one who told me there was something wrong  and that the buttons should be more responsive  i called customer service  they were brilliant  very accommodating  and shipped me a new one within two days  great product  great customer service
i was very excited about this purchase  after approximately   uses it began to smoke  of course it was   day after the return window

i like the design  it looks so beautiful on my countertop  the basket is big enough for a medium size chicken so there is plenty of space  a recipe book also comes with the package which saves me lots of time  there are   cooking modes and a preheat setting and i can control the machine through the app  which enables me to plan for meals

amazing top tier air frier  price is worth it as i bought a cheaper brand on here that was a nightmare to clean  i eventually tossed the old one and got this cooks everything from freezer food to bread baked goods  now gets more use than my oven  cheese  grease nothing sticks to this air fryer  i handwash and have no issues easily getting anything stuck to the basket off with a normal plastic brush scrubber in a couple mins  i don t think it s dishwasher safe but don t know for sure as i have never needed to do that  no more baking soda vinegar scrub downs for hrs that barely get my fryer clean  tons of settings and a wifi mode  not that i use that very much   boyfriend and a couple family members have bought them  highly recommend corsiar brand  they have been what i was looking for for years

ok air fryer ladies and gent  i am actually doing this review over as i have not had this product for about   months  this review will over this unit and the nuwave air fryer just in case you were thinking of getting it  i had that one for about a year and a half first the nuwave  it cooks very well  you get accurate cooking times and does a nice job of getting items crisp  however  there are a few major cons  the first and in my opinion a deal breaker for me  the basket  the basket not only breaks all the time meaning when you go to close the door it will not it has issues closing  there are times i must let the unit cool then it will finally close  not the greatest when you have to open it to shake the items but then can t close it for an hour  the company would not help at all they said buy a new basket  lol  the  nd is cleaning it  let us just assume the door had no issues  cleaning it is a nightmare  any sponge will either get stuck in the grooves or just not clean well  you can put in the dish washer but who wants to do that after each time  result do not buy thiscosori       cooks a little longer than the nuwave but by a few min  honestly  once you get used to the timings it s a breeze  cleaning  omg so easy i use this   or   times a week its that easy to clean  less than   min to clean  my honest opinion  best air fryer ever  i will say this  chicken wings on the nuwave comes out a tad better but it s just not worth the hassle  trust me

it looks very fancy  coming with user manual and recipes  very thoughtful and friendly for a beginner user  good for     ppl  it s my first step towards a healthier lifestyle  remember to remove the plastic and paperboard inside before use  can t wait to have my first meal cooked by it

i was pretty skeptical about buying an air fryer   when they first came out i laughed and thought they would be a novelty for a year and then folks would move on   it s been a few years and i decided to pull the trigger   lots of research and i landed on the cosori   this thing is big and holds a lot   everything i have made so far has been great   broccoli  salmon  burgers  chicken   you name it   i really love cooking salmon in this thing   turns out perfect every single time  and i avoid heating up the house using the oven   it s less shiny plastic looking if you want to leave it out on the counter   pretty easy to clean as well   this thing is a game changer  kicking myself for not buying it sooner
