literally has changed the way i we eat  i eat steaks at home now     ribeyes from the grocery store  that tastes great  way different than the bland taste from the oven  hard to explain why  but there is a big difference  plus  we do the frozen kroger burgers and they re great as well  no after taste  and just basic burger tastes as it should  but putting the bun on top for the last    seconds or so makes the difference as well  kind of crispy  warm bun with mayo  lettuce  etc and it s a thousand times cleaner and easier to make than the skillet  where grease goes everywhere  plus the waste of time it takes on stove  as they all say  the fries are different than when in oven  way better  the wya they taste at the restaurant  but better this from a live long drive thru and take out person  we ve literally eaten more  and way better  and cheaper  at home in past month than ever  it s easy to give up       minutes to make a meal  vs the stove or oven where it takes prep  hour or whatever  then cleanup  not happening with me  never use my oven  mainly because after all that work it never tasted good  eveyrthing they say is true  it tastes different  and is really quick  frozen burgers and crinkle fries together at once  in    minutes   you re eating  and crinkle fries tastes the way crinkle fries in deep fryer tastes  but no grease  i don t even use the spray or anything  they still taste great to me

waited way too long to finally invest in an air fryer  did tons of research which eventually led me to this baby  perfecto  reasonable footprint  quiet  simple to operate  quick to clean  and mostest bestest part  the air fried foods are in sane  p s  i ordered the version w the app although the assumed it was unnecessary  so glad i did  we use the app most of the time we air fry

i didn t think i was going to be a big fan of air fryer until this product changed my opinion   i thought air fryers are just for fried chicken  but actually  this item can be used to cook all kinds of food   no matter it s steak  fish  wings  or even veggies   just put it in and let it be   it will become ready in minutes   the cooked food tastes pretty similar to actual grilled food  but the clean up is much easier than a grill  and also air frying is much healthier than grilling   attached photo is air fried sea bass   i use this item all the time now  recommend

cleaned  plugged in  prepared to use  turned on to see that   buttons are broken including the preheat and temp time buttons  only a few of the preset buttons are working  i ve seen other reviews about how their first fryers arrived defective until they contacted customer support and got sent a new one  it should arrive working the first time  i will update after i contact them update it arrived in original packaging and taped up  similar to the first  buttons work fine  however  the bottom of the air fryer does not completely push in or close  letting steam out the front  i ve included pictures showing steam being released  if i push the handle in and hold it  the gap closes and steam is released from the back like it should  i believe it is a problem with the latch  the review will remain   star until i get one with no defects update   i decided to keep it for a few days to test and see if the gap at bottom of the air fryer that was releasing steam would affect the product  to my dismay  in the middle of cooking chicken strips  the air fryer basket dislodged and shot across my counter  almost scattering my food around the kitchen  i looked in horror as the hot basket lay on my newly refurbished counter before quickly grabbing it and placing it on a heat resistant surface  wondering how  had i not been there watching intently  the damage could have been catastrophic  i am furious and i believe that receiving a faulty product twice  with the second one almost causing damage to my property and food  is not acceptable  do not buy this product

so this is the second one i had to order because the first one was defective  only   of the buttons worked  i had to order a second one which incidentally cost me     more than the original one i bought  called to ask why there was a price difference and could it be matched since the fact that the one i ordered did not work so i was not at fault and shouldn t have to pay more to replace the defective one only to be told the original  was cheaper because amazon sold me a used previously returned one without any mention of the fact that it was either used or previously returned  i absolutely would not have bought used cookware   and would have been right to not do so because it did not work  had i not called to find out why there was such a price difference between the new one and old one when they are both sold by the same seller  which happens to be amazon    or had it worked   i would not have even known they sold me a used     itemsupremely annoyed it s only the first day with the replacement but so far all the buttons work   hopefully it continues to do soupdating the new air fryer works wonderfully  if i didn t have to go through hoops to get a working one   and the customer service  of amazon  had been better i would have given it a   star
i m not happy with the results  it burns your food  the cookbook is pointless  just a beautiful pictures and nothing more  regular oven the best  this one is bad  i don t recommend to but

easy to clean use cook everything really saves timeam a phd student who loves to cook but unfortunately i don t have enough time to practice my cooking hobby but with cosori airfryer the recipes that used to take an hour or more in the oven just take half of the time and with yummmmmi and healthy results i ve attached some of my dishes that i used cosori to prepare them also i bought the accessories of the machine gonna use the skewers to go some kabab can t wait thaaank you    for this smarty invention and cost effective machine

this cosori was purchased as a gift   i own one exactly like it   i have had it for about a year and haven t used my oven for a long time   i have been able to enjoy fried chicken without the mess of cooking it or the guilt of eating it   it is excellent for frozen potatoes as it is fast and makes them crispy like they were deep fried but not grease   fish is tasty and moist   i really haven t found anything that doesn t cook easier and taste better in any other way  crispy on the outside and moist and juicy on the inside   i highly recommend this fryer as it is efficient and easy to use   cleaning is a breeze   when i dish up i fill it with hot soapy water and by the time i ve finished eating it requires a swish and it is clean   so happy i purchased it

ease of use   well  i had to train myself to not press the power button again  which is very easy to do thinking that it is how you would start the machine  no  you need to press the button once to turn the machine on  and then press  play  button above  at first  my hand will automatically turn the machine off instead of starting the air fryer cycle   functionality wise  it is very good  have no complaint so far one thing i have noticed wit the drawer latch   drawer is secured by a little knob at the bottom which will find its place when you push it in  over time  this will wear off and the drawer will not fit   and the air fryer will not turn on without it closed all the way  called cosori and they sent me a replacement   which did not yet develop same issue looking at the design though  that plastic knob looks like it will eventually wear off and will cause same issue

i have used this air fryer at least once a day since purchasing  my family loves the grilled cheese  fried potatoes  crispy chicken  french fries  donuts  and onion rings  we are a family of   and it is often difficult to make enough meat at one time with even cooking  it is difficult to clean properly and get all of the oil out of the slats in the basket  i have used the dishwasher but was not satisfied with how clean it got  i will continue to hand clean after soaking in hot soapy water we are very impressed with the flavor and moistness of the food we cook  i would love a rack for   layers of cooking and a better way to clean but overall love this product

i love my air fryer   i ve only had it a couple of weeks but i ve already made so many things     air fried apple pies  roasted vegetables  chicken tender     i m currently cooking my second rotisserie chicken in it   i ve never done roasted vegetables in the middle of the week    thats usually a weekend thing due to time   but with my air fryer i can dice up some potato s  carrots   anything    and put in my air fryer with a few spritzes of olive oil and some kosher salt for about    min and bam   i throw my sons popcorn chicken and fries in there together for about    min and bam  i love it   i m soooo glad i bit the bullet and ordered it  i honestly was worried thinking i d never use it but i ve used it more in the last   weeks than i ve used my oven in the last month   a great purchase

i habe been using the cosori for a couple of weeks now and it was worth ever penny   great size  which was a must for me   so far i have made fries  frozen   many chicken thighs and many  many chicken wings   the chicken thighs are so good  i find myself now craving them   i spray them with a little oil  season with italian seasoning  salt and pepper  cook at     for about       mins and they come out delicious   skin gets as crispy as frying and juicy meat         mins is decent speed for cooking bone in thighs thoroughly   today i reheated wings i made yesterday and they were as crispy and juicy as fresh   this is my first air fryer  so i have a sample size of      but it is really hard for me to imagine other air fryers performing much better than this   clean up is a breeze  like most things  if you get to it when it s still hot   use pre heat feature before cleaning if you want to put it off until after dinner

overall i love this air fryer  i use it almost every single day   it s so easy and fast to use compared to the oven  and it really makes food crisp   i would ve given it   stars  except for   things   the way the tray pulls out is a little clunky  you have to yank it out  it s not as smooth as it could be   and if you tip it down the oil drips out the bottom of the drawer onto the counter which seems like is a fail somehow   i had a smaller one before and i loved it but it wasn t big enough to make food more than   person so i upgraded to this one  but that one did not have these issues   i would still not trade it in for another one because the overall cooking is great and looks very nice on the counter   i use it to  re heat re fry  fried chicken and it comes out better than when you first pick it up from the store  not to mention healthier because the oil drips out of it and it s less greasy   i also love cooking artichokes in it  ready in    minutes  and i ve never known how easy it can be   air frying raw chicken breasts  not frozen  takes about       minutes and i ve fit   huge size breasts in it to cook together  no oil needed  skin is crisp and meat is super juicy   fresh fries with just spray oil and salt  ready in    mins   brussel sprouts    mins   crisp turkey bacon and hash browns for breakfast    mins   this white one also comes with extra tray and metal skewers so you can make your own meat or veggie skewers   everyone i ve cooked for here is pleasantly surprised how well the food comes out and wants their own  so highly recommended   the drawer is dishwasher safe so very easy to clean one reminder is that it does put out a lot of heat  so you have to pull it away from your backsplash and other appliances when it s cooking

if you can t tolerate the smell of burnt plastic metal all over your house then don t buy it  the smell well make you want to gag  i check everything and took the thing apart the best i could to find the cause of the burnt smell but i didn t find anything  i concluded maybe it is the coil itself  anyway i leave it out in the patio and i cook outside too  the good part is the food does not absorb the burnt plastic metal smell  the latch on the pan basket need a better design  sometime it feel like i am going to break it wen trying to putting it back to the fryer update         okay the metal plastic smell been gone for months now   maybe it is when  fan blow the hot air thru the vent it also heated up whatever it was

i m very happy with this air fryer  i dragged my heels on buying one because i m always buying kitchen gadgets and then never using them  i researched different styles and sizes watching youtube videos and came up with this  i m glad i got the    qt  it s just my husband and i and the smaller size would have been to small for us as i m cooking meals in it  i love how i can make a full meal in it  the pic i ve included in this review i used a precooked chicken sausage sliced up  green beans  red peppers and red onions  put in a bowl and i sprayed with olive oil spray  then added salt  pepper and garlic powder and mixed it all together and dumped into the air fryer basket  set at     for    minutes and shake every   minutes or so  i put in all on some fettuccine but rice works too  i also do this with shrimp or chicken strips and vary my seasonings  the only thing i ve noticed is this is very powerful so i have to watch my cooking times and temps since i m still learning  when done i put some soap and hot water to soak anything stuck for a few minutes  i put the basket part in the top rack of my dishwasher  so easy to clean

there is so much more we can do in our kitchen now that we have this air fryer  bacon without the fuss and muss     yep  fish and chips  check  more than decent dries  check   although nothing beats proper homemade traditional fries     crispy fish for fish tacos  darn right   relatively easy to use and super easy to clean  the wifi thing is a bit of a gimmick but the recipes are nice and useful  the plastic on our drawer is coming off a little   not affecting usability but reminding you this is a sub      appliance made in china  the button are a little cheesy too   not a big deal  just don t think you ll pass this on to the next generation  overall a fun and useful addition to our kitchen  oh try the bacon wrapped cream cheese stuffed jalape o peppers

i ve been wanting an air fryer for some time but have never found one that had good reviews and a good price   i took a chance with this when it came up for a sale price on the amazon treasure truck  and i m glad i did this doesn t take up a lot of space on the counter   it s square so you can fit more food into the pan too   the digital controls on the front basically make this thing idiot proof  but a fair warning  the times on these settings will overcook your food   i usually start with their setting and back down on the time and temp settings until i get it just the way i like it   you can prepare an entire dinner right inside the basket   it comes with a cookbook to get you started too clean up is easy   just put it in the sink and fill it with warm dish soap water and let it sit while you have dinner   then just wipe it out and it s done this is great for the busy life that we all lead these days   it makes eating a healthy  home cooked meal quicker than running out and getting fast food i am definitely a fan of this unit

update  december        cosari reached out to me because of this review and after an email exchange they refunded me what i paid for the unit as an amazon gift card because it was under warranty  actually they offered me the choice of a refund or to put me on the list to send me a replacement as soon as they had new stock  excellent customer service  i then bought the exact same model again  found another one on amazon  and my new one does not have the issues with the freezing buttons i wrote about in my previous review  so in short i am very happy and am enjoying using the air fryer both through the control panel and the app  and alexa               original review                this one was a replacement for one that was a little bit bigger and would not fit where i wanted to stored it and it cooks just as  very  well  i do enjoy playing with the wifi app control but would be the first to admit that it is a bit of a toy what is not good and the only reason i am giving it   stars instead of   is that the buttons are not easy to push and register input  there often seems to be a short lag where it seems like the device is frozen taking the button input  this is pretty annoying as i often have to push a button multiple times to get it to register  even more so when you are changing time temp so need multiple pushes to register  so i generally prefer to use the phone app to kick it off and adjust it  it is possible that mine is just a hardware dud where the senors for the buttons are misaligned with the buttons display  but that does not explain the input freeze behavior i am experiencing  my girlfriend hates using it and wanted me to return it

this is the most revolutionary product i have every bought for the kitchen  i use it almost every day  chicken thighs come out like they are off the grill  they are perfectly cooked  i made amazing catfish with just creole seasoning and a couple sprays of olive oil  i really like making tortilla chips out of small corn tortillas  i have really nailed that one down i m also glad i got the wifi version  at the same price as the non wifi it really is a no brainer  what i like about this feature is you can watch how much time is left on your phone in case you need to shake the basket  you can also select one of the recipes on the app and hit start cooking and it will do the rest very easy to clean and doesn t take up as much space as i thought it would  i m also glad i got a larger basket  it can hold a whole chicken and   chicken thighs without them touching

this remarkable new air fryer is a must for every household   if you love the crunch of fried foods  or the ease of cooking your favorite meal  this cosori air fryer is for you  crispy food without all the grease or calories  it come packed with great tasting recipes in their booklet and the ease of operation makes it something you ll use almost daily  once you try the  fried chicken  or the coconut shrimp  you ll be hooked  plus there s a support page on facebook where everyone shares their own recipes  pictures and answers question  newbies  might have  you ll have so much fun using your new cosori air fryer  you ll wonder why you haven t tried it sooner  bon appetite

bought this on prime day not knowing what an air fryer was but just knowing everyone and their mother has one and swears by them  after reading review after review saying  just buy it  i was convinced i needed one in my life  my husband and i have literally cooked in it every single day since purchasing  the first thing i cooked was chopped up potatoes and my mind was blown when they were perfect in    minutes  ever since  we ve cooked everything from steaks to chicken to veggies to mini pizzas to breakfast sandwiches  it truly is a life changing thing to come home for lunch and just dump some stuff in the basket and have it ready in       minutes and still have time to enjoy a lunch break for once i also really like the pre set options  i noticed other hair dryers just have temp dials and idk how people who aren t familiar with air fryers would figure that out so it s nice to be able to just push a button and let  er go  the drawer is a little tough to get out at first until you get used to it  and the product photo is a little misleading and makes the screen look more high tech than it is  i posted photos of he actual screen as well as a size comparison photo to my standard stand mixer  we also really are happy with the recipe book it came with  so i have to join the others with saying  just buy it

this is my  nd air fryer  loved the concept but hated that my old powerxl was small   hard to clean   and had a round basket  after knowing what i did want i found this  excellent product  have used non stop since i received it after t giving       easy to clean  lots of menu selections almost too many  trial and error  square basket tho  genius  made         pound burgers at the same time and were better than grilled and not messy like pan fried  highly recommend

edit  cosori customer service sent out a replacement basket to replace it without hassle  that bumped my star rating to    original content a screw fell out from the basket handle and into the food that was being cooked without us noticing   only by sheer luck did my kid notice it before he bit down   when i inspected the basket   it was a screw that held the handle to it and it looks like whatever the screw screwed into failed as well because there s nothing there anymore   i was not able to locate the  nut  that held it in place   i m filing a report with the cpsc about this seriously  it s a very dangerous malfunction edit      found the nut  thank god

i had never had an air fryer and with all the reviews on facebook i thought i would try this one  it has definitely been a learning curve as far as time to cook certain items  but having said that it is very convenient does not take up much space on my counter and the food in general is quite tasty after being cooked in this  i am retired and there are just two of us here so the size is perfect  i would say that if you have a larger family that this might not be the one you re looking for  i don t know if they make one bigger but they do stand by their product and even if you have a large family you could use it for things like french fries side dishes hamburgers that sort of thing

i recently got the air fryer and was excited to try it out  i ve made chicken wings in it twice  my concern was that the chicken has a very distinct taste  that i m sure came from the fryer  i washed it before using it and removed all the plastics  but i was totally creeped out by it  i recently tried it again and left some for my wife without mentioning the taste issue to her to see what she said and she had made a similar comment without being prompted  soooooooo i m probably going to return if for a different brand on the positive side  it was super easy to use and clean

i love my     qt cosori air fryer   i use it for almost all my meals and was saddened when the top screw fell out of the removable basket   so i contacted cosori  they immediately responded asking for some additional information and sent me a replacement basket   unfortunately  the basket didn t fit properly  so i emailed them again and immediately adriana sent me an email telling me that they are sending me another replacement basket  that s customer service   i forgot to hit the submit button  so now i m adding a second experience with them   my unit was purchased on october           and the experience about the lost screw occurred in june of        now i m experiencing the air fryer turning off suddenly  and when i close the basket  it continues cooking for the remaining time   i wrote cosori thinking that since it s more than a year old  nothing would happen  but instead after sending them proof of purchase and an id number  elijah wrote back and said they are sending me a replacement unit   i love my air fryer and  use it all the time   i don t know if i ll have to check to see if i need to tighen the screws that hold the air fryer handle  to the basket  but perhaps they have fixed the issue   in any case  kudos to corsori customer service

i never thought i d want an air fryer after buying an instapot and never using it more than   times before reselling it  that being said  this air fryer life is addicting  holy cow  my husband keeps volunteering to cook with it too  which he normally never cooked unless it involved a pot of water  he even wants to but a second one and we haven t even owned it for   weeks  so we can cook the main meal and a side at the same time  i researched air fryers for a couple months on all different sites and am so happy i chose this one  i was a little unsure because i hadn t heard of the cosori brand before this bur the reviews were right  this one is awesome

i chose this air fryer based on my neighbor s positive experience with hers  and i am very pleased with my purchase  my initial frustration was similar to most users  which was the difficulty in getting the touch screen to respond  it took a handful of tries  but now i never have a problem with the buttons because i learned that the touchscreen only requires a light touch  most people  myself included  mash buttons on their electronics and this cosori air fryer does not like that  i use my air fryer everyday instead of the oven and get excellent  sometimes even better results  roasted potatoes and roasted brussel sprouts are way better in the air fryer  compared to my oven  i used the suggested settings in the included cosori recipe booklet and they come out perfect every time  for cubed  marinated baked tofu  i use the  shrimp  setting and they are a favorite at our house now  however  i prefer to use airfryercalculator com to manually adjust temperature and time for frozen foods i cook in this air fryer as i found the cosori presets made the food a bit too fried crunchy browned  i usually pick a preset on the air fryer that is closest to the temperature that i want to use and then adjust according to the online calculator  don t forget to flip or shake your food half way through cooking  i also love the  keep warm  setting to keep my foods hot and crispy  instead of taking it out and making things soggy  while i finish up the rest of my meal on the stove  cleaning is very straightforward  and i would also recommend checking the inside heating coil for any food particles that may have blown around during previous cooking to prevent creating a burning smell  i also suggest lining the drawer with aluminum foil before snapping the fryer basket inside to make clean ups even easier  this air fryer is great for the price point and i would certainly recommend this to the rest of my friends  and you too if you ve read this far

i received my air fryer            i loved the product until yesterday when before i preheated it  i opened the drawer as i always do to make sure its clean and ready to go  it looked great  then after it was preheated i opened the drawer to put the porkchops in there was a screw laying in the basket  i removed the screw and cooked my food anyways  after i was done cooking and the air fryer was cooled i went to clean it and there was another screw laying in the basket   it looks like it may be just from the handle but still this is ridiculous    not happy

okay  i m very new to air fryers but have wanted one for some time  finally got one as a gift from my boo  after checking out a video on youtube  i decided to buy the one the lady in the video was using to air fry fish  well one night  i decided to fry some fish in that bad boy and it was wonderful  the fish came out delicious and not at all greasy  the boo loved it  i loved it  we loved it  you will love it  the cosori air fryer is also very easy to clean and the baskets are a pretty good size  i put   large pieces of tilapia in there   i am thrilled i can fry food without worrying about the sound of my arteries clogging and make healthy meals for dinner  i m in air fryer love     happy birthday to me     thank you baby for the gift  i looveee you

i d heard about air fryers for a while but had never really looked into them before  i always found them to be synonymous with infomercials and didn t really think they could be very useful  then my wife started talking about how d she d been seeing her favorite food bloggers using them and how she thought she might like one i ended up getting this cosori for her b day and it s now her favorite kitchen appliance and mine  we eat a lot of chicken and the air fryer makes the best  fried  chicken i ve had and it s so incredibly simple  we typically add nothing but a little salt and press the chicken button and that s it  we ve made it for multiple friends and family members and have gotten raving reviews as well  we ve also done sweet potato fries  fresh broccoli  cauliflower  eggplant  and a few other veggies  we even tried making some cookies in it we ve transported it on multiple occasions as well  bumping it into things here and there and it s held up incredibly well besides the couple scuffs and scratches  the cleanup is incredible btw  so simple and quick  the nonstick surfaces on the tray make it super easy to quickly scrub and wipe down  one last thing i ll say is that i m glad we didn t go any smaller than this  it does take up a good chunk of counter space but it s nice being able to do enough in one batch to feed the   of us and then have some leftovers as well
touch control panel was defective   strong plastic chemical smell even after running thru dishwasher and wiping

i reluctantly bought this device because my wife insisted she wanted one  researched showed me this was a good mid size unit and it had some great features   like alexa integration  we got it  and i believe we have used it every day in one capacity or another  the normal stuff you would expect   like frying   works well  we found some frozen breaded shrimp that are good  some healthy frozen egg rolls  etc  we never take home left over french fries from a restaurant  but this will perk them  and onion rings  back up to their original flavor  we baked salmon in this device to perfection  preheat    minutes  let it set for   after cooking   and perfection  reheating bread is amazing  we have a nice italian restaurant that we will carry out from occasionally  but by the time we get home with the meal  the warm wrapped bread is soggy and yucky  preheat the air fryer for   minutes to      cook for about   minutes  and it is just like it came fresh out of the over i m a believer

first off let me say this was the first air fryer i owned  it works as you would expect and i did get a lot of cooking out of it over the year and a half but unfortunately that s no more  i went to pull out the tray after it was pre heated   out of nowhere the handle melted off from the tray itself i touched it  carefully of course   to make sure it didn t snap off or i missed used it in some way but the plastic was hot and can see where it began to warp  will follow up if there is a temporary fix to it because it would be really unfortunate to throw away such an expensive kitchen product so quickly with that said it cook great very easy to use i found that experimenting with the times and temps you will get better results than what was pre programmed into it didn t use all the functions mainly my own cooking times and temp so all the bells and whistles aren t that important  the cleaning i found to be very annoying the basket is easy and so is the drip tray but the basket walls are where you run into problems you can soak it scrub it spray it but the crevices are so narrow and so many you won t really get it      clean   that s okay to an extent because i will know myself that my products aren t completely clean i m not satisfiedif i can t fix the product myself then i  will not  be buying it again unfortunately just for it to happen again

having owned most of the other brands out there on the market  i must say that this cosori model is my favorite and the best working of all of them the non stick surface is so easy to clean and it even does not stick without adding extra non stick spray to the surface  the controls are very easy to use and react promptly when touched there are several features in this air fryer that i have not seen in others  my favorite would be  the frozen food button preset  if you select the frozen food preset you can adjust the time and temperature to your desire for your particular food type  once you press the start button  the food will begin to cook and halfway through the elapsed time  the machine will beep and remind you to turn the food  this provides for very even cooking  although i have found that certain items such as chicken wings i did not even have to turn and they browned on both sides efficiently if you want a great air fryer and don t want to go through    other brands before you find one that works for you  i would suggest buy this one first  it really is an awesome air fryer

took over   weeks to finally get here   they say the delivery is scheduled and you have to be here to sign for it   guy just randomly showed up and didn t want my signature   worked great   kids loved the fries and it didn t heat up the house   used it for the third time today and it quit in the middle of cooking   can t get it to work at all   don t waste your money on this piece of crap

i liked the size   i found a fried chicken receipt for an air fryer   i tried this fried chicken to the letter  but it was disappointing   at first  after reading the instruactions carefully i started to cook   i could not get it to turn on   i tried over and over  but no success   i called the number for the hot line for  help   after holding forever  i finally took my place to be called back   i never received a call back for help     finally  my grandaughter who is a good cook   offered to help   within a few minutes she had success  it came on and started cooking   the fried chicken was just ok   i found out the basket has to be pushed into place before it will start cooking   not in the instruction book at all

i purchased this air fryer at the end of october   i have only used it three times and on the third use it broke   we kept smelling something funny and couldn t figure out what it was  as the smell got worse we realized it was an electrical burning smell and quickly turned the machine off i am trying to contact someone about replacing this fryer and the only information provided is a web link that no longer works and a phone number where you sit on hold forever   i am disappointed in the product and the service  i wish i had paid more attention to the people that said this particular fryer broke very quickly

this air fryer has already exceeded expectations   logistics first   so easy to clean   fryer is very quiet you can barely tell it is on   controls are so easy to use   i like that you can set specific temperatures   it is not too big to fit on the counter and light enough to move around if needed   the basket holds a ton of food   other reviews talked about steam and puddles around machine   non existent   most steam i had come out was a little when cooking chicken and i think i added too much vegetable oil spray   no condensation on counters anywhere   i used the recipe book to make mozzarella sticks  chicken and the chocolate souffl  so far   loved them all   i highly recommend this air fryer   can t wait to perfect some recipes and try new ones

there s a bad plastic or chemical odor when using the cosori air fryer  we had to run it outside over   times to try and get the smell out  most of the smell went away after several runs but it still had a hint of the same odor  not only did it smell bad  it made some foods taste exactly like that odor  the air fryer was not as quiet as i expected  also  the bin appears to be cheaply made note  we got the cosori air fryer toaster oven and it s amazing    no smell  cooks amazing food  and super quiet   i highly recommend getting the air fryer toaster oven instead

today we received our cosori premium     qt air fryer   this is our first air fryer  and after doing extensive research on the internet and reading reviews for six plus months  we decided to purchase the cosori air fryer   ordered the extra assessories that they offered  and prepared a hot dog for my husband for lunch using the skewers   rack   he thought it was tasty  but commented there wasn t a lot of difference than in microwaving it   then i cooked up some french fries and they were crisp and perfect   the clean up thus far seems to be easy  and the operation and directions  simple and easy to understand   the unit seems sturdy and well made   there is a great cookbook that is included with your purchase and looks like we will enjoy trying out different recipes   there is only one disappointment for me  and that is  when cooking the french fries there is suppose to be a  shake reminder   this function did not work   other than that  we are thrilled with our cosori air fryer  and would definitely recommend this to anyone who is looking for an incredible air fryer   it s a great addition to any kitchen and one that we will use often

i literally use this thing for everything from making brownies to making meats  i even reheat things in it and it comes out crispy and juicy  i don t want to use my microwave  i never really liked them  or my conventional oven now that the weather is warmer  it s large enough to cook for my family of five in it and it doesn t take up too much space it get really hot when using it  there was a weird smell when i first turned it on but i just preheated it and washed it again  after it cooled  and it was gone  i put foil in it when i m feeling lazy so there no cleanup but i think it works best it u don t use anything other than a little oil because the air needs to get around the food and with the holes blocked at the bottom it can only make one side crispy at a time  that s fine with me when i don t feel like cleaning up

my husband did some online research before we bought an air fryer   this one is the one he settled on  so we ordered it   it worked perfectly for a couple of weeks  then the digital display went completely berserk   i contacted cosori directly through their customer service   i have to say i was very pleasantly surprised   they asked me to supply them with a few numbers off our fryer  and a picture of what the display looked like   that was it   i had a new one so quickly i couldn t believe it   this one has never had a hiccup   i cooks bacon better than anything i ve ever used   frozen onion rings  corn dogs for the grandkids   i love it   cleanup is so easy   the grease basin and the food tray come apart and they are both dishwasher safe   however  they are so easy to wash that i seldom put them in the dishwasher   one of the things i like best about it is that the frying tray is square   many of the air fryers i looked at had odd shaped trays   i am not a fan of kitchen gadgets   i don t like appliances lined up on my counter   this is an exception   i use it every day  so it is on my counter all the time   it s quite attractive  so i don t mind   if you are in the market for an air fryer please consider cosori   i m very happy with mine

i like everything about this air fryer except that my fries have an off taste  that i can t quite describe  slight chemical maybe   i have cleaned everything according to instructions several times  and still the strange taste persists  this is my second purchase of a cosori that i ve made based on the many great reviews  i noticed that another customer had a similar issue  so it is not just my opinion  i think it might be a defective lot  but i still like it  and hope other customers do not have this issue  because it performs well otherwise  i might try notifying the manufacturer

i just got this today  it appears to be very well made  i registered it online to get the extra   year warranty  it was easy to complete the information   i have used several air fryers and i love the way they cook   my concern is the basket  all the others i have had the coating comes off after just a very few uses  i am hoping this will not happen with this one   i will update my review after i have used the unit   with a warranty i am sure there will be no problems with the unit

this is a great air fryer to use  had it for over a year and mostly use it for salmon fries chicken related products  can definitely be used for a variety of different things  though cooking time will vary a lot  i wouldn t really recommend anything battered to be cooked in it since it takes a very long time to crisp up and doesn t taste as good as a deep fried  which is expected but was still worth a shot   once you find your preferred timing  the rest is simple with only   flip in between during the half way mark  my only complaint is that cleaning the basket by hand  great if you use a dishwasher though  the reason i give this a high rating is the customer support  my basket ended up breaking the handle and making it useless and i didn t sign up for the extended warranty as it was a gift to my mom and didn t see it  after contacting customer support  they were happily willing to send another replacement basket free of charge despite being out of warranty  i very much appreciate a company willing to work with the customer and stand by their products  hence why i highly recommend cosori as a brand  whether you get this one or a newer version

i love this fryer   it s easy to clean and easy to use   it gets the job done   my issue is a safety concern   every time we used the fryer  we would smell a strong plastic smell   we assumed this was from just  breaking the product in    then  one day  i decided to move the fryer to a different location in my kitchen   the fryer had been in front of the window blinds in my kitchen   the blinds melted from the heat being released from the rear of the fryer   i had never head this issue with the previous fryer i had in the same location   i looked at the manual and it only mentions to avoid sticking your hands near the ventilation area   i would there should be a warning in bold letters to not place the fryer in front of any materials that could melt or burn   i m assuming everyone is placing the fryer on a countertop in front of a wall of some kind   depending on the finish on that wall  this could be a huge fire hazard anyway  we moved the fryer to an area where we have a tile backsplash only   i m sad my blinds on my new house are ruined the product itself is great as long as you are mindful of what building materials are behind the fryer

i really really want to like this fryer  i just got it   days ago and was so excited to try it  i ve already tried to make kale chips  twice   bread  broccoli  french fries  and sweet potato fries  i hate to report that everything came out burned completely black  i tried the preset and then followed the recipe book and then tried just doing it on my own with half the temp setting and still everything is burned black  i haven t seen any other reviews about the food burning so i may have just gotten a bad fryer  i will be returning to amazon

your browser does not support html  video                          we use it almost everyday  it s easy to use  easy to clean  gives me fantastic fries  crunchy deep fried pork  and beautiful browned chicken update my cosori airfryer suddenly stopped working after two months of use after initially using is quite often  we slowed down to a once a week usage after a week or two as the novelty of deep fried food died down   while using it to prepare lunch the other day  it suddenly stopped working now it refuses to turn on unless the basket is held   i am very clean with my appliances and am a careful user  most of my machines and appliances work like new despite being a decade old   even the ones that people complain about not lasting long  our household usually manages to keep them running well  so this particular appliance  being only two months old and breaking down in such a short span of time is unacceptable
strong melting plastic oder when cooking  left food tasting   smelling of plastic  very loud fan  returning for refund
it s a mothers day gift so i have no idea how it works

these are the next best thing since a kuerig   so convenient so fast so easy to clean   forget the microwave for leftovers use this to reheat   the food tastes way better doesn t get rubberized or mushy   biggest thing to watch for is drying something out like bread  its easy to dry breads out   fix your stale chips in this it can be done   leftover french fries are now a thing  before i tossed them or gave them to the dogs   quesadilla  grilled cheese  steak  fish  bacon  bagels  all sorts of leftovers   for reheating and cooking i would recommend this over a microwave any day   a microwave can heat water better and faster  that s it   by by hotpocket sleeves if you use this  takes a little longer but you get an actual crispy hot pocket   play with the heat and times  the presets are just a general guide and won t work for everyones preferences   or quantities   haven t burned anything yet either the way this heats it takes a bit to burn something

i decided to give this air fryer a try due to its very high ratings on amazon and c net labelling it as the  best overall air fryer    i recall being conflicted on choosing the dial driven manual vs  touch button electronic version of this device due to quality concerns but opted to go with the touch one for preset convenience   i should have listened to my gut the first device came and only   of the    buttons worked   i looked up videos of other people operating the device and immediately knew mine was broken when i saw how easily others pushed each button and had the machine respond   thinking i just had some bad luck i contacted amazon and they sent me a replacement the next day   i didn t even unpack the next one completely before turning it on and trying the touch screen buttons to see if it worked as expected   this time   of the    buttons worked so i boxed it up and requested a refund one broken device is understandable as manufacturing issues occur sometimes  but two back to back makes me think this company doesn t have very good quality control standards   if you want to order this machine i would learn from my mistakes and go for the manual version  but personally i will be looking at a different company altogether for my air fryer   i feel you will be rolling the dice to see if you get a good product or a broken one with this company very disappointing

i have heard the hype about air fryers and had a delicious piece of salmon that was prepared in this brand and model  at a friend s house  i immediately ordered this air fryer  one of the buttons on the touch panel didn t operate correctly from the beginning and it was taking about double the amount of time both from recipe times and the pre sets i returned this after a couple of days of using it  pretty sure i was done with the air fryer  but  alas    it makes cooking much easier and it doesn t heat up the entire oven  kitchen  house  clean up is a sinch  food turns out pretty good i ordered another brand    times the cost      i look forward to seeing if it provides better results

update cosori customer service is amazing   they go above and beyond any other customer service i have ever seen   their awesome rep shirley reached out to me personally and is taking care of me   as i stated before   this product is amazing and it was a shame that the coating was coming off of my unit most companies would just shrug and go on with their day   but to have a rep reach out to me personally and offer a replacement that i was not expecting  no question   my family and i will stick with cosori for all kitchen gadgets and products going forward   having a company that truly cares about their customers  stands by their products  and want to make sure everything is right      this is a blessingwe love this fryer  and your company   cosori   shirley thank you  original post great fryer for the most part   would rate   stars but the coating on the fryer recently started to come off and we clean ours exactly how the company instructs you to do it s a shame because we love this fryer but have not had it long   why would the teflon coating flake off soo easily on the fryer bins   we have only had it for roughly   months and i fear it won t last which is upsetting because as i ve stated we really love this fryer cosori  maybe i got a model that wasn t coated properly

holy crap i finally stopped buying delivery food because of this  its so easy and you just have to make sure to rinse it out between uses and it stays pretty clean  i eat fresh french fries almost every day  and tuna melts    i ve never had tuna so melty  fried pickles  crisp and tasty  biscuits  just toss em in  flaky and gold without waiting forever for an entire oven to turn on  im in love  my boyfriend was very upset when i took it back home with me

when i finally decided to take the plunge  previous reviews convinced me that cosori was a very good choice  i have since made some very good meals  including eggplant  potato wedges and falafel  i m vegan  and oil free cooking is perfect   the only issue i have had is that it was difficult to remove the basket from the fryer when the cooking was done  after contacting customer service     hours later i was told a replacement basket was on its way to me  amazing service  not too many other companies have such immediate response time  did i mention you get a   year warranty

this a very nice product  i m very happy  but reasonably  a heads up  you need to take care of it too  the touchpad is sensitive to grime  you have to wipe it clean for it to detect touch  the wifi works well  but a hassle when you unplug the unit  need to activate the wifi and reconnect the device to the app every time  if you run into trouble  customer service is there  just give them time under the present circumstances  believe me  i have tested them too  overall it is very good  just don t ask for whats its not

love this beyond belief so far since i bought it two weeks ago  perfect  grilled  cheese was my first experiment and i was instantly sold  made two marinaded chicken quarters  best cost efficient chicken cut  that we re perfectly cooked with crispy skin  frozen waffle fries that i tossed in a little evoo and my mix of spices  came out of the air fryer and i felt like a pro  joked about how i should sell my fries because of how perfect they came out    highly recommend  first air fryer experience and i loved it  single guy who lives in an apartment  thought it would be a huge device and kill my limited counter space  it fits nicely and it s so light and portable i just move it around easily if i need the room  perfect

this air fryer is easy to use and has become a daily fixture in our kitchen  it has held up well to daily use with the exception of one thing  the original inner basket that came with it gave me problems  the screws kept backing out of the handle making for a dangerous situation anytime i lifted moved it  i was constantly tightening the screws  at one point the basket got knocked off the counter and the clips that hold the inner basket into the outer basket broke off so i had to replace it anyway  the new inner basket has given me no trouble whatsoever so i m not sure if the one i originally had was defective or what  despite all that  i recommend this air fryer  it has a large basket that holds a lot of food at one time  i m able to cook for my family of   in it  it is so much easier than heating up my oven and my family prefers the taste of the food from the air fryer

first i have to say cosori s customer service is amazing   i bought this air fryer in july and the buttons were very difficult to push  then a couple weeks ago the door stopped closing  i loved it  i just couldn t deal with the button issue and once the drawer stopped closing  i definitely needed a new one  but i was past the return exchange window with amazon  so i emailed them about the issues    days ago  not realizing they are based in ca  when i found out  i figured it d be a while before i heard back because of the wildfires  i was wrong   they responded in   hours   and within   days had a new air fryer in the mail to me   i got my new one a couple days ago and it works great   i love it and am so excited to get back to cooking in it   buy this fryer    it s fantastic and the company is phenomenal

we were really happy with the product   only until recently did we realize we should have been able to use it manually  the control panel never worked   we were only able to use the wifi app  which was great until we upgraded our wifi   couldn t reconnect it we ve been in contact with cosori   hope to replace the product  we re pretty sure it s a short in the control panel that was always there why would we want another you ask it cooked perfectly   was easy to clean  i have a breville smart oven that i love but the air fryer option is so messy  it s not worth using  the other air fryers look too cumbersome this product was big enough for a family of     small enough to easily store the wifi app is nice  especially with working from home  the recipes they give are also phenomenal i can only imagine getting one that keeps working

as octagenarians  my husband and i are getting a little decrepit   we like to cook but don t want to have to stand over the stove all the time   this little oven is the best thing since sliced bread   we have had it for a week and have used it all but one day   it works exactly as the book says it will   we had salmon in it and it was just like pan fried   ham great   chicken breast great   doing pork chops tonight and have no fear  that they might not taste great   baked potatoes in july   no problem and they were better than oven baked we have found that if you read the instructions completely the oven works great   let s face it  this is a small convection oven   it is not an oil deep fryer   before you get it read the questions and answers   we learned a lot of valuable tips  the best being not to put it in the dishwasher   warm water and dish soap are all you need   always preheat  cosori tells you that for a reason and your results will be better those little aluminium cake and loaf pans you buy in the market work great in this we have a lot of good cooking ahead of us and this little appliance will sure make it easier

before anything else  i bought this product about a year ago and have been using it happily since  it works amazingly and cooks food perfectly with the pre set settings  fully frozen chicken breasts get cooked in no time and i have an easy and healthy dinner now then  onto the customer support experience  i had to deal with them twice so far  first happened on day one  i had a rare issue of the product being defective  i unpacked it and cleaned it as directed  plugged it in  and it turned on  then      minutes later  it would just power down for no reason and not come back on  using their book i figured out it was over heating for some unknown reason as if i let it cool down for a half hour or so  it would turn on and go back to  working seemingly like normal then after another   minutes of trying to pre heat  would shut off again  i was upset and decided to try calling the cosori customer support rather than going through amazon  the people at their support center worked with me for a few minutes trying to diagnose the problem and came to the conclusion  it was defective  they immediately offered me a replacement and sent it out    day shipping  completely free of charge as they should  the key here is they didn t try to accuse me of breaking the thing  or anything else  they did everything they could to help then when they couldn t they offered to make it right  the new one arrived and has been working flawlessly  until today  during regular cleaning a screw fell out of the basket  when i tried to see where the screw was supposed to go  a nut fell out of the handle as well  i m assuming the screw went into the obvious hole in the basket  and locked into that nut which was buried somewhere inside the handle  the issue here is there s no easy way to put this nut back into place  i couldn t take the handle apart past a certain point  and the nut had to be inserted inside the handle somewhere for the screw to then attach  i called cosori support again and explained my issue hoping they could just walk me through putting the thing back together as i figured they must know a way  after hearing what i said they didn t even bother trying to fix it  just apologized for the the basket breaking and offered to send me a replacement basket   i was stunned and agreed  i received an email from them   provided my order details  and my replacement basket will be on the way soon   these people bend over backwards to help you and stand by their product and its so rare to find a company willing to do that  this product alone worked great  but whats really selling me on their brand is their customer support  i can safely buy their stuff and know its going to work right  and if it doesn t they are going to work with you and do everything they can to make it right   cannot recommend them enough and will continue to buy cosori products in the future

i used the cosori air fryer approximately   times when it just stopped working completely   i have contacted support so will report back   very disappointed at this point though   would have given it   stars if it hadn t broken down okay   editing this review because cosori is sending me a new air fryer   they requested a short video showing issue and proof of purchase which was easy   customer support contacted me within   days and acted on return within   day   stay tuned i received the new air fryer in   days and it s working great   customer service contacted me to see if everything was working okay and i was satisfied   i give their customer service   stars   i love this fryer and am trusting it was just a fluke that the first one broke down
