this works better than advertised  thank you respectfully  charles e  duvall davperm sp  us army viet nam              th  transportation co  red ball express

we had a smaller ninja fryer we loved  built like a tank and easy to use and clean  we saw this unit as we needed somersetting a  little bigger and with all the good reviews ordered it  the unit feels a little cheap  maybe it is the fingerprint proof plastic coating  the controls are not as granular around timing as the ninja  the cooking baskets also come across cheap and rough making cleaning by hand difficult  the coatings on the basket as not as non stick as the ninja  in the end it gets the job done  but i don t see this as a long term ownership as we will likely look at other alternatives in a  few months

this is hands down my new best friend in the kitchen  as someone who cooks pretty much every meal this is a life savor  just throw your ingredients in   bam great tasting food  i ve made duck breast  burgers  fries  bacon  orange chicken  i ve used this everyday since i got it  everything comes out perfectly done  healthy    flavorful  easy to use  easy to clean    awesome recipe book  i would recommend to use this far away from the wall as this puppy throws some heat out the back  also she s a bit loud   sounds like a rocket is about to take off from your counter  other than that this thing is a beast   gets the job done

i have had this machine for about   weeks now and i love it   it revitalizes left overs   giving a crispiness that cannot be achieved in the microwave and you do not have to heat your entire oven to warm a few things   the   min pre heat is an excellent feature which i could not find on many competitor models   last night my    year old son cooked tomato  provolone  and basil stuffed chicken breasts    they were tender and juicy in a way i have never gotten from cooking in the oven and they took a fraction of the time to cook  the large basket size allows for easy cooking for my family of   with room to spare   i am still learning the settings  but i am more comfortable with it after every use   i could see this replacing not only my deep frier but my oven for many meals  it has a smaller footprint than my current     gallon deep frier and i think it will get a coveted counter top storage place as i can see us using it so much that it would be pointless to keep putting away   very happy with this purchase

my husband has been asking me to buy an airfryer for years  thought it was just  another gadget   received one for christmas   surprise     guess who from   no judgement   received some beautiful jewelry  cologne and clothes and more as well lol  love it so much   i threw out my huge  hard to clean  toaster oven to make room for this  can make toast in if   if you want  fried chicken comes out beautiful  crispy and juicy  bacon   perfect  everything comes out great  i usually google what food i want to cook in an air fryer and get times   temps  no guessing bought the white one   very  very nice looking on countertop  very  very easy to clean  just love it

well the   meals we were able to cook turned out great  unfortunately the unit now will not stay on for an entire cook cycle  it s as if it heats up and has an auto shutoff then will not power on again until it has cooled off  it s basically worthless at this point  and to top things off the customer support link on amazon to the manufacturer sends to a webpage that no longer exists  won t buy this brand again

i had to return it after first use  the instructions do warn that there is a burnt smell of plastic the first few usages  prodect is lined with a teflon type of coating like most cooking materials but they do not warn you that it is so pungent and horrible that the entire house reeks of plastic burning  makes you wonder if it is healthy for our food to be touching the plastic coated lining

the reviews by others is correct  this is the easiest and best air fryer  first made spicy party chicken wings  which turned out great  i need to learn the other setting because the french fries where a little to crispy and hard   my fault    ha ha  franks and sausages came out perfect as if they were grill on a bbo grill  next week i will try to make crispy fried chicken  anyway this air fryer will eliminate my other gagets           update       i ve had the fryer for   weeks now  and it is better then my other devices  the cooking time on some food items  vary a lot  the recipe book photo are very professional so don t have that expectation  yours will look that  good        ok     be prepare for trial and error for cooking times on some items  finally the disappointing issue     the basket with the vents at the bottom and sides are very hard to clean  especially the side vents  i don t use any abrasive material to clean it and i don t have a dishwasher  hand washing with dish soap  even letting it sit in hot water over night  does not help to clean the side vents  because of the difficult time to clean the inner basket  i need to lower the rating  it is a good fryer and probably better then most fryers  but the effort to clean it is a challenge

i ve been cooking up a storm with this thing  fries  fried chicken  heating up pizza slices  salmon    this thing is so great  it cooks food very evenly  salmon skin comes out super crispy  which is the best way to eat them imo  easy to clean  can hand wash or stick the buckets in the dish washer

i was looking to replace my previous air fryer  which i really loved  because it began smoking and acting up  i did a lot of research and i kept coming back to the cosori  which already had some really good reviews  i almost bought the brand i previously had  sorry  brand escapes me at the moment  because i really did like it   but i am so glad i went with this one  i like the square shape instead of the oval one from before    it cooks great   and cleans up so easily  i highly recommend this brand and model  and if you are new to air frying  you are going to fall in love with this  and do not for a moment think it is just an air  fryer   you can use this to reheat everything from meats to sandwiches  and whenever i get chinese take out  with egg rolls  etc   i place the egg rolls in this for     minutes and it heats and crisps them up incredibly well     just like getting them fresh at the restaurant  i obviously i could go on and on   so  what are you waiting for  order it now

it worked reaaly great the healf dozens times i used it i bought this because my dad had heart problems but he died before i could even give it to him  so i honestly forgot about it then i had a heart attack and am having to watch whati eat  i remembered i had this so i opened it up and it worked wonderfully for about   uses now it will not stay on as the connection from the bsket to the unit will not stay put keeps disconnecting and turning the power off completely  its is very frustrating i have to give it one star because i had it for a couple years but never put it to use and then when i need it to work itdoesnt for long

so i love using the airfryer  it is my favorite cooking appliance now     but that makes it worse that the handle snapped off of the basket   this must be a common design flaw because even though it is in warranty there are no replacement baskets available from the manufacturer and even amazon only has used baskets for sale as for the airfryer  it cooks well and cleans up very easily digital touch screen is annoying  i can see why the manual knobs option has come back   the buttons have a delay between touching it and changing the settings so something as easy as changing the temp and time is bothersome  you have to go through temp to get to time  the app on the phone works well  and is good for alerting you if you are running the fryer and leave the room   the app also has good recipes and is easier to use than the digital display to set temp and time

first one worked fine unless it ran for more than    minutes  then it made a clanging sound  contacted cosori   sent them a video of it running  within four days i had a brand new one delivered to me   it runs perfectly  i love roasted veggies   steak is perfect in     min  cooks pork chops in    min that are so moist   tender   reheats leftovers in only a couple minutes   they aren t soggy like from the microwave  i m still learning it  but am having so much fun  i don t care for the presets  it s easier for me to program what i want  but overall it s a fantastic machine   cosori cust service was great

i cook     in my cosori air fryer       stove  oven    microwave   love this thing   wish i d  known about it a long time ago    can preheat it  then throw my son s french toast sticks in for   mins on a busy morning    boom   bfast   pizza reheats like a dream   dumplings  burgers    bacon all crisp up super nice   of course the restaurant leftovers  including fries taste like they were made fresh again   it sounds cliche  but this machine is life changing for our family   made some amazing bacon wrapped tomato   asparagus   getting ready to try spring rolls soon   the only oil i ever used  was a bit drizzled on the fresh russet fries   that was mostly for a bit of seasoning flavor   the  shake   flip food feature that beeps part way through cooking is genius   helps it all get really crispy   can t wait to start using my baking accessories for it   the racks are so darn handy to keep food from sticking to foil i lined in my fryer basket   so worth another appliance taking up counter space     can t live w out it now

i love the air fryer itself  but after about   months of medium use  the controls on the machine stopped working  thank god for the app and or echo that allows me to control it or else i would have to throw it out  regardless  it is a pain to have to control this device using my smart phone instead of just pressing the buttons

i ve used this air fryer the past week  and right from the start it had issues  the time temp touch button doesn t seem to work well  have to press it like   times  and you use it alot to set the cooking temp and time  also  there is a strong plastic smell after the first cooking  a week later and the unit continues to produce a burned plastic smell that stays in the house for hours  as far as cooking  we done a variety of food  including steak  and i ve noticed that most foods don t get done well inside and isn t nice and hot  even though it s done on the outside  i don t have this issue when using the oven range or outside grill  for the price  i would expect better cooking results  the touch pad to work for all buttons  and not a burning plastic smell  what s interesting is that other reviews have said the same issues with the touch pad and plastic smell  so i m returning this and may look to try another brand

oh my goodness  i am astounded by how awesome this thing is  the first recipe i tried with this air fryer is one of my favorites but is also one of the most temperamental  i love fried tomatoes but as anybody knows  unless they are green  then the tomatoes often fall apart in the cooking process  i am entirely impressed with how well this device performed  the tomatoes came out absolutely perfect with a golden crust and not overcooked in the middle  i also decided to throw in some fresh basil to see what happens  and it came out as a wonderful crispy topping  i highly recommend this air fryer because it has outperformed my expectations

i got this for my son for christmas  he s     he loved it  he likes to cook and bake  it s a nice treat when he makes recipes from the booklet that came with it  the whole family enjoys eating the food he makes with it  it is easy to set up  operate and clean  he uses the parchment liners  so clean up is very quick  i didn t get the accessories that are universal and i don t think i will  they look like added kitchen clutter that would be used once and be annoying to clean  we have a tiny kitchen and have very limited space for kitchen stuff   like   or   cabinets that aren t huge for all of our kitchen cooking baking food storage items  so if you have a small kitchen you really gotta love this appliance  because it does take up space and create heat  we just plug it in and put it on the glass stove top usually  so the heat is in an area that is already made for it  we haven t tried it out on the counter yet  so be aware that if you put it on the counter  the hot air comes out the back  after he wipes it down and dries it  he just tucks it away in the cabinet when he s done with it   as far as noise goes  it does generate noise but it isn t any louder than when we use the kitchen exhaust venthood  we have had it in use weekly since christmas  so time will tell how long lasting it is  look forward to trying new recipes with it

right from the first day i loved the cooking ability of this cooker however i didn t like the handle and plastic clamp   we ve used the fryer about   time   today  would have been    but i started the machine and was talking to my kids when the tray auto ejected from the machine   i was standing near so i instinctively reached for the tray in mid air   it seared my left index finger so bad by the time i turned my hand over i had  nd degree burns   the inside tray crashed on the floor sending our last batch of chicken nuggets  kids lunch  onto the floor   not only did it ruin our lunch it burnt my hand so bad i am typing this with one hand   needless to say this device has flaws that need fixed   wasted

update from   months later  still using this air fryer every day  it s so durable  but even so i take very good care of it to keep it that way  i hand wash the basket after every use and only put in the dishwasher once a month to keep the stainless coating intact  i also bought parchment filters that work great on baked goods especially  so happy with my purchase    i love this air fryer so much  i use it every single day  i make egg bites or french toast sticks for breakfast  chicken nuggets and fries for lunch  and lamb meatballs or pizza for dinner  it makes dessert too  easy quick chocolate chip cookies i had an instantpot brand air fryer before this and was disappointed how the top rack burned the food and the bottom rack didn t cook at all  this cosori air fryer has never caused me this issue  it s truly a wonderful appliance

bought this as a birthday gift for the wifey  second day  she cooked baby back pork ribs  she messed it up a bit by running it twice  the second time overcooked it a bit  but   i got to clean the two pans and man  the amount of fat and grease was just obscene  this machine removes all of that artery clogging gunk and leaves it in the pans   try it yourself  leave the pans in cold air i cannot recommend this cooking device any higher than this  i don t ever recommend online  but i will make an exception  i will only eat meats cooked by this machine hence forth

got this for my husband  he loves it  in fact he can t stop talking about what he wants to make   he uses it   or   times a week to cook dinner or breakfast  he says it is very easy to clean  he likes it because he doesn t have stovetop splatters to clean up like when he uses a frying pan  i like it because he uses less oil when he cooks  i also love that he likes using it so much it does take getting use to and it s easy to over cook items if you aren t careful but after some use you will learn how to judge time on cooking  we found timing charts and used them to learn how long to cook items best asparagus we ve ever had

i originally had a philips air fryer for years  i wanted something bigger so i came across cosori on amazon  the smart feature sounded so nice so i bought it  the first one i received  the touchscreen did not work at all  it worked only on my iphone so i returned itso i placed another order but they sent me a totally different model  i returned it again so i ordered it again telling myself this has to be the last time  touchscreen works but now it won t connect to my iphone  the wifi signal kept turning on and off        the food comes out delicious but i am totally annoyed by the fact that their product is partially broken every time i got a replacement buy something else  the smart feature sounds nice but it does not work anyway    not worth your time to try and return

i enjoy the recipe book   i have cooked steak  fish  chicken wings  hard boiled eggs  french fries  tater tots    this has not disappointed us   we love the food without all of the grease there are lots of recipes on the internet cleaning is fairly easy   we put it in the dish washer   the sides can be a little difficult to clean by hand

so far  i am really loving my new cosori   it cooks well and quickly and the clean up is a cinch when you put tin foil in the bottom drawer   i ve made chicken wings  steak and fish and all came out  well   i like my steaks medium so i cooked it a bit longer  but the  flavors  moistness  etc  have been great   i was afraid it would be just another clunky appliance taking up valuable countertop real estate in my small kitchen  but it is proving itself to be worthy of the space   i m beginning to wonder if i will ever need to wash a cooking dish  or use my oven stovetop again

this is my  th airfryer   my first was the gowise gw       th gen which would be my  nd favorite but it didn t fit as much in the basket because it was round and the teflon came off pretty quickly   gave it to my son   then i decided to go big and get the gowise usa     quart   in   gw        it was big and expensive but it filled my house up with smoke and fat globules when i cooked bacon and i had to open the doors and windows   the timer also didn t work correctly   i returned it and got the cosori because of the reviews and price   i have had it for about   months now and i couldn t be happier   it has a nice sized square basket that you can place more food in with more surface area to crisp it   i have cooked lots of items in it and am very happy with the results   steaks are phenomenal     well so is the hamburgers and chicken with a great mallard affect but still moist in the middle   bacon is amazing and cleanup is a breeze   i enjoy the fries and have even made an impressive and delicious calzone with a ww   ingredient dough that was the best i have eaten anywhere   enjoy this air fryer immensely   the last air fryer i got was the ninja which also is pressure cooker etc   i do enjoy this as well but cooking surface is much smaller and so prefer the corsori over the ninja if all you are looking at is the air fryer   get a instant pot with it and you ll be happy and have all the latest kitchen gadgets that makes preparing meals easy and flavorful

after unboxing and cleaning the buttons weren t responding to my button presses  after less than a minute on hold a very helpful customer support person listened to my story and asked for a short video showing what i was doing  along with proof of purchase so she could process a replacement order  she was very professional and nice about it eventually i figured out that using my thumb pad instead of a regular index finger tap made the buttons work properly and since then the air fryer has worked flawlessly

edit   update  the seller is sending me a replacement interior basket for my fryer  good job guys  thank you  i love this air fryer but    months after purchasing it  the handle melted and broke  waiting to hear if they ll replace it bacon tastes the best when done in this fryer  vs  pan or oven   it makes the most gorgeous  roast chicken i ve ever seen  burgers are outstanding  honestly who needs a grill  i d love to have one but this air fryer makes up for it   steaks come out great as well  i ve made a lot of fries with it lol  and the other day i made chicken nuggets for the first time pizza  i haven t perfected making pizza but it s outstanding for heating up pizza  it tastes better than it does when it first comes from the pizza shop the food always comes out yummy

ok i don t know what to do i open my new cosori air fryer yesterday washed it  the food cane out looking delicious fast but when it was time to eat the food tastes like plastic   how do i get rid of that smell i dont want to return it but if the smell continues i cant keep it

absolutely love this appliance   country fried steak and fried green tomatoes are healthier   bacon  yum   potato skins  awesome   i usually cook my filet mignon by browning on the stovetop and finishing in the oven   which smokes up the house and sets off smoke detectors   no more of that   my filets are perfect in this air fryer   rare takes     minutes tops   the perfect compliment to this is this olive oil sprayer which looks nice on the counter with my stainless appliances   misto brushed aluminum oil sprayer   https   www amazon com dp b     spzv ref ppx pop mob ap share

after reading many great reviews  i decided the cosori air fryer max xl was the air fryer for me  i love the square basket that gives you room for air frying lots of food at one time  the coated surfaces are very easy to clean  i read all the instructions before starting including running the fryer first to get rid of any  new  smell it might put out  i have had no problem with any bad smell at all from the newness of the machine  i am a newbie at this  so i learned quickly that i need to pause during cooking to check food or shake it since i way over cooked my first chicken strips   i have cooked roasted potatoes  breaded okra  chicken and even a meatloaf  which was really delicious  i look forward to using it daily to cut time in the kitchen and make healthier meals

i wanted an air fryer for a long time but couldn t decide if i would really use it or was it just going to be a novelty  after reading up on them and speaking friends who have them  i decided that it was time for me to experience the joy of an air fryer  i did my research and read alot of reviews for all different fryers but i decided that the cosori air fryer   unfortunately i had ordered the wi fi one and was having  difficulty getting it to work   a problem that i believe has been taken care of on all the new ones   i called the greatest customer support team and told them my problem  they apologized and quickly sent me a brand new one  i have never had service that quick  cosori has a year warrentee which becomes  a two year if registered within two weeks   others only had    warrentee  i use my air fryer at least   times a week  it makes great baked potatoes  fish  chicken  vegetables  frozen foods and amazing bacon  it is very simple to clean and use  i would highly recommend the cosori air fryer  the delivery was timely and packed very well

this air fryer is awesome  size of the basket is great   i can fit   decent size pork chops  besides the size of the basket the other thing i love is that it cooks evenly and the flavor of the food  is perfect  it s a no brained to use the functions  i use it every single day for cooking meat  making desserts and cooking veggies  i rarely use the stove now   oh and i m eating in a few minutes of putting in the food  cleaning is a  breeze  if you re looking for an excellent air fryer   i highly recommend this one

my brother in law has this model and cooked something for us   i thought it was great  so i purchased one for myself   i got to use it one time and had to return it   the basket wouldn t latch rendering it useless i boxed it up  sent it back and they were going to send me a replacement   when i looked at it today i found that the air frier was     cheaper   they refused to credit me     so i had them cancel the replacement and refund my money

just received it i saw the amazon driver toss the box but good thing it does have styrofoam on the inside so it was protected as far as i can see  it looks really nice and it s not as heavy  i did have trouble pressing the buttons i had to press it many times to change the settings  maybe i was doing it wrong  it was kind of annoying  but i made fries and they came out pretty great  will be using more hopefully it does last  i did put warranty hopefully if anything goes wrong the cosori team will be able to help me  update months later i was able to replace my airfryer because i was still having trouble with the buttons  they were lagging a lot  the cosori team were very helpful  i just received it and tested it out  the buttons are perfectly responsive   thanks so much    starts for cosori

we ve had our air fryer less than a month and i m using it almost every night to cook our dinner  i wasn t familiar with using an air fryer  but the booklet that came with the fryer was easy to follow  i bought the larger size      qt   even though there are just two of us  my reasoning was that we sometimes cook additional food in order to have leftovers and  secondly  because i wanted to be able to cook enough to feed our daughter as well when she comes over the first meal i cooked was thick lamb chops  i marinated them a bit and easily fit all four in the fryer  i followed the cooking time in the recipe book and they were absolutely perfect  browned on all sides  exactly the right temperature  tender  and delicious  next  vegetables  i usually roast them in the oven and get them super crispy and browned  i was skeptical the fryer would be able to replicate this  but i was wrong  brussels sprouts  asparagus  broccoli  squash  all perfect  another outstanding meal was boneless chicken breast  dredge in a little panko and flour  egg wash  and into the fryer  no oil needs  but did spray the breasts with pam   they were incredibly moist and wonderful  also did chicken wings  another winner  salmon  halibut  no problem cleanup is very easy  we do not put ours in the dishwasher  the basket and tray are very easy to wash out  i use the recipe book that comes with the fryer as well as a couple of others i ordered online  i supplement with an internet search when i don t see what i want in one of the books  of the books i have  i think the book that came with the fryer is pretty good  i highly recommend this air fryer

the reason i am only given this one star is because i wanted to alert everybody if they are buying this for a christmas gift  or if you are buying any other gift from amazon  early due to the pandemic thing twice  you only have    days to return it to amazon  otherwise you have to deal with the manufacturer  i just went through this with another product and now i am screwed  i now have a product that doesn t work and i m stuck with it  i bought this air fryer plus one of those hydroponic gardens which were going to be for gifts because of the early sale  however  unless you plan on opening them and using them out and trying them before christmas and gift giving them  the person you were giving them to will be stuck with dealing with the manufacturer of the product and good luck with that  word of warning do not buy anything    days longer than you intend to give it  the gifts i bought just now became mine

i wasn t sure which air fryer i wanted to purchase when i decided to purchase one  i had seen a couple of videos of people reviewing cosori products and they gave them great reviews  so  i decided on the cosori  i bought on the prime membership  two day sale and got it at a great price  i was impressed as soon as i opened the box  a very nice cookbook with plenty of recipes  i purchased a cook book  but the one that came with the fryer was more impressive to me  then a deal to receive an extra year warranty  the fryer was so easy to use and to clean  we made chicken legs in it twice and the taste is great  crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside  delicious  i always stated that i would not ever buy an air fryer because i have so many kitchen gadgets and appliances  i am so glad i changed my mind and purchased this one  thanks  cosori  for a great product

wife was a bit skeptical about air frying  coconut shrimp was excellent  halibut  chicken thighs   sweet potato fries also turned out well  really appreciate how easily the nonstick basket cleans up  perfect for two retired folks

i bought this product in september      and as of november      it s stopped working   it started randomly shutting off and officially today i can t eat my dinner because it s not working     months and i cannot return it  cannot contact the seller and out        don t waste your money

all i can say is this air fryer is great  i had a previous air fryer that i returned because it was too complicated and did not work right for me  amazon s rating system is wonderful  after i returned the first air fryer  i started looking again and this time i paid close attention to the ratings  this product has over        ratings  something to be said about the product  thank you amazon  the best feature on this fryer is the size of the fryer  smaller  but most importantly is the size of the fryer basket  where all the work is done  the basket is great   the other day  i cooked three huge breaded chicken thighs with room for another if needed  yesterday i cooked    bacon wrapped shrimp in the basket  recipe is in the cookbook that came with the fryer   all i can say is two things  thank you corsori and amazon

we ve had this air fryer for a couple of months and are very pleased with it  large size and preheat feature are great  only negative is that the nonstick coating chipped after the first few uses  we are always careful to use utensils designed for a nonstick surface  and to hand wash it with nonstick safe sponges  we hand wash it after every use  we would give it five stars if we didn t have this issue with the nonstick coating

so far    so very  very good   it felt as if i d waited for generations to purchase an air fryer  thus i took the purchase of one very seriously  i m so proud that i took my time in researching brands  and prices   this cosori has added a new dimension to my kitchen cooking    actually i ve only begun to explore and dig in to actually reading and deciding on some of the recipes feature in it s accompanying cookbook     but am having a blast simply cooking basics in it   i m definitely on a learning curve   i started out very basic by simply cooking up some seasoned frozen hamburger patties  and they turned out excellent  nom  nom   i definitely signed up for the extended warranty  but i feel that i may not need to use it   no issues at this point  with my cosori  it is easy enough to clean  but i did go ahead and purchase some parchment paper mats for its pan  as a way of protecting the pan  because i want to keep my air fryer in tip top shape   i do follow all the instructions concerning it  and make sure that it s has room around it for it to  breathe  and not become overheated   all in all  i really don t know why i waited as long as i did to finally treat myself to an air fryer   the experience with it being a cosori    has been an uber pleasant one  so much to the point that i am looking into some of their other appliances  too

i liked using this air fryer   it s easy to use and easy to clean   after   months a screw fell out of the basket   i found a replacement screw and tightened the old ones and the new one and all was well   today the basket that fits in the fryer tray is stuck   the mechanism that releases the basket from the fryer tray broke   i can t find any way to take it apart to see if i can fix it   so  i guess this is really just a rental   you pay about      per year to use it  then you throw it away and but a new one

looking for a way to enjoy all the foods i love in a healthier way  i had been curious about the air fryer for a long time  i first ordered a smaller one and sent it back  there was just no way  unless your single to make all the great recipes and food  so glad we ordered a large one  i was worried that i was just buying into another kitchen appliance that would not get used as much as it should and take up space  i use my air fryer several times a week   more than almost all my appliances  i have not had one thing i haven t loved  it enhances the flavor of everything  there is nothing better than homemade french fries  and they come out just as good as when i use to deep fry them in oil  all frozen food items are better  the uncooked tortillas from costco  egg rolls  wings  i could go on and on  and i m not even following new recipes  i m just making the foods i ve always made  better cons are it s large  and it smells  not that the smell is bad  it just smells like an oven  i just didn t expect such a strong smell coming from a smaller appliance great buy  fan for life

awesome machine to cook your cravings in a healthier way  my wife is pregnant and she is keeping her weight on track with this machine  it has perfectly cooked our chicken  empanadas and sausages  very happy with the product and would recommend    spanish   excelente m quina para cocinar tus antojos de una forma saludable  mi esposa est  embarazada y esta m quina le ha permitido mantener su peso  la m quina ha cocinado nuestras empanadas  pollo y salchichas a la perfecci n  totalmente recomendado

there is not one thing i dislike about this air fryer  the size is perfect and it is actually much faster than other air fryers  take a bit of time o get used to it  but  once you do you will love this brand plus i have lost weight since the only oil i use is out of a spray bottle it is awesome  fun to cook again

first of all i did so much research to buy the right air fryer because i wanted an easy to clean  non stick  hassle free air fryer  the only difficult part was taking all the plastic out and separating the trays  it doesn t explain how to exactly put the trays back together  or which tray gets screwed to the handle  yes  you need to remove screws in order to get a layer of plastic out from underneath the tray  and to screw the tray to the main handle  everything else was extremely easy  cooking is simple  comes with a recipe booklet  comes with easy to read instructions  as long as you keep it clean  its great very important  well in my opinion   is to do the test run as it states in the manual  great investment     air fryer bestseller on amazon   definitely worth the bucks

the design of this unit is very thoughtful and pleasing  i particularly like     the angled  and intuitive to use control panel  and    the essentially square shape of the basket s   which makes it possible to cook fairly large items   my only slightly negative comment relates to the  operating manual    as a person who previously did very little cooking  it would have been helpful to me if the manual included more information guidance re recommended temperatures and cooking times  for example  what temperature and cooking time is appropriate for a small ham  a salmon filet  a fish filet  etc

size  it s not to big or small  you can use amazons virtual feature to see if it fits where you want to put it  the basket is a great size  i was able to fit    chicken legs in with comfort and cooked perfectly cleaning  cleaning the outside is as simple as taking a clean sponge or clorox wipes or whatever you use and wiping down real quick  cleaning the internal cubby where the basket goes is easy as well  quick wipe and all clean  recommend using cleaning wipe  omg the basket is dish washer safe  but if you don t have dishwasher  use rubber sponge or non abrasive sponge to clean it up   so you don t scratch it   takes about   min to clean  super easy cooking  you don t need egg  flour wash  if you want good fried food  if you do  it just comes out even better  i made pork chops and bacon  soooo good  as you see  super crispy and omg so juicy  when cooking in it  it keeps the meat juicy all the way through but nice crispness ease of use  super easy  instructions and recipe book are huge help   there are so many recipes to try  unfortunately   you may have to screw in the screw tight once or twice because it comes loose  the wifi one is amazing   i can preheat my food or start it all from my app  so nice when i m trying to vlean ir study and don t want to burn food or over cook it  lol great for weightloss    lbs down  overall  i would by again and recommend

this air fryer is easy to use and makes great tasting fried food but there are some flaws  in order to thoroughly clean the basket  you need to unscrew three screws  they help hold the draining tray and basket together   none of the reviews mentioned that and i was extremely disappointed to find out about this when i received the product  also  beware that when you initially use the air fryer  it will release a plastic smell  which is apparently normal    the plastic smell will disappear after a few usages but just so you are aware before you purchase the product

this is a really great appliance  we ve had other air fryers in the past  but moved to this one due to its size  this unit is able to cook evenly and thoroughly  we opted for the wifi version which  in my opinion seems a bit useless  we ve used it a few times  but at the time of purchase  it was the cheaper option for some reason  fast forward to   months later  we accidentally dropped the basket  and the lower basket assembly broke  we contacted the company to purchase a replacement basket  and they shipped one to us at no charge  really great customer service  without a doubt  would recommend this appliance

this is the best counter appliance i ve ever bought and i ve bought more than i care to admit  the only negative is that it s a big black box on our kitchen counter and so the attractive feature is a little less than ideal but that said  it s super lightweight and easy to move to the pantry shelves when company comes over apparently this model is larger than most which is great and cleaning couldn t be easier  you just pull out the non stick basket and either pop in the dishwasher or clean with a quick rinse  takes less time than it would to clean a roasting pan  so far i ve baked chicken breasts  with skin  without skin  breaded  non breaded   toasted bread  roasted baby carrots and green beans and brussel sprouts  sausages  baked potatoes  and made regular and sweet potato fries  all of it has turned out perfectly  the chicken moist  the french fries crispy on the outside and fluffy on the inside  the veggies all with a nice dark brown roast like we prefer  even the chicken breast without skin or oil turned out moist and tender  since getting our air fryer i haven t used our oven and have only used the warming feature on the microwave to hold the cooked meat while cooking the vegetables  my only regret is that i didn t buy an air fryer a long time ago

i actually won an instant pot in a drawing  my husband and i both love it  when i was chatting with a colleague the other day  she mentioned that she loves her air fryer because she could vary her cooking from the steam cooking to the dry cooking that the air fryer has  i purchased cosori on a monday and it was at my door wed morning  we made coconut shrimp on the first night  loved it  be sure that you wash the baskets prior to using for the first time  i made the mistake of not doing that and when i was preheating  the smell was awful  we stopped midstream and washed them both and it seemed to make a difference  other than that   i m looking forward to more cooking

i didn t feel like i had a real  need  for an air fryer but i will say it makes things much easier  i ve only fried chicken cutlets  breaded vegs and frozen snack foods in it but it works really well  just check the timings of things  the chicken icon must be for pieces of chicken so time wise it s much less for cutlets  i haven t needed to use the remote option cause why would i  i m in the kitchen preparing the rest of the meal while i use it  but if you re in the fence   get it  you ll thank me later

i seriously love this air fryer  the first air fryer i had was an egg shaped design which was nice but i honestly prefer the cosori i really like the easy to operate buttons corresponding with specific foods  one of the other things i really like is that you can easily adjust the temperature or the duration of cooking time which is a really good idea while you re learning to cook different things  i have found that it s a good idea to watch what you re cooking until you have mastered how long each food item takes if you are not sure which one to get  get this one

i love my cosori air fryer     qt  machine   i have used it nearly daily for bagels  chicken breasts  garlic bread  toast  roasted vegetables  salmon filets  and more   the booklet is helpful   i bought a rolling stand   sold on amazon  to set it on in the corner of my counter  it fits on perfectly and i can roll it out while cooking for good circulation and its farther from wall   then i roll it back under the counters when finished with meal cleaning   easy to clean the inner basket   i do it by hand with hot soapy water on dishcloth and rinse and dry with dishtowel   wipe the front to keep it free from greasy marks   i love the setting   controls are a touchscreen   no issues with it at this point   there is and air fryer facebook site that i check in regularly and they have recipes and tips   so glad i got this one and this sized one

i quite like this air fryer  i had a smaller dial style model before  while i don t really use the bells and whistles on this one too much it has two major advantages over my old one  first  it has a greater capacity than the smaller one  second  the lift out basket is a game changer  easy to clean  however  there are airflow holes in the plastic front of the basket where food crumbs can get trapped  that s my only complaint  amendment  after nearly two months of use  some glaring flaws have come to light with this fryer  first problem is this thing beeps so loud you ll wake your neighbors  scares the pants off my poor dog  but the biggest issue is that the basket will never be clean  photo is after    minutes of hand scrubbing  the angle of the side vents prevents scrubbers sponges rags from reaching spots  enjoy cooking in a basket covered in rancid stuck on grease

i loved this product and it was easy to clean   being single it is perfect for having a quick tasty meal  even from frozen   however after having it for only   months the pressure sensitive control pad to change time and temperature cooking has went out   i am in contact with the company now and will update this review when the matter is settled   i did have a   year warranty on it i want to update this review   cosori worked fast to resolve my problem and in two days have shipped a new product to me   you can t ask for better service than that

the manual explaining how to connect to the mobile app and alexa is basically  just  wrong  so connectivity wise i d give it one star  however it fries well  so i ll up my rating to three to actually connect to your app     it does not use bluetooth  despite showing a bluetooth icon in the app and saying bluetooth in the manual  instead it uses wifi  so find the wifi network after pressing the button for   seconds  go from there you can not link to alexa if you try to  from the app  despite there being an option for it  and despite the manual saying that s how you do it  you have to start alexa separately and detect the device from the alexa app to get them linked  do not start in side the vesync app  it just ends up redirecting to a non existent web page    pretty sad

ok first of all i never never post any review but i needed to get this off my chest  i have been wanting an air fryer for over a year  i finally decided it s time and ordered this one  mind you money is tight  due to covid and lay off  so i received it and tried multiple recipe and it does what it says but my issue is with handle and the circulator  the handle started to get lose within weeks of use  it s cheaply made  and the circulator gets dirty and brown  it s not easy to clean down there  i want my money back or another air fryer       this was supposed to be an investment for years to come  i m not even sure if it s going to last rest of the       cheaply made  just stealing people hard earned money  i m pissed

this air fryer is complete garbage  it will stop connecting to the app and the buttons do not work  i have an expensive piece of plasric taking up a ton of space on my countertop and i can t turn it on  avoid at all costs

i ve wanted an air fryer for years   decided on cosori because of the reviews and because the basket is square which makes it easier for fitting in more chicken nuggets or wings   it is truly remarkable and produces fantastic  crisp nuggets  wings and french fries or tater tots   cleanup takes seconds   i do feel the basket is durable  but it s good to know you can easily buy a replacement basket on line for a reasonable cost   i m      pleased with how easy it is to use  clean and how much of a time saver it is

this is my first air fryer which makes me pretty new to the usage cooking  i am happy with the outcome especially chicken drumsticks breasts tenderloins turned out to be extremely juicy and soft french fries were not that great  lot of uneven cooking  but may be i added too many in one batch since it has a cake as one of the presetting i baked a banana nut bread  the texture was good but i am not very great at baking  so not sure if i am the best judge for this feature also tried veggie patty which turned out good crispy on the outside and softer on the inside smoke the back outlet emits too much smoke for each cooking  this makes the whole house smell of food  i have to leave one of windows open always when i am using the air fryer which is not very convenient smell after     usages i realized along with the smoke their is a particular smell that is emitted  something like when we reuse fried oil  i have been hand washing and then dishwashing both the containers after each use i turned the air fryer upside down to check the coil which was pretty much greasy cleaning  extremely extremely difficultto get rid of the smell i cleaned the coil and the around surface using water and brush  this was extremely difficult because the coil cannot be removed and there is no way to reach the center or anywhere near the fan  so i guess even if i clean the around area of coil the smell issue is still going to be there for me because of the cleaning hassle i will certainly not recommend this product  even if it cooks well
the touch panelyou change the temperature and minutes is so finicky  don t waste your time

update to my original review   cosori responded immediately to address my issues  they offered to send me a replacement unit which i had planned to accept  then i saw my son  who works a very late shift  starting to use the original one i purchased  i explained the problem and he said  mom  i ve been using it every night when i get home and no problem    so what i experienced must ve been a startup issue only  i ve used it several times since and i love it  easy to clean  easy to use  works just as the instructions state  great taste and again  hats off to cosori for excellent customer service original review   three times in a row  including first use  was trying to cook different meats  and it sets off my smoke detectors  i ve washed and rewashed the baskets  wiped down the inside of the cooking area  checked the heating element visually and see no food or grease spatter  second and third attempts it didn t make it through the pre heat cycle  cleaned everything again tried once more and with   minutes left in pre heat same result  can t use it  planning to return it

i saw my sister in law use her two cosori air fryers and was impressed with how quickly and well they cooked chicken thighs  bacon  and brussel sprouts so i bought one   i made the best chicken schnitzel of my life with it  and the blackened broccoli that takes    minutes in the regular oven is perfect after   minutes  so we bought this second one and can make both meat and veggies at the same time  easy to clean and a delight to use

i actually ordered a different air fryer first from another company as a gift for my mom  while i m sure that model would have been sufficient in it s own right  it turned out not to be quite what she was wanting  so i exchanged it and got this air fryer instead  to my pleasant surprise  it came much faster than i was expecting it would  and we put it to work that same day  we already had an air fryer cookbook  though this unit does come with it s own cookbook too  and made curried brussels sprouts for an after dinner snack  today we tried  fried  cheese curds  everything was simple and efficient to use  though we did find out that the display turns off when the baskets are removed   but it resumes again as soon as the baskets are reinserted   clean up is easy  and the digital display is clear and intuitive  i can see why this is so highly rated on here  i m excited to see what other recipes we can try in our new gadget   next up  sweet potato fries when my aunt comes to visit   it already has a permanent place of honor on our counter

ii had previously written that i was disappointed with my cosori air fryer because the release button that separates the two baskets wouldn t work  well  they saw my post and called me  i didn t want to return the fryer  hassle  but they offered to send me two new baskets  i received them and it s like brand new again  thank you cosori for caring about customer satisfaction

i recently had major surgery and a friend came to take care of me until i was able to take care of myself   my friend knew i was not a good cook  but he is  and said i really needed to get an air fryer  it would make my life a whole lot easier and my food would taste better  it s kind of a set it and forget it thing  i was showed photos of the food he made with his air fryer  chicken  wings  french fries  pork loin  etc  my cosoriu showed up the day he left and i have used it almost every day sin ce   three weeks  i believe it will prove to be one of the best purchases ever made  my favorite parts are  the pre heat setting  the beeping reminders to flip the food  the photo buttons that make decisions for me  i have not experienced one problem with it  so easy to use  i am eating better and my food doesn t take as much prep pr cooking time   how did i live without it

do not buy this product  i researched all the air fryers on the market and cosori consistently came up as the highest rated  our cosori arrived last week and when we started it up  none of the buttons on the  touchscreen  worked when we touched them  nothing  the only way we could work the device was through the app   figured it was defective and returned it to amazon and received my replacement on thursday  just fired it up again and the same problem occurred  none of the buttons on the touchscreen work  we can t turn it on  preheat  change the temperature except when using the app   this can t be correct  how can this product advertise its easy to use  touchscreen when it doesn t work   it s nice to be able to operate remotely  but i d prefer to have a fully operational product  not sure if amazon has a bad batch of these  but we ll buy a ninja or phillips instead next time

still getting used to it  going to try different food types   it cooks real fast   and pretty even browning  not bad at clean up after use  good for a busy family or a single person   i have the big one so i can put a lot of things in it

i m not sure how this product has so many great reviews  first of all  the design is terrible  the button release is placed very horribly and you re likely to have an accident with it  and it will eventually break because it is cheap thin clear plastic the pre heat setting is garbage because after you have preheated it to the temperature you want  you will have to re enter your cook time and temperature after it s done  it won t remember it  that is very frustrating  food will either burn or not cook all the way if you have a lot of patience and money to waste a lot of food to figure out which settings work best for what food  then go ahead and try this  otherwise look elsewhere because i found it not worth it so far

i got this air fryer recently and have already used it a ton  it does a spectacular job heating up frozen foods while keeping a good crispy crunchy feel  i ve tried a few of the recipes in the cosori cookbook and they ve all been great  the buttons on the fryer can be a little touchy  but other than that i have no complaints  i love that it s dishwasher safe and the wifi connection is nicer than you d think  specifically  i like that it sends me notifications when it s done preheating or time to flip or when the foods ready  it makes it super easy to do other things while you wait for the food  also  it s nice to be able to preheat from my room with alexa  the size of the tray is great too  the bigger the better   i ve cooked in a few other air fryers and it can be difficult to get a good cook with the smaller ones  and it s certainly difficult to cook for more than one or two people in the smaller ones  i d definitely recommend this fryer to anyone who wants a bit of a nicer fryer and with wifi control as a bonus

product is great as far as cooking goes  problem is basket always pops out  first when i got it just a couple of times  now i have to put a weight  in front of it to keep it closed while i m cooking  totally at loss for words as to why i can t cook on manual now that wi fi is setup  buttons don t work anyway  since i forgot to hit send   was wondering why i never received a response   i ll add this now  the other day  forgot to put weight in front of basket  basket popped out again putting dinner on floor  and tiny bits of plastic broke off  dented pan  food had to be thrown away  i know i can t send it back now because it is dented and chipped  if you want an air fryer that cooks good this is it    if you don t mind the dents and chips you ll get and going the  extra mile   to ensure it doesn t pop out  or having a back up plan for dinner should your dinner end up on the floor and it was  just about ready   then this is the only fryer you will ever need until you get fed up with losing what ws gonna be a good dinner

your browser does not support html  video                          omg this thing is awesome   keto avocado fries     yummyvery happy that we went with the larger unit  and the first thing we cooked was an avocado parmesan crusted jo jo style fry   these were awesome will be using this much more in our house so much better than a deep fryer  in the recipe book it called for flour and breadcrumbs    i substituted and just used an egg wash  and grated parmesan cheese     keto life

i bought this in late october about two months ago the screws started getting loose  i would retighten  as of two weeks ago two screws would no longer tighten and the basket stayed with one screw  well tonight that screw randomly popped off while taking out my food and the baskets separated  very annoying because some of my food fell  it s only been a few months and i barley use it  broke way to soon and this air fryer is expensive  so not worth it

i replaced a larger air fryer with this one  just from an engineering perspective    this cosori air frier is far and away a better option  the two basket design which allows you to separate the inner basket from the outer one is so much more intelligent than the air fryer i had previously purchased which relied on an insert to keep food up and off the bottom of the basket  but the insert was removable and relied on seemingly nonfunctional silicon spacers which proved useless after only a few uses  you d try to shake the basket to re distribute food  and the insert would come loose requiring you to manually remove all of the food  and then re seat the floor  bottom  of the basket  with the cosori  the inner basket is completely removable from the outer basket making serving so much more convenient and when  shaking  the two baskets they stay together allowing for an easy redistribution of the food  such a clean design  easy to wash  wow  if you ve ever wanted to try out having an air fryer  i d suggest you try this on first  love a good product  dislike rip off under performers that cost me time and money returning them  also    cosori actually provides contact info and encourages you to use it in case you are having any kind of problem with their unit  that s customer service

i read reviews and watched a few videos on different air fryers to see what the pros and cons where   decide on the cosori     qt for size  versatility and cost   we tried it out for the first time to cook sweet potatoes and then turkey burgers without cleaning the fryer   following the cook book that came with it word for word  they came out amazing   the burgers where full of juice when you cut into them   it was way easier than ever to use and clean up was simple   i can t believe how much cleaner the kitchen was compared to using a a cast iron skillet or traditional deep fryer   we are excited to try so many different meals and options in the new air fryer   we are a family of   and to make meals we may need to cook in it twice  however  it s that easy to prepare the foods and then cook them   i would definitely recommend this air fryer to anyone think of getting one

my hubby and i just air fried our first steak filet mignon  we are excited   looking forward to eating salmon  fish  chicken and veggies in our new cosori air fryer   we absolutely love it  easy cleaning too    i did order parchment paper that you can use in the air fryer and a silicone dish that can also be used in the air fryer  have not used as of yet  it also came with a rack and   skewers for kabobs  yay    cant wait

what can i say   so far i love this air fryer  i have used it to make crunchy breaded pork chops and they were delicious and took half the time and were way healthier than frying in oil  in fact we haven t had anything fried in years but with this fryer it looks like my husband will be getting his old favorites back  not only does it have the benefit of healthy dining but it takes less than half of the power it would take to use the conventional stove top or oven  i am pleasantly pleased and wish i had bought one sooner

i have had the cosori air fryer xl for almost a year now pros  makes great food  chicken wings  fries  fish  potatoes  brussel sprouts  steak  pork chops  kabobs   that s what i ve made in there several times and love it  easy to clean  food comes out very flavorful  not dry  nor full of grease like with fried foods con  the outside began chipping a few months after using  the largest con however is the screw that keeps coming loose and has now completely fallen out from the handle  which is a huge safety hazard when handling this product hot  wish there was a way i could get that part or even the whole basket replaced  the chipping and screws coming loose  i took   stars away

this is one of the best purchases i ve made with amazon  the cosori air fryer     itself is truly wonderful   i was afraid of bone in chicken breast drying out because i cooked them longer than suggested they were large  but they were crispy and juicy   my son would not eat chicken breast from anywhere bc he felt they were always dry  but he has changed his mind since using the cosori air fryer   we ve even roasted vegetables in it and they re beautiful and tasty   but it is the company s customer service that makes this purchase even better   i had an issue with the basket coming apart from the base  i contacted the company prepared to argue the issue and was in complete surprise when no defense customer interaction took place   they replied professionally and always courteous   they definitely understand that follow up is very important in customer satisfaction

good price and all attachments and two year warranty    but my wife uses it  we had another brand that we gave away that worked great as a gift  we were going to buy the one on tv  but after reading reviews we found out they were junk and did not cook well   this one cooks slower with a little noise  sounds like a dishwasher   we will keep using it maybe what ever is rolling around inside it will stop  they are all made in china  might be a stowaway   update fix the noise  heating coils on bottom were touching  caused rattle when running  took screwdriver and pried the two apart slightly

i was so in need of an air fryer  at first i thought this is to fancy for me  i mean why do i need it to have wifi    so i got it earlier than amazon said  bonus  i tried to set up the wifi and it wouldn t sync  after    minutes of trying i lost patience   i just need it to cook  it cooked everything to perfection the best thing about this air fryer is it cooks enough fries for   ppl at a time at     qt s  i also cooked   chicken breasts at a time downsides  outside of wifi set up   it s hard to operate when trying to open and separate the basket from the bottom  it s also hard to put back together   my teens  house full of boys  and husband will tear it up trying to use it because of the handling  the air fryer before this one was super simple

air fryer stops a few minutes in and won t restart  we unplug it and let it cool and after it resets  it s starts cooking for a short period and stops  this has been a chronic problem for the month we have it but the problem keeps getting worse  the features and performance are great when it works  however it never works

the fryer works great   once you get it started   like many others have stated  the touch pad is highly unresponsive and only certain buttons work   if you touch it just the right way   most of the time i just control it with the app  but not everyone in my household is tech savvy enough to download the app and control it this way i do like the app  it is handy to be able to start it from another room  or monitor the cooking time that is left as far as the taste and easy of cleaning  i think it does these things well   i just wish i had went with an air fryer that has real buttons or dials

love  love  love our air fryer  my spouse who is not a cook loves the fryer so much he has actually planned dinners  looked up recipes  and went grocery shopping for home cooked meals   i came home from a long trip and was treated to a delicious steak dinner  the steak was juicy and tender and just delicious  it s user friendly and affective  our food has never over cooked  were recommend you check the food half way thru to check for doneness  it has a pause button so you can check the food   clean up is easy as well  we chose this air fryer because of the size and amount of food it can hold  there will be a little noise like air circulating but it s not overwhelming and doesn t bother us at all   happy with our air fryer and would recommend as an alternative to using the oven or frying pan

if you haven t tried air frying yet  you ll be pleasantly surprised by how versatile and easy to use these things are  this is a good sized fryer with some nice presets for commonly cooked items outside of a few things for baking  i ve avoided the oven and cooked up some great meals with this fryer  from chicken breasts to crispy hash brown patties  you can cook up quite a variety and avoid unwanted grease the unit is easy to clean there is one big negative though   the buttons on the front are horrible  you power it up by pressing the power button repeatedly in the hopes that somehow your next push is the special one that makes it come on  often you re doing it so rapidly at that point and switching fingers that you double clutch and turn it on and off again only to have to try again some of the presets work every single time  but other times you have to jam on them and i have yet to figure out how to get it to respond to manually setting the temp time with the buttons in comes the app  right   well  yeah  sort of   it works fine if you want to use your phone and the app  however one huge flaw here is that you can only have   phone connected to it  so much for sparing everyone in the house the agony of using the sketchy buttons   the minute someone else added the fryer it disconnected my device outside of those nuances  i think it is a great appliance and i ve certainly gotten my use out of it  i wish they d offer a way to improve on my button pushing game before my finger breaks off

i ve only had this air fryer for a month and a half    already had to put two screws back in on the basket which fall out in the food  well i didn t notice that another screw came out when i made salmon for a salad and i crunched on this screw tonight

did a lot of research prior to purchasing this air fryer and man i am happy    funny enough  my   bestest girlfriends also bought the same af too  but i got the white   which  do not let the white stray you away  it is very easy too clean   i love everything i have cooked in this   their customer service is amazing   my basket had a problem with popping out  which apparently is common   i contacted them and with proof of purchase and some photos of the af itself  they send me a new basket   i also follow a fb group for well cosorians and it is great  i definitely  without a doubt recommend this   btw  i also have their newest air fryer oven and it is awesome as well

i especially wanted to write this review  because i got mine and it didn t seem to close well from the beginning  wasn t flush on the sides  i thought well i just have to close it firmly  the first time i preheated    minutes in  the drawer flung out  hmmm i put it back in and continued on and still had to firmly close it every time opened  by the  rd time i m using it it will not close  even firmly  i got right on amazon and asked to return for a new one  just got the new one today and even though i haven t used it yet it closes so much differently  i m excited to try it out and so very thankful to amazon for exchanging it so quickly and with no fuss or muss  the two times i did cook in this   i have another kind also  i loved it  the clean up was so much better and quite a bit more room in the basket  i highly recommend the air fryer

my first corosi air fryer was defective  amazon replaced it and this one works perfectly  i ve been trying to reach corosi s support help  both by their phone number and also their email  both without success  they don t answer phones now  but rather give their email address  which is non deliverable  can anyone say  frustrating

buy the cosory airfryer xl     qt on february           and today november          only   months broke at the beginning i was content with the product  but today disillusioned with this product  do not recommend it to anyone absolutely to anyone
i ll hit preset button for say   minutes and the food is still raw   the fryer will randomly shut off   when i turn it back on it just beeps until unplug it and start it again

we have loved this since we got it right at about a year the front panal buttons stop working  i looked us the website and got ahold of a customer service agent  he asked for info and pictures  i assumed it would go nowhere  the next day i got a email that they were sending us a new one  it s refreshing to deal with a company that stands behind there product  thank you cosori for your hospitality we will be buying more of your products

i have returned five air fryer ovens and one air fryer  pot  and have found the perfect air fryer in this one  it toasts bread bagels beautifully and is the easiest fryer i have used  no mess to clean like i had to with the oven air fryers  easy to clean  no sticking  perfect frying  so far i have made chicken wings  stuffed mushrooms  turkey burgers  bacon  and fish  i love it    finally   this one has everything i ve been looking for in an air fryer  presets for everything i cook  a drawer that captures drips and batter  non stick surfaces that come clean in soapy water  and clean cooking space  no drips on oven doors and bottoms   i highly recommend it

it works great so far  the only problem i have with it is i follow the instructions to the t in their book and my items are still burnt  i ve made fries  and fried chicken  at first i thought i didn t have enough fries for the amount of time i choose but than i made the fried chicken exactly how the recipe book called and it was still burnt  the inside was extremely juicy and the flavor was great just wished they looked a little better  i ll keep playing with the time and tempature  overall i am happy though

super easy to use and cooked perfectly  i made fried chicken and french fries for the first try  i simply used the presets and let it go the chicken came out perfectly cooked and juicy with crispy golden brown crust  no turning no bloody insides and no extra oil fries were super crispy and golden while still fluffy inside took   min for chicken and    for the fries all other recipes i have tried from the included book have been equally pleasing only con is that i don t have more than one    yet  as i had to cook the chicken and fries separately because of the quantity     but man this thing makes me want to sell all my other cookware and just get a few more of these

i am new to air friers but happily stumbled upon buying this cosori a couple of months ago   i did carry it back and forth from the pantry for a couple of weeks but when i realized the functionality       lets just say it has has earned its place on my crowded countertop  i have fallen in love with this item   to be fair  there are only two of us so it is a perfect size for our meals   but the thing i love the most is cooking and containing the mess  especially meats   bacon is great example  both sides done evenly  in half the time and     the trouble  and the mess is contained   separate the basket  pour off the grease  i save it   rinse the tray and there is no bacon grease spattered over my stove  floor  cabinets and countertop   last night i did lamburgers in it  perfect   hamburgers  steaks  chicken all turn out great and tonight i m trying my first seafood   love my cosori

heard air fryers are great  got the one my friend recommended which is super popular  eh  after a day wish i picked a different model  was expecting more  food cooks great  its functionality that is a bit disappointing     beeping is too loud and wakes people up     there should be separate up down for time and temp     with this unit you have to make it beep to choose which you want and then it beeps loudly each button press     is it possible to disabled beeper      google alexa integration   there is no option to keep food warm after it cooks     after getting to food you have to manually reheat it  kind of disappointing for an almost cool feature

i was skeptical also about this but ordered one because high fat greasy food gives my insides grief  we tried the bbq chicken recipe the day it arrived and were happily surprised by how fast it cooked and the taste  we tried the regular fried chicken last night and were surprised again at how good it was  crispy but not greasy at all  i ll add more spices to the flour mix next time but it was really good   anxious to try others and i m sure this appliance will be on the frequently used shelf with the electric wok update  after a few uses the fryer would shut off and had to cool before coming back on  i emailed the company and they said that if i email them my info and a video of it misbehaving they d send a new one  i did do  and sure enough they sent me a new machine and said don t worry about sending old one back  so i d recommend the customer service too

i received my cosori air fryer xl last night and used it  it was wonderful  very easy to use  easy to clean  and food quality is great  i hand washed both the basket and the liner last night after use  i went this morning to put them both back in and it keeps popping out and wont stay in  i called the cosori customer service number  but received an automated recording that no one was available  i left a message for them to call me back  i used it one time and now cant use it all and have to deal with the hassle of returning the air fryer

pros  quick   convenient   consistent   cooks nicely   easy clean upsince purchasing the cosori max xl     qt  air fryer   weeks ago  my family has almost stopped eating at fast food establishments     because it s so easy and convenient to cook  we use it every day   several times a day it s worked like a charm   smile just place your food in the air fryer basket     set the timer based on the food type     and wait for the beep food result  crisp on the outside     tender on the inside   on some food items  it may take a couple of times to determine how long to cook a food item based on your personal taste   liking  after that  it smooth sailing   cooking      we strongly recommend this air fryer   it has really exceeded our expectations cons  none so far

my boyfriend got me this air fryer for my birthday last september         i ve always been curious about getting one  but also try to keep my kitchen appliances low due to space limitations  welp  he ended up getting me the huge   quart one and i was a little taken aback  but definitely excited to use it and try it out what can i say other than i ve used this thing about     of the days since i got it  so easy to use and you can quickly make your fries  veggies  and even full meals  even a full rotisserie chicken    one of my favorite things to make is egg cups  in silicone muffin holders  for breakfast  we also make wings often  which the recipe in the book for the sriracha wings comes out perfectly anyway  so i ve had my amazing times with this air fryer and decided one day to let my boyfriend use it for making some chicken for burrito bowls  he pulled the basket out  and due to his inexperience of using it  he let it sit halfway in the air fryer instead of pulling it out fully and setting it on the counter  well  my life flashed before my eyes as i saw the baskets drop to the floor  i was able to somewhat catch it  but it still hit the floor pretty hard  now i m not sure if it was due to it being hot that it warped so easily from this  but both of the inside and outside baskets warped a bit from the fall  nothing major  it was still able to go back into the air fryer and no steam escaped  it was more of an aesthetic issue  it was then that i set off on my search for replacement baskets  while seriously reconsidering my relationship  i mean  it s like he broke a piece of my heart   only the internal basket was sold separately on amazon  this led me to reach out to cosori directly  and they actually offered to replace both baskets at no charge as a one time courtesy  i definitely wasn t expecting this since it was our fault the baskets warped and nothing to do with the product itself  but what amazing customer service now i can t guarantee they would replace another person s baskets due to damage done from their own error  but it was definitely impressive they offered to do it for me and i really appreciated it  you can definitely count on their customer service when purchasing this product  which is always important when getting a kitchen appliance and now  my boyfriend is going to be monitored a bit more closely when he cooks with it

i decided to wait a little while before writing a review so i would have a chance to get use to using my airfryer and see if i like cooking in one  well  i love my cosori airfryer   i am glad i got the larger size  i think anything smaller would have been too small for my husband and myself  i made the best thin cut bone in pork chops today  crispy on the outside   tender on the inside   the only issue i have had is the small screws that hold the basket handle became loose and one screw fell out  fortunately i found the screw and small nut  i put it back and tighten the others up  something owners may want to check on their fryers  i still give it five stars

how did i ever live without an air fryer   this appliance has literally replaced my oven ever since i bought it  i tend to relegate my appliances to a shelf or cabinet for the    x a week i use them    not this bad boy  he stays on the countertop because i literally use it every single day  every day  you think a recipe can t be made in this  think again  anything that should go in your oven can now go in the air fryer for a fraction of the time and use way less energy  my oven takes forever to heat up  and you know it s big in there  so cooking time can take a long while  all of that goes away with an air fryer  you get that great texture on your food and reduced cooking time  this machine is also super easy to use  super easy to clean and has all the easy buttons to make cooking whatever you re in the mood for simple  cannot recommend this enough

i actually can t believe the amount of good reviews for this product  upon arrival i was excited to test this thing out only to find out that only one of the touch screen buttons work  maybe if the one button that worked was the  start  button i would be able to use it with wifi but otherwise this air fryer is completely useless  i will be sending it back and buying another brand

i have never used an air fryer before   i purchased this one and decided to make wings on super bowl sunday   i used the preset  wing  function  which took    minutes  if i remember correctly    honestly  they came out exactly as if i had cooked them in the oven      not really impressed and not what i expected   i thought they would be crispy as in  deep fried crispy  or something at least similar   they came out the same as in my oven   not what i wanted or expected   i ll try some other items  or maybe not use the preset function and time them myself   i don t know   but so far definitely disappointed

update           need to give credit where credit is due   the unit itself would randomly shut down during use   it was past the amazon return period so i reached out to the company via the email address provided with the unit   despite it being a saturday they quickly responded to my email requesting some additional information which i provided   within    hours they had responded with tracking information for a new unit on the way   so far i have used it twice with no issue   very impressed with how crunchy the food is using this thing       updated to four stars as the unit is working as advertised and the customer service exceeded my expectations old review bought this april  th   it now will not even turn on   cannot even return it   it s not heavy enough to be a boat anchor

have had this for less than a year and used a handful of times each month  it is easy to use  annoying to clean  but all air fryers are   and we ve enjoy some of the recipes   but yesterday one of the screws that is on the inside where the food is heated fell out and got mixed into our food and we almost bit into it while we were eating  this could have broken our teeth or we may have swallowed a screw  while we enjoyed using this  we will not be using it again  just doesn t feel that great to use anymore after this
