i was skeptical about using air fryers  but it turns out really great  i use less oil than cooking in a pan  and it gives food crispy texture  i tried to make crab cakes  wings and potato wedges  they all taste pretty darn close to restaurants  one thing i love about this air fryer is they do all the math for you  therefore  food is not over cooked  juicy  tender and flavorful  they also include a booklet to inspire  you to pick  i never bake dessert before and i m gonna try to make homemade brownies soon  i m really glad that i pick the white color  very classy and elegant  i would put parchment paper in there before i fry next time because it takes me quite some time when you try to fry different food  overall i m satisfied with this purchase

i just received this product   i have checked it out and i like what i see   i had a cheap unit which lasted for about   years   i could have still gotten by with it  but i wanted to upgrade   i like the new features on this air fryer   it seams to be easy to use   i like the square design better than the round one i had   i like that it has accessories that i can order for this unit rather than guess what items fit better   i have never considered a corosi unit until now   i used my old air fryer every day for something   toast  cooking  reheat  etc   i saw several recipes in the book that came with it that i had not seen before   i think i am going to love this unit

i bought this for my mother for mother s day back in may as she had always wanted one  it arrived the day before  but to my disbelief they sent me a dehydrator instead  i immediately returned it  and had to wait another week to get the right product  when i did receive the actual product  the front panel was unresponsive and the device could only be operated via wifi  fed up  i immediately sent it back  that was almost two months ago  and i have yet to receive my refund or any clarity on when i might get it back  purchase this product at your own peril

we ve been wanting an air fryer for several years  based on our research and reviews we decided to go with the cosori smart wifi air fryer    qt for a christmas gift to ourselves and wow it works like a champ   so very  very impressed  easy to operate  lots of good recipes  great online experience  etc etc  we pushed the limit of the     qt capacity and cooked a   pound chicken and it came out   thumbs up  we cannot say enough good things about it

my first air fryer  and i have to say i love it  we are a household of two and the     qt size is perfect for us  i see no need to ever put it in the dishwasher  as the cleanup of the   pieces is quick and easy  the convenience of not heating up a big oven is wonderful for us  and everything i have tried so far has been good  i cooked salmon a few nights ago  and it came out perfect  the first dish i tried was chicken tenders  just evoo and spices   and they were great  i m a happy  satisfied customer

i ve always been very skeptical about using these things  but being on a new diet i felt like maybe this was a better way to do it  this is absolutely amazing i don t know why i held out for so long  everything i ve cooked in there taste so much better than doing it on a conventional oven  i will say it s not better than my smoker but the convenience of being able to cook lots of things in a quicker amount of time and the fact that they re juicier than doing the oven it s so much of a bonus that i ve actually started using this more than my smoker  this was definitely worth it i haven t tried the wi fi feature part of it yet but everything else i have done it gets it all finished in the first shot  warning large items that are frozen may take a second run through  but definitely worth it

the air fryer is really what everyone says it is  cosori is a great brand and the build quality is actually pretty great considering the price  the led touch screen is super responsive and thankfully behind a layer of plastic covering  which is embedded so you can t peel it  which means you don t have to worry about the painted settings like other air fryers have  biggest bonus  the basket is a square  this means you can fit more of the foods you love without stacking them unfortunately for me  after   months of use the basket bucket wouldn t click into place and kept shifting out  the good news  i called cosori and explained the issue    min phone call  and they said they would send a replacement  huuuuuge plus to be able to have a company that responds that quickly and painlessly  customer service is a  if you ever have any issues

this has been a long time coming   honestly i love how these things cooks  it comes with a very helpful recipe book and it looks really nice  the reason for the bad score is because of the build quality  the screws keep falling off which makes the basket fall apart  the screw comes off when i wash it and would fall in the garbage disposal  i am already missing one screw the air fryer basket is lose even after i try to tighten it  it s just irritating    it shouldn t be coming lose if the build quality was there  this is one of the more expensive air fryers so i would expect it to be built sturdy but sadly that is not the case

this air fryer has a great front panel control  in comparing to other models it s easier to use  but it warped considerably after putting the basket in the dishwasher  the description says it s dishwasher safe   however  the worst thing about this fryer is the smell  i did the normal practice of burning off any chemicals upon first use but after using it for about    times the smell is horrible and it gets into the food  something not adding up

i seriously love this thing  this fryer is super useful  easy to use and has allowed my family to make some of our go to fried items at a much healthier approach  it cooks up hot wings in no time that are juicy  crispy and retain flavor   we ve cooked up bacon and it came out so perfect that we no longer cook it on the stove due to splatter mess and over whelming smell  note  there is a real great youtube fryer community online that teach you how to cook up some delish food in a fryer in less tha n       mins i ve bought two as gifts and felt good knowing i gave them a legit gift that will be used and loved as much as i love mine     liter unit

i ve had the fryer for almost a year and it cooks wonderfully but the buttons for temperature and time selection have never been reliable and generally  been non  responsive  alexa sometimes works but mostly responds with a question about alarm com  i would highly recommend air fryers  but not this one until they make the buttons more responsive  i have been using the pre set buttons and just trying to get approximate time and temps to match directions  but it is really frustrating

i bought this for my husband  about a month ago  xmas       who likes to cook and he loves this machine  it checks all the boxes  easy to use  easy to clean and food tastes better  we have a large professional type oven range  non convection  and it is just not that practical when cooking for just two people most of the time  he has cooked a variety of foods and everything has turned out great  i would say so far  the steak has been the best  i am used to cooking on a gas grill and the steak cooked in this machine is better  he bought some of the accessories for it  the wire rack is great because it seems to allow for a better convection process  i like the fact it stores easily in a cabinet  i have a modern style home and prefer to leave the countertops uncluttered  highly recommend this product

i wasn t sure what to expect with this it s basically a high speed convention oven which cooks very evenly  and does a very nice job of crisping  i have tried a variety of meals  and everything has come out great  fish  chicken wings  eggs  garlic bread  steak  you name it you do have to manage your expectations though  you re not going to get deep fried flavour out of this  because the food doesn t sit in the oil  it does an ok job  but it s closer to baked than fried  fries potatoes come out somewhere in between baked deepfried  there s also no tossing mechanism  so the food doesn t rotate on its own i also continually underestimate how fast it cooks food  i have routinely started it  and then started working on sides  only for it to finish far faster than whatever else i m doing  i m honestly considering getting two of the things just so i can do two things at the same time utterly simple to clean  i just throw the tray in the dishwasher overall  i m amazed at the utility of this thing  i ve used it every day since i got it

what do i like about it    the size and shape make it convenient for cooking  those round one reduce the space inside of the unit  this one has decent size for cooking   the ease of use   the pictures for the presets make it easy to use and you have the option of increasing the temperature or time  if needed   the food comes out great in a shorter period of time   although the unit is very easy to clean the only exception is trying to clean the fan unit   you have to make sure you clean as much of the grease that can adhere to the top  there than that the clean up is great  i have a foodi grill that my children bought me but  i go to this unit first because it is much more lightweight and easier to clean   i don t leave appliances out on my counter so that is one reason it gets used more   all in all  i am very satisfied with this unit

i loved my air fryer  it cooked things perfectly  until it didn t  i went to use it tonight and my air fryer won t come on  checked the outlets  the basket  unplugged and replugged it and nothing worked  go to look at the return policy to see if i could give it another chance and just get a replacement or get a refund but my    day return period ended yesterday  needless to say i m very disappointed because of the price of this and how little i actually got to use it  looking at what i will have to do to take advantage of the warranty doesn t even seem worth the trouble of returning it to the manufacturer  really sad that it didn t end up working like it should have and that i m now stuck with a dead appliance that i hardly got to use

i was super excited to order this because there were so many great reviews a lot of purchases and we have a cosori electric teapot at my office which works beautifully  has a great design and a great look  i thought this would be great too  i love the little black box that sits on my counter top  it s a nice looking appliance  the noise level is average compared to that of a microwave  it s easy to use except that the buttons do not always work  i sometimes have to turn the power off and start over because the up down buttons do not register  the screws for the basket have to be tightened continually  otherwise  they fall out while youre cooking  shaking  the basket  i actually had to tighten the screws inside the tray  the part the basket sits in  when putting it back together this morning  yes  the teflon coating is starting to peel off already  its dishwasher safe but i m not happy with the way it cleans up  it still looks dirty and maybe that s just how it is  one of the biggest issues was that we had to start propping the drawer  basket  shut with out vitamix  it would continually pop open at random times while we were using it  now that i have been tightening the screws on a regular  we have not been having that issue as much  in reading a lot of the reviews and looking at photos  i m quite certain that our handle will probably break soon too  i know it has not been a year yet since our purchase  but i am already looking for a replacement  it makes good veggie tots though  my favorite thing to air fry next to beer battered fish

we received our codori air fryer three days ago  in that time we ve used it as many times for fried squash  chicken legs  and baked potatoes   yes  baked potatoes    this thing prepares excellent baked potatoes that are fluffy inside with a wonderfully crispy skin   my wife and i love baked potatoes and trust us on this  this fryer makes the best baked potatoes ever  four hundred degrees for    minutes  put some oil on the potato  some garlic powder  and sea salt  then stick em in the fryer   the fried squash was amazing  the chicken legs succulent  there s been absolutely no mess around or under the machine  totally easy to clean  determination could be measured by the means to which you d have to go to get this machine away from us

it is quicker than the oven and does not heat up the entire kitchen  this is welcome in california  the flavor is equal if not superior  the results are more consistent than our oven  it is easy to use and we are finding ourselves using it more and more   if you need to prepare for a large dinner party the oven is still the better choice because you can cook more of something at the same time instead of in batches   buy with confidence

i had been looking at air fryers for about a year or so  trying to decide if i really needed another kitchen appliance taking up space in my kitchen   would i use it enough to justify buying one   i looked at quite a few air fryers in the process of trying to make up my mind   it became clear to me that if i was going to get one  it needed to be a larger one to make it worth it   i had never heard of cosori before  but it was an amazon s choice and had good reviews   i liked the look of it and that it had a more squared basket than round   it was a little more money than i had initially wanted to spend  but i went for it   so glad i did   i love this thing   it is so easy to operate and clean  and food tastes great and cooks so quickly   it s my new toy   it seems to be well made  but i got an additional year on the warranty when i registered it  just in case    i ve made chicken twice  steak  asparagus  eggplant  and broccoli twice   very pleased with the results   like my instant pot  i wish i would have bought one sooner
i like how well this air fryer makes wings and sweet potato fries  i would recommend this for foods u would normally deep fry

this unit does not allow for reprogramming of the preset buttons  through the control panel or the app  so you cannot customize temperature  time  or shake reminders for the preset buttons   other units allow you to reprogram the panel buttons   within the app  there is no way to add a shake reminder to custom recipes  this is a silly oversight the unit does not have a physical power switch  so the only way to turn it off is to reach behind the unit and unplug from the wall the unit has no filter on the exhaust port   as a result  i find i have to use it under the vent hood which means setting it up on the stove  and thus not being able to use the stove

i am blind and use this air fryer  now some of you may be thinking how does one use this device if it s a touch screen and they are blind  well i control it via the vesync app on my iphone with my phones screen reader called voiceover i really like it  the basket is big enough to where i have experimented putting frozen dinners in it if they will fit  most turn out well but some frozen dinners were not made to be cooked in an air fryer  but hey that s the beauty of experimenting recommend

it takes a little longer to cook than a traditional fryer and is a little smaller than i d like  however  i am amazed at how good it works  i have always been skeptical of air fryers so i bought this model for what seemed a fair price to try it out and see what all the hype was about  the results far exceeded my expectations and now i wish i went with a bigger device  but not knowing if i d like it or if it worked how i d hoped i didn t want to sink a lot of money into one   well worth the money  perfect for a couple or small family  but we have a family of six so it gets tricky making several batches  still super impressed at the food  it takes a little trial and error to get things just right  the auto function buttons are very helpful for desired foods  it even has an alarm to tell you when to shake the basket  clean up is amazingly simple  much easier than my deep fryer

love not having to heat up the oven  energy cost savings   to roast a few veggies or to heat up things that you really don t want to do in a microwave  pizza  bread  etc   we use it nearly everyday  easy to use  i m constantly trying new things in it  easy to search on google for temp time settings for nearly anything you want to fry  bake or roast  for heating up frozen fried foods  you don t need to add any oil at all  i do recommend lining the basket with aluminum foil when possible for easy clean up and immediate re use without washing  note  the   screws that hold the handle onto interior exterior basket do come loose so you ll need to use a small screwdriver to tighten them up  discovered this when one fell out  suggest you check these occasionally and tighten so you won t find a loose screw   pun intended

i paid     for it during black friday deals so i think it s a     stars  if i were to pay the original price i d probably give it   stars instead  very easy to use and i like the smart phone app option  but  the plastic smell when used really bothers me  every time i turn on the fryer a strong plastic smell comes out and it sometimes smokes my eyes  it s getting a lot better  but it s taken more than    uses to get here  i checked lots of reviews and qas here  the seller suggested running the fryer at     degrees for    minutes  or soak the plastic in vinegar for    minutes  my friend who has the same model told me she ran the machine outside a few times before she took it in  i tried all the above and overall it took me more than    times to finally feel the smell is acceptable    i think it s slowly going away  but just be ware

everything works like a charm  food tastes great  large basket for just about anything  presets make it super easy  price is unbeatable and the best part the clean up  so easy  this is the one to get in my opinion  i know there s a lot of them to choose   i know i was determined to get one from emeril l  but when i saw this  the price  the features well   keep shopping and keep looking but i tell you the basket is a lot bigger then most brands  good luck

are you kidding  i cannot believe there is an air fryer such as the cosori     quart  i have only used it to fry tilapia fish with fries so far and believe me  i will be using this fryer for     of my cooking  the outside dimensions are great and especially the inner bucket to hold the food  very nice styling  it looks great on the countertop  it is very solid  very well made  the touch screen features are excellant to fry foods  the cookbook that is included is tremendous

pros    super easy to cook    large baskets    easy to use and understand    app compatible    easy to clean cons    control panel is not very responsive    gets very hot overall great entry air fryer for anyone interested  after getting this i do not use my own oven anymore  its just so much more faster cooking this way and fried food tastes better   cleaning is easy since the basket comes in two pieces  my only problem is the control panel is a little hit or miss  you need to push a lot  overall great piece for any kitchen

this is a large piece of kitchen appliance  it was much larger than i thought it would be  it takes up a large space on the counter it works extremely well  the rectangular basket holds a surprisingly large amount of anything  it cooks things just as well as baking in the oven  but just a few minutes quicker  and also using less energy i m still trying new recipes  but so far everything i have tried to cook in it has come out absolutely delicious and  most importantly  free of the cooking oils i d need for pan frying the only real downside it the pans are so large i can only fit the pans in the dishwasher with nothing else  a small price to pay for good food

i burned the first   or   things we cooked in here because it just cooks way faster than the instructions say  i ve found the cooking temp to be about    degrees less than the oven and cooking time to be     to     of oven  just keep in mind you can always put something back in to cook longer but you can t come back from overcooked or burnt  now that we ve adjusted we are loving how fast it cooks and that everything comes out juicer and more flavorful than deep frying  with the danger  mess  health concerns  and without heating the house up using the oven  highly recommend air fryers in general and i think we made a good choice in picking this one

the cosori air fryer is a quality unit with many desirable features  the size is very accommodating  though it fits well and attractively on the counter  display is easy to read and it is a breeze to clean i was most impressed with the customer support which is willing  eager  and knowledgable to assist you  a rarity in today s retail economy if you are considering the purchase of an air fryer  i highly recommend this unit

my daughter had been very positive about using an air fryer even though she had a smaller one than this model  i decided if it was going to work out well for me that i wanted a larger one to handle more meal options  i decided on this model from cosori cp    f     qt model i could not be happier with my purchase as i m using the fryer almost every day for either main courses or sides  i have yet to cook something in it that wasn t as good or better in the fryer than previous methods     usually better  having a crisp outer surface with a juicy interior makes so many foods better have done everything from fry frozen food such as french fries and egg rolls to grilled cheese sandwiches to hot dogs to fried rice to filet mignon  the cookbook that comes with the unit has a number of recipes that are now in our routine for meals such as chicken parmesan  google is your friend for finding air fryer recipes i thought fryer would mainly substitute for the microwave and provide better  heated up food   it does that and so much more  would have never thought i d be doing so many main courses in the fryer  and the fact that it cooks faster than a traditional oven is also a plus i did bump into problem with bolts loosening in the handle that others have experienced  i would encourage you to check their tightness on occasion  had tightened them once when loose  but the upper bolt in handle came out and the bolt for it is located inside handle and could not get it in position to repair  i contacted customer service  and provided the requested information  a new inner basket handle was delivered fedex at no charge just   days after reporting the problem  communication from customer service was outstanding from initial reporting to providing a tracking number for the replacement part i cannot compare  the fryer to other models or brands as this is the only one i ve used  but am very impressed with this cosori model and their customer service

to be frank  i thought this was one of those gadgets that they sell on tv and it disappears after a while since it doesn t really do anything or solve any problem as they claim but to my surprise  this has been one of the best investments that i made in my kitchen  i bought this on a daily deal and used it after a couple of weeks of buying it being still sceptic of it s abilities when i used it first time  it blew my mind  not fried  but fried  it was like   i can t believe it s not butter  make sure that you buy the biggest version though since     was barely enough to put a whole chicken in it  so buying a smaller version is not a good idea

i love it  frying without oil   who can not love it  capacity is a bit modest  but that s a known deficiency of this type of fryers  i bought it at        only a few weeks ago  now the price is          a whopping  about     price increase  i was going to buy one for one of my family members  but that s not going to happen at a     price increase

what i love food comes out great  didn t think i d like from scratch fries in here but they really do get crispy with very little oil  love it for that  i use it mostly to get my kids quick meals like chicken nuggets and fries or taquitos  texas toast  frozen pizza  crisp up asparagus  it s a great size to get enough food for     people  def not a full meal but a side  tried roasting a chicken but wasn t as moist as i like it to be  perfect an oven for roasting chicken  but i absolutely love the kabob skewer it came with  my daughter loves the kabobs and made me make it for her for about   days straight the bad side the basket is super tricky to clean  time consuming  also the tray the basket sits in has a screw that constantly gets looks and causes the basket to sit funny and allow to much steam escape when getting g hot  now the screw seems to be over screwed if that makes sense and is loose all in all  i love it and i am an air fryer lover now  maybe down the road when i need a new one i ll probably try another brand but i bought this because it was inexpensive and it came with an additional gadget  but it really is great

i am really loving this air fryer  it s the first and only one i ve tried so i can t compare it to anything else but so far i am very impressed  first of all  i love the shape of it  i ve seen other fryers that were circle  and for some reason i never liked it  so i m really happy this is square  second  it s sooo easy to clean and it s dishwasher safe which is a plus  lastly  it makes cooking soo much easier and faster  so far i have only cooked regular potatoes and sweet potatoes but i can t believe how easy it is  cut it up  drizzle some olive oil  put it in the air fryer and forget about it  the potatoes come out crispy and delicious  can t wait to try more things

machine works perfectly   haven t even used its wifi  however if you don t deep fry foods anyway  you won t appreciate this machine   it does what my oven and broiler do  place meat on a wire grate inside my shallow roasting pan and voila   grease drips off meat into roasting pan  calories reduced i still must marinade or heavily season meat  fish and seafood or it will still taste bland if i just air fry it   i don t use salt because i help control our high blood pressure we bake fries  muffins  etc in the oven   why spend      for another counter space grabber  okay so this machine doesn t  heat up my kitchen    but that s only an issue in the summertime ehh   jury is still out re air fryers

fryer has a large capacity and is easy to use  recipe book not fancy  but with enough to get really started  clean up is no sweat   finding other recipes that will challenge this fryer   have no doubt that it will be capable  three stars because box left by driver in front of garage and not on front porch  where items are usually left  exposed to the elements or theft  poor form

have used this   days in a row and made   different dishes  disappointed to report that this machine is not made to be used immediately and nothing in the instruction manual advises to  condition  the machine before use  after reading all of the negative reviews i realized this machine should be turned on  as if being used but with no food inside  for about   hours  for the disgusting manufacturing plastic smell to go away  the first meal i made was bacon wrapped chicken and roasted potatoes and the smell was horrendous but the food tasted fine  the next day when reheating the food for lunch all of it tasted strong of plastic  i used the machine the next day to male pork chops again the smell too strong to bare  it even over powers the aroma of food you re making and this time the pork chops tasted like the plastic ass soon as it was ready  i m  conditioning  the machine now  i ve turned it on to     and letting it stay on at    minute intervals to see if this helps

this is a great unit   i ve bought and returned an air fryer before and i ve borrowed my mother in laws   both units were a pain in the arse to clean even though they made great food   i decided to get this unit because it was lower price around prime day thinking i d probably have to return this too if cleanup was too much   we ve used this air fryer at least    times or more since having it over last few weeks   each time the food has been great and the cleanup has been simple this is worth the cost the cookbook has been quite helpful as well for both ideas on what to cook in it and as a guide for cooking times on stuff you normally cook in a big oven   no longer do we need to heat up the big oven to cook a few chicken tenders or heat up some other small item   you do have to be careful and write down times  for future cooking  as this device has cooked these items much faster than my big convection oven

this is a pretty new addition to our kitchen  and it s going to take a little bit of time to get used to cooking with it  as with all new things   the few things we have tried have turned out great  but i did overcook the steaks there are two reasons it doesn t get   stars    it s noisy  the fan which circulates the air inside the cooking basket is definitively noisy    the touch panel at the front seems like cheap plastic  response to touch isn t great  and it gives if you push a little hard

there is not much to say for this air fryer  it does its job very well and the cookbook it comes with is definitely a plus  i only have two negative things to say about it    the buttons are touch sensitive and do not always detect a button press on the first try  often times i find myself pressing the buttons multiple times to get it to sense that i m touching it  it can get annoying over time    the handle comes loose over time and needs to be tightened  it s not difficult to tighten but it is always going to be something to watch out for when using the appliance other than that it s still a good product and worth a buy

we ordered the cosori smart wifi airfryer for my dad for christmas and we have been nothing but impressed so far  it takes a little trial and error to determine how long foods should cook to be at your preferred crispness  but once that s figured out perfect every time  we have made both frozen foods  french fries  tator tots  etc   and fresh foods  breaded chicken cutlets   both exceeding our expectations for crispy outside and warm  well done insides  we have found that some foods are just better with a little olive oil sprayed on  but it still feels so much more healthy eating these foods without putting them in the deep fryer the shake reminder is an excellent feature of this device  as you can walk about and do something else and hear when you must move the food around  my dad really enjoys being able to preheat adjust the airfrying using the amazon alexa overall  happily surprised with the quality of this product and it ended up being the best christmas present of the year

so i loved this air fryer  loved it  had it since may of        but what sucked this week was as you can see in the picture the plastic pieces melted off   and i don t know how long the plastic was melting  possible into our food   it s all metal basket  but the piece that connects is plastic  this really could have been avoided with all metal pieces   other then that it was a good air fryer   best one i have used and i got another one for a friend back in feb  just bummed about it breaking

i use this for everything     everything made in this air fryer taste so much better then when they are made in other wats  super super easy to use and very easy to clean   if you don t have this your missing out

the basket is falling apart after   months of owning this cosori air fryer  i would have given it   stars if it was easily repairable but the handle would need to be taken apart to place and tighten the screw and secure it back into the washer

i purchased this air fryer at the end of march  it recieved excellent reviews so i had high hopes for it  i think the manufacturing of the production batch for my unit was substandard  it s the only reasonable explanation for these issues  after a few uses  the touch screen buttons became unresponsive  requiring me to press the desired function up to   times before it would register  next  a screw fell out of the fryer basket  there was no way to rescrew it in manually  the other   screws needed to be tightened using a phillps head screwdriver after every use  now the prongs that hold the basket closed no longer engage to keep the basket securely in place  when the fryer works  with way too much tinkering  the food is great  i really wanted to love this fryer but it is a safety hazard  the fryer is not usable  i am requesting a replacement

i have only used this a handful of times since purchasing it  but i m definitely impressed  it cuts down on cook time by half  if you read and follow the directions you shouldn t have any problems at all  it s very user friendly and the baskets inside are super easy to clean  i love the size   the first time i used it i fit   perch fillets in it and they cooked with no problem  also works great for just a small meal for two  the chicken quarters i made last night would have taken over an hour in my oven  they were done in    mins in the air fryer and i even forgot to preheat it  i can t wait to try a small roaster  also  the recipe book that comes with it has a nice variety of recipes  some vegetarian  desserts  appetizers  etc

the best kitchen gadget i ve ever purchased  ever   i love cooking  and i love frying chicken  fries  tempura vegetables  even fried hispanic sweets  but i do have to eat healthier  and this replaced my old  aged frier you can cook almost anything in this  i ve cooked frozen chicken breasts and wings in this  and it leaves them juicy and crispy in       minutes  i even cook bacon in this and it leaves it just as crunchy and the oil drains into the bottom tray  so there s little clean up  i ve even made carne asada in this  grill cheese sandwiches  grilled veggies  and even chocolate cake come out incredibly great out of this  i even baked cookies in this i love it  love it  love it

i watched a youtube video by prohomecooks and it was a fun video where this home chef cooked a variety of stuff and they all turned out great   but i bought the airfryer and couldn t get the basket to come out   so i contacted them   this company has the best support i ve ever encountered   for weeks they supported me while i struggled to make the product work   and it works great thanks to their support   sticky basket    it now works   but more than that  they immediately contacted me every time i wrote an email with a question   when was the last time this happened to you   i tend to write some scathing reviews because companies don t care once we buy the product  this company does

this is my third air fryer   all three have had their pro s and con s   this one seems to cook very well   the basket is shallow with maybe a little larger surface area than the others   there is no need for a deep basket with these air fryers   there is one problem with this model imo   the start pause button is right next to the power on off button   on several occasions i have pushed the basket in   set the temp  set the time and then pushed power on off by accident   so this ends up being something like    button pushed all for not   this is extremely frustrating   the power on off button should be located on the upper left or right of the panel  not right in the middle   poor design   otherwise the unit works very well

i love this air fryer  bought it on sale on cyber monday  it s large  larger than i had anticipated  although i understand the measurements are printed right there for all to see  so not for people with tiny kitchens unless you are ok getting it in and out of a storage cabinet  easy to use  big basket  and gets the job done  the only thing i don t love is the digital interface  it s not as helpful as it could be  for example  you use the     buttons to adjust temperature and time  but you don t know which one is getting adjusted until you see the numbers change   produces great quality food and it s very easy to clean

this product is not what i expected  let me start ny saying this thing is huge  it takes up way too much counter space  it feel cheap and flimsy  the basket has a latch and then a button you have to press to separate the two pieces and it gets jammed  overall  i was not pleased with this product

i was so excited to get this but then once it came  realized this isn t something a large family can use  i have a family of   and unless i want to feed my family in shifts then we cannot ever use this  great for   people though

i used my previous air fryer out   this one is so pretty on my counter  works great  and cleans up easily   only suggestion is for new buyer  put it outside after opening and washing  then run it at     degrees for about    minutes  burns any of the chemical smell off   bring inside and enjoy   it makes the best veggies

i read a lot of the recent reviews about defective units  i was pretty worried about it but my unit turned up fine  it s been fun learning new recipes to try out on the air fryer  i ve been bored cooking everyday during this pandemic and this has made the process more exciting    the air fryer came with a recipe book and it works as expected  i would recommend this to anyone looking for an air fryer

great product and cooks everything perfectly and as described  i do have one small gripe though   if you re not using this with your phone  the ease of use is not the best  the buttons are not the easiest to press and there is a small learning curve  also  only one person can be connected at a time   when my girlfriend cooked last  and i try to use it with my phone  it will automatically hook up to the last person to use it  so you have to reset the wifi by holding the wifi button for a few seconds and reconnect with a new person  annoying  if you only plan on having one person use it  and you like smart products than this thing is fantastic  also  they provide some great recipes in the app as well  lastly  it s just a pretty appliance  i like the way it looks  guaranteed

easy to use  easy to clean  easy to love  my first day i made honey sriracha wings  sweet potato fries  and coconut shrimp with a sweet chili sauce  hey  it was hockey night so we needed finger foods    tonight i made crispy  delicious and nutritious brussels sprouts that my family loved  it s easy to use  easy to clean  has tons of helpful presets  and looks beautiful in my kitchen  my existing kitchen appliances welcomed cosori with open arms

amazing product   i ve been thinking about getting an air fryer for awhile  i spent a few hours researching and ultimately decided on the     cosori  based on the positive reviews  features   reasonable cost  i used it to make chicken legs tonight  they cooked perfectly in    min and were delicious  cleanup was    min   this was my first time using an air fryer   it couldn t be easier  i will use this often   no more concern that it will be one more appliance that gets tucked away in a cabinet   highly recommended

best small appliance ever   i have owned mine for   months now and can honestly say it is worth every penny and more  i use mine almost every day  i cook for   or    so i am able to cook both proteins and veggies at the same time  very easy clean up and so versatile  as you can fry  bake  grill  roast and as a notorious grill cheese burner  i can swear to you  that you wont ever burn a sandwich again  it really is a great healthy option for cooking   i have been keto for   years and missed  crunch  in foods   but not anymore  thank you corsori   for this game changer    i can t wait to receive the new toaster oven type one that i am getting for my bfs house too  ps  corsori has thee best customer service ever  if you need them and an amazingly fun fb group to help you along the way

i wanted to love my cosori air fryer so bad  i purchased the white one  which looked very nice and was the perfect size to cook food for a family of    i liked the recipe book  and the settings made cooking super easy  i was so disappointed however that there was a terrible plastic smell  the odor was so overwhelming that we had to open windows to get the smell out of our house   i returned it and purchased the stainless steel bagotte air fryer  the switch was worth the inconvenience   i m so much happier with my new purchase

i wasn t really sure that spending the money on an air fryer would be worth it  after reading reviews  talking to people who have  and love  air fryers  i decided to give it a try  this fryer was one of the best i could find and the price couldn t be beat on prime day  i am so happy with this purchase  everything we have made in this fryer has come out even better than we ever thought it would  even baked potatoes are amazing cleaning couldn t be easier   pop out the cooking basket and both the basket and the bottom of the fryer are easily wiped clean it seemed overwhelming trying to figure out what could be made in an air fryer  but i m slowly coming to realize that everything can go in there  this fryer has buttons for some things  like bacon  making it even easier to use i can t say enough good things about this and highly recommend adding this to your kitchen

i did a lot of research before buying and it came own to this and one other  i m satisfied with my decision and glad i finally got an air fryer  having fun with it   i read some reviews that condensation puddles along the bottom and i see that to be true  but it so minimal  who cares  why complain about that  i ve also seen comments that it smokes sometimes  this is true  it depends how much oil is in the air fryer  the more oil  the more smoke   i m still learning how to use it  so far  it s easy to use  i like the square basket  it s super easy to clean  no complaints other than for this price  they should have included some extras  i ve seen other cosori models with the dehydrating racks or skewers   it should have come with some  toys  instead of trying to charge us     more for those things   because at the end of the day  this product is probably not so dissimilar to a     air fryer  except that it has the square basket and it s overall footprint is small for it s capacity   the cookbook is handy only from the standpoint of giving you an idea of time temperature for things   but those are easily googleable

while this does a great job cooking food  today when using it i flipped the chicken and noticed the non stick had come off and was sticking to my food  further inspection showed the bottom portion delaminating from the basket  who knows how long this has been flaking into my meals     i m very bothered by this and can t recommend the unit as that s a serious health hazard

love this unit just beeps beeps beeps too loud    easy fix though  unplug and make sure it s cooled off     remove the top  it s just held down with plastic clips so a butter knife around the edges and pry up     look inside  again   make sure this is unplugged    you ll see a small round black speaker with buzr next to it  just put a little sticker or tape over the top     replace the top by just pressing it back down and that s it  a very nice low volume beep

i purchased cosori af on          thru amazon  the reviews were outstanding  i didn t consider any other brands  i haven t used it a lot but i had a couple of issues with the performance of the unit  i joined a face book group for cosori air fryer recently which is super helpful with recipes and using the af  with my af having some issues and almost a year after purchase i thought i was just going to throw out the af  i contacted support cosori com  one day ago  sent some pictures  receipt etc and told them my issues with the af  they were outstanding  quick to respond  they are replacing my air fryer immediately  all within    hours of contacting them   i am so impressed with cosori customer service  they truly stand behind their product  i would highly recommend doing business with cosori and join the fb cosori air fryer group and you will be making wonderful meals  i see why cosori is a top rated air fryer with amazon

my first air fryer and definitely not disappointed  this thing works great  i love having crispy fries  fish sticks  chicken nuggets  chimichangas  etc  i ve made a few the recipes in the book it came with and yum  great for cooking salmon  pork chops  and of course fried chicken  i ve adjusted a few of the recipes as the cooking time needed a little adjusting for the thickness but that was expected  try parmesan garlic asparagus in this  just need some oil  garlic salt  parmesan and of course asparagus  about   minutes later  depending on thickness  at     degrees    yum make sure you get the right spray oil for this  it can cause a sticky residue build up

the tray is very hard to clean  even with extreme care  the teflon coating is peeling off which is not healthy at all  reached out to customer service several times but no help or action as of today  i am happy to revisit my review if i hear back and get this issue addressed  updated from   to   stars customer service provided assistance and sent us a replacement tray with no questions asked   i will chalk their response time to the pandemic that s impacting everyone

i ve had mine for a week now and really like it  i read reviews mentioning a plastic smell and taste  so i unboxed it  wash the baskets in warm soapy water  dried them  put them in the unit  and did   preheat cycles at           and     degrees  removed baskets each time and let it cool before doing another cycle  yep  smelled like plastic  then i did a test run with frozen crinkle cut fries  they cooked up good  crispy  tender on the inside   but smelled like plastic  tossed them out  undeterred  i cooked another batch  this time with meat rub seasoning  still a little plastic aroma but not as bad  wiped it out  did a couple more     degree preheats  let it cool and then did a batch of frozen hatch chili chicken wings  that did the trick  no more plastic smell  tasted great  i ve made different things since then and the plastic smell is gone  so before you make something you put a lot into  run some preheat cycles and cheap frozen foods through it to season it  works great now

i loved my cosori air fryer  i used it once a week and always cleaned well  after only   months it started leaking grease and smoking out black smoke  i don t know what i did wrong but it stopped working after   months

i like the wifi option and the ability to use an app  setting it up is not the easiest  maybe i had a slight dud out the box but the front panel isn t user friendly  to scroll through the functions or even push the buttons seem to be difficult  i ve hade it since february and just now writing this review  don t get me wrong once you get it working  its a great air fryer but the controls are difficult  and at this price point which is not overly expensive  i need it to be user friendly  i just finally got tired of fighting with the controls and donated this air fryer to goodwill and got a ninja which so far works better for the same price

not only do the screw pop off of the unit into your food while cooking  the drawer does not stay shut and pops open during the cook time  what a waste of money  a screw holding securing the basket to the air fryer popped off while cooking  and ended up in my food  i nearly broke all of my teeth because of this  i would not recommend that you buy this product unless you re willing to inspect your food prior to putting it in your mouth every time you use it  seems like their is a massive design flaw  screws should not end up in your food ps  i cannot not put the back because it is so burnt and corroded from the cooking process  so the unit isn t functioning as it should

i m still learning how to use it  but i am overall happy with my purchase it cooks hot  i have found the recipe book settings to be too much  i have burned a few things  my advice   check your food several times after the half way time  whether or not the meat is room temperature may make a big difference in cooking times i like the oven fry potatoes a lot  the thinner you slice them  the crispier they get  i have cooked   large russet potatoes in there  but it might hold up to    for smaller food items likes fries  it is imperative that you toss them at the midpoint  otherwise they have zebra stripes at the end i also like chicken thighs  super easy  i like to marinate them in olive oil and teriyaki sauce  but the great thing is  you can use any marinade  barbecue sauce  chipotle sauce  tikka masala sauce  anything  my wife likes harissa sauce  the basket holds    i have found that    minutes is too long  crispy on the outside  juicy and tender on the inside negatives   the unit is noisier than i anticipated  about the sound of your stove top hood running on medium  the non stick coating seems thin  i have already scratched it  rubber tipped tongs are recommended  the basket is not easy to get totally clean a   minute warm up is recommended  but i m going to experiment with shortening that  most cooking times are going to be       minutes  so it s       minutes per batch

we have been using this air fryer for a few weeks and we are really happy with the quality of the cooking and the convenience   i have never made my own fried chicken and was pleasantly surprised how easy it was   heating up frozen foods for my kids has been really easy and quick and the quality is there   i also had to contact customer service with an issue and they took care of me in a quick and easy manner   i am looking forward to trying new recipes and i think the air fryer is a great alternative to frying in oil

made in china junk  just purchased one of these and it was junk out the box  touch screen wouldn t work so i called customer support  the lady laughs and says oh yes we are aware of this problem  she then tells me this is a known problem and they will send a new one out at the end of the month  end of the month  then says but i can help you get it connected to wifi so you can use it  well unless you have     which i have  g like most everyone this unit is useless  sure glad i had everything ready to cook and this piece of junk wouldn t work  if they re aware of this issue why are they still selling them  buy if you d like but i d do a hard pass

a year ago  i was not an air fryer fan at all  one day  i saw a youtube video of somebody cooking with an air fryer i watched out of curiosity  since i like to cook  when it finished  i got more curios about it  so i search more videos i couldn t believe all the things you can cook   i research for   or   month and finally  i ordered one  cosori was number one on all the ones i did research  i choose the     qts   my kitchen doesn t have oil splatters anymore and the basket is a cinch to clean       recommended  cleaning the stove top was not my favorite thing  nor washing all the pots and pans   only thing to clean   the basket  period

i m in love with an air fryer  for real  this has been such an amazing addition to my kitchen and i have raved to every one of my friends and said they must get one  so easy to use and i used it to cook raw shrimp  herb rubbed chicken  anything frozen like chicken nuggets  pizza rolls  fries etc  my kids favorite is now egg rolls and spring rolls from it because they are even more crispy than if it was baked in an oven  it saves me time   i m a busy working mom and we have a crazy sports schedule and this has been such a time saver to feed my family and get out the door  it always saves my home from heating up more during the summer from oven use

i bought this back in july    and we looooooove it  i bought the     one because i usually make enough dinner so my husband can take lunch the next day  it has been perfect  an  x  pan sits in it perfectly  which means my    week pregnant self has been making freezer meals so we can have ready made dinners once baby is here so far i ve made full racks of ribs in it  muffins  cheesecakes  bacon  eggs  grilled cheese  all kinds of meat and veggies  biscuits    you name it  i know this is one appliance that if it goes out  i will replace without hesitation   by the way  the only think that i have not liked in it was a steak  i like my steaks cooked on cast iron so they have a good sear  some may like it in the air fryer   i  personally  didn t  my gas bill has dropped because i use the cosori air fryer daily instead of my oven  yay

ordered this cosori max xl      quart air fryer after reading and researching  it has so far exceeded my expectations  it is easy to cook and easy to clean  i made fried shrimp upon receiving it and they were delicious  i sprayed them lightly with pam cooking spray and used a cracker meal batter  today i made a   lb pork loin  cut in half to fit pan  i seasoned it with garlic salt and lawry s seasoned salt and drizzle italian dressing on it  i started it on      for    minutes and flipped it halfway through  i then dropped the temp to      for another    minutes  it came out juicy and tender and so delicious  if i could give this more than   stars  i would  my fryer arrived in    hours and the delivery man even put it under a small awning on our porch to keep it dry from the rain

personally it has worked flawlessly  some have commented bout the keypad being a problem but i ve found that you need to use quick taps and not longer presses to get it to adjust settings  out of the box did onion rings  egg rolls and twice baked potatoes without a hitch  i can see a light bit of oil spray  pam  will improve these even further  a little practice will go a long way to making you a good cook with one of these  they are not magic boxes but a tool to save you all the hassles of deep frying things  the included cookbook is a nice starting point and has useful recipes to get you going  i did buy additional accessories because the pans   racks etc  i had on hand were jut a bit too large to fit  i would recommend at least getting some parchment liners to make cleaning as easy as possible  i haven t seen it mentioned anywhere yet  but i m betting this is going to be the best hot nacho maker ever invented
