i ordered this air fryer as a christmas gift for my son  which was given to him by his grandparents   as i was in the hospital with a broken leg   foot  i did not see the item when opened  he never mentioned the item being white  ordered the black  and saw it this past weekend at his home when visiting   it s maddening for me to order an item and it come in wrong  i wish he had said something so i could set up a return  he s used it several times and said it crisps nicely for the price you pay for this air fryer  it should ve been correct and it wasn t  hence the less stars

update   i was moving my air fryer and the drawer   basket fell out   crashed to a brick floor   the fall s force caused pieces of plastic to break off on both pieces   i actually cried   it was usable  but seemed unsafe as the pieces no longer locked to together or stayed in place while cooking   i researched buying replacement pieces   found i could only buy the inner basket   i emailed cosori to see if i could buy the outer drawer from them   they generously replaced both pieces even though the damage was inflicted by me   not covered by the warranty  they arrived on thursday   i have used it every day since     if i hadn t been afraid of falling on the ice   snow  i would ve jumped for joy   thank you cosori for such great customer service i often fall victim to buying kitchen tools appliances that will change the way i cook   in short  they never do   until my cosori  air fryer   i absolutely love it   i use it at least weekly  and i continue to be surprised by what i can make in it   i ve made the frozen foods snacks  veggies  flank steak  ribs  bacon  many chicken dishes including tacos   chimichangas  donuts from biscuit dough  etc   i even took it on our vacation this year   we had room in the car  so why not   it is the   kitchen appliance that i do not regret buying   i tell everyone to get     i even bought a cheap version for my son to take to college   when he sets out on his own   i ll buy him the cosori

awesome  i have had my air fryer for about   weeks and i use it everyday  i have made chicken wings  regular fries  sweet potato fries  hot dogs  roasted corn  tortilla chips  churros  bacon  this list is never ending  and everything turns out great i watched may hours o reviews on youtube and comparisons  this was my choice for the price point and size  i got the     quart  i have a family if    do you get an idea it fits   whole ears of corn at once the only thing i would suggest is to get the stainless steel model only because it has the temperature and time on different buttons it is a hassle to have to push a button to alternate between these two important settings  i wish i would have noticed that before buying this is the only thing i don t love   buy it and enjoy  you will be obsessed

this is a sleek air fryer with excellent pre programming  it is very easy to use  i like to line the pan with parchment paper on the bottom to avoid moisture loss and for extra cleanliness  but do not have excess paper over the top  as it will singe with the heating element  it is durable and very easy to clean  the pans do fit in the bottom tray of the dish washer if you need to deep clean them  the unit does get warm but not alarmingly hot when in use  the beep function to remind you to shake the food is useful  makes tofu  fries  carrots  chicken  to perfection  used every week for a quick meal with painless cleanup  and no greasy splatter yay  i like the square shape it stacks well with other items on the counter  i like that it doesn t look too busy

this is one of the best purchases i ve ever made   we ve made so many batches of wings in this thing  even made entire meals  it makes way better wings than my oven has ever made  and way faster  chicken  potatoes  vegetables  fries  pizza rolls  grilled cheese sandwiches    it cooks everything   anything you might want to fry will taste       better from this thing  fits lots of food  perfect for bigger families  fast  fast cook times  i can t say enough  we love this air fryer

i have had my cosori for   months and my meals have become so easy and delicious  i had just moved in and my countertop appliances were not expected for weeks  i purchased the cosori and it is the only countertop appliance i have  all the others went into storage and will eventually get donated  for breakfast i make omelets  toast  cheese toast  toasted bagels and a delicious breakfast sandwich on an everything bagel  in a cravet i use alittle olive oil  egg and sausage patty  roast at     for    min  the bagel is sliced and goes in the basket with the egg blend for another     minutes  enjoy  i marinate my meats in single portion ziplock  i prepare a veggie medley of olive oil  dales seasoning  dry rub or seasoning to choice  salt and pepper in a large bowl with zucchini  summer squash  mushrooms  cherry tomatoes  vidalia onion  chopped fresh asparagus  and sweet peppers  i then choose between tater tots  sweet potato fries or french fries  i will add the meat  spoon my veggie medley in and my choice of fries  the cooking temperature of     at    minutes usually prepares my meals to delicious perfection  my favorite is salmon as the salmon is the best i have ever had  i have found i will not need to go out to eat after the virus quarintene is over as most restaurant food will come in a distant second  i am still experimenting with different meals and honestly have not even opened the cookbook which came with the fryer  my alexa is somewhere in storage and have not found it yet  but the display is so simple  i don t think alexa can make it any easier  i maybe wrong  but at this time i don t need it  the cosori is easy to clean  takes only a minute and ready to back into use  again  enjoy  this is a great product

i had been shopping for an air fryer for about a year and when this showed up in my search on prime day  i decided to take a chance  there are sooo air fryers to choose from so i feel lucky that i love this purchase  it s been super hot in socal  i ve used the air fryer almost every single day to make fries  hot dogs  homemade meatballs and salmon patties  frozen dumplings  toasted bread  reheated leftovers  etc  i appreciate how quickly the preheat happens  the hot air circulated nicely to cook food evenly and quickly   i move the air fryer to the backyard when i cook so it doesn t heat up my house and i keep the cooking smells outside  the one trick i would suggest for any airfryer is to be sure to shake the basket every     minutes  shaking makes a world of difference  the basket holds more than enough food for the   of us  i will be taking this to the next level soon   like baking muffins and cake  can t wait

this arrived with some sort of oily film on the front screen   it is impossible to remove   yes  i removed the plastic label cover with the writing on it    looks like somebody with greasy fingers wiped their hands on it   can t remove it no matter what   looked like someone had previously tried because the plastic had a lot of light scratches   just didn t look clean   i don t know if it is the type of plastic used or what  but just didn t look clean to me   once i pressed a few buttons  my fingerprints were quite obvious   i have better things to do than wipe a screen constantly  especially when it still looks greasy after i do   also  i didn t like the flimsiness of the shield button on the basket   i know there are a lot of good reviews out there  maybe i just got a reject

i use it several times a week  it is simple to use and to clean  i ve had it three months  so far these are the things i have tried in it  bacon chicken wings chicken drummies chicken thighs chicken legs chicken breasts pork tenderloins pork chops swordfish hamburgers hard boiled eggs   not really boiled but cooked in the shell until hard  sausage links sausage patties asparagus cauliflower carrots onions french fries cornish hens toasted cheese sandwiches  i like everything i ve cooked in it  some more than others  for instance  carrots  i liked them but i really prefer the taste of them cooked another way  the roasted cauliflower was one of my favs   i gotta tell you  as much as we like wings  that would make it worth the purchase alone   we were down at our cabin with friends  i had taken the air fryer down there with us  one day i made wings  flats and drummies  no sauce  they ate and ate and ate  went home and ordered their own fryer   bacon is another thing  it s amazing  you pour out the grease and wash the pan and boom  you are done  no mess    it s really just a small convection oven  i don t know why but i could never achieve the same results in the large one i have in my kitchen   i m a big fan of mine so much so that i would like to buy another one so i could cook two dishes at the same time  hubby would have a fit though   all this being said  the food does not cook itself  you do have to prepare it and by that i mean oil and seasoning  you also have to experiment with cook times  and you have to check on the food when it s cooking so that you don t over cook it   i use a facebook page that was set up by cosori for tips and questions  the people on there are always very helpful  also whenever i want to cook something  i just google  air fryer             that usually brings up some nice recipes   i bought cosori because i didn t want to pay     dollars for the phillips  which is top rated  the gowise was second rated but it has horrible reviews on amazon  i opted for the cosori which got good reviews and a fair price

i am not sure why i waited all this time to get an air fyer  so i need to make up for lost time  it s easy to cook and easy to clean  i cook a lot on a charcoal grill  but this beats it  i will share one of my favorite chicken recipes jerk chicken thighs  chicken thighs  tbs of low sodium soy sauce  tbs of olive oil  tbs of island spice jerk seasoning  from amazon toss them up in mixing bowl  let it marinate for    mins  then  put in preheated air fyer for    mins at     deg  flipping it halfway thru  check temp when done

this was my second purchase after i returned the first for digital display malfunctions  this one has the same issue  instead of returning it to amazon i reached out to the cosori company with a request to assist  they were very apologetic and helpful with this  they said i could return it but i didn t want to  i requested a replacement so i could get them the defective one to find out what went wrong  they sent me a replacement and man so much better all buttons work and we love it  this is a great product even when it only worked sometimes  i recommend it to anyone that wants to air fry their food

when i received my air fryer  some of the buttons did not work properly  i could still use the fryer but it was a bit of a pain without all of the buttons i contacted cosori directly despite buying from amazon  and they immediately offered to send me a new fryer at no cost to me  within   days it had arrived and this time works perfectly  great customer service  thanks cosori as to actually using the machine  it s pretty good all around  only used it a few times but so far so good

i purchased this air fryer after the one i had fell apart   i used it but not everyday   the teflon inside had come off and the clips holding the basket fell out   i am happy to say that i received a refund since it was less than a year   with so many now on the market this one caught my eye   its color and finish is perfect   i chose the red   the inside is larger than whati had so it fits more  and the size is perfect   this is kind of square which fits on my counter much better than the round one   made a few dinners and everything came out perfect   clean up was better than my last   anything left inside slid right out   i am very happy with my purchase and will look forward to making some of the recipes that came with air fryer

this review would be a   star if it werent for   reasons    it doesnt like alexa  i can ask alexa to preheat the air fryer and it turns it on bake french fries mode  it doesnt work as well as other alexa devices i have       do    the button panel on this thing sucks  changing the temperature and the time daunting  i have to hit the temp button     plus times to activate the temperature change mode then have to hit       wait     hit       wait the plus minus buttons on the in hopes that i dont go over what im trying to get too  the time adjustment is the exact same way the cooking  cleaning  the taste  the ease  its all there  maybe its just my machine but im not happy with it  its very frustrating

update  i have to raise this to   stars for the simple fact that this company actually reads the reviews and will respond  i received an e mail from this company out of the blue in regards to my prior review  they promptly obtained my information and sent me another unit  this company is top notch in my opinion  i did not request a new unit as i waited beyond the time to return do to work travel  they reached out and proceeded to take care of my situation  i would highly recommend this company   prior review   not simple to use  the main touch screen control panel will not allow you to adjust the time or temp  it seems to be only for preset cooking  not all the screen options are usable  if you want to adjust the time and temp you must down load an app and connect to the fryer through wi fi to you properly control this unit  i would definitely purchase another brand if still shopping

we live in a hot climate  all year   this eliminates heating up the house by using the oven which is a huge plus for us  the buttons are great for people who don t really cook  just preheat  using the preheat button  and choose what you re cooking  there s a chicken button  a pork button  a root vegetable button and so on  this was also a great function for someone like myself  it s that easy  the nonstick is just that  avoid using sprays like pam  as that s what will take the coating off as you may see in other reviews  just dab olive oil or get a  spray mister  that you can put your olive oil into  we don t have a lot of counter space so we store it in a cabinet and because it s lightweight   another plus for this gal  the cleaning is as simple as cleaning a nonstick cookie sheet  done  make sure to follow their facebook page for recipes or help  we ve cooked steak  chicken  pork  cauliflower and brussel sprouts so far and have yet to be disappointed

unit look great and cooks great  when it works  two major challenges  first there are a dozen presets on the front of unit but only   actually work when you push them  in addition the temperature adjustment buttons do not work   second challenge is the fry basket pops out about   minutes into cooking  every time  and i have to hold it back in for at least    seconds to get it to stay back in and finish cooking

i don t normally come back to post reviews  and in this case  i waited a little while so i didn t get carried away by great first impressions  well  after owning the cosori for a while  i can safely say this air fryer is                great  it s just great when you see a product with sooooooooooooooo many great reviews from verified buyers  you feel a large amount of trust in your purchase  still  anything can happen  right  this air fryer is everything i thought it would be and more  perfect in execution  large basket size  easy to clean  and it looks great on one of my kitchen counters to anyone concerned about noise  take a moment to understand how these devices work  there s a fan inside that circulates the heat coming off a heating element  there s a small exhaust area on the back of this air fryer that pushes out some warm air  this fan does  not  put out noise that should bother you at all  i think you d have to be super sensitive to the smallest noises to even care  i ve had the air fryer running about   feet away from me while i m watching tv and i don t even notice it  again   look at all the verified  great  reviews and make up your own mind i couldn t be happier with this purchase  and i look forward to medium to heavy use of this cosori air fryer in the future

wow   this thing is amazing  u can drop in a couple frozen solid chicken breasts spray with olive oil sprinkle salt and pepper and    min later have browned tender juicy delicious chicken   i have made all kinds of simple easy tasty stuff  google how to cook anything in air fryer its always easy  cleans with a damp sponge  so easy so healthy   i just bought a second one for my dad  great product   get this big size one  u need space around the food for it to cook correctly

i was never sure that i would like using an air fryer  saw the many adds but could never see how it would take the place of my regular oil fryer     years old and now i find that i have a new best friend  my cosori air fryer  i have found that i can make everything so much faster and easier and i am not disappointed in the results  from steaks to veggies  to my favorite grilled cheeses  the air fryer has made my life so much easier  so quick  so easy  and very easy to clean and maintain  and  no oil  my grease can  that i used to drain my pains into after every fry  is no longer here  my expensive cooking oil purchases are gone  and nothing is easier and quicker than preparing snacks for my grandkids when they visit  thank you for teaching an old dog new tricks   great buy and well worth it

i had an incredibly disturbing experience tonight  my boyfriend literally ended up with a screw in his mouth  i cooked some potatoes in the air fryer and it appears that two screws popped off of the inside of the inner basket and into the potatoes  this is incredibly dangerous  he could have choked or broken a tooth  don t want to think about what would have happened if this had happened to a small child  i ve only had the air fryer for a month and use it just once or twice a week  so light use   see attached pictures  was very happy with the air fryer up to this point but i feel that this shows a safety concern that i can t overlook

i liked this air fryer   it has a nice design and also offered a wi fi connection to be used with a phone app  i read some nice reviews about it but unfortunately forgot to read the bad ones   the touch display didn t work and only way to use the fryer was thru the app  which worked flawlessly btw     but even though that s an nice feature it s not ways possible or convenient to use it  after that i found a bunch reviews stating the same problem what to me shows a lack of quality control

i had an actifry from tfal for many years and was really happy with it for some applications but was irritated that the stirring mechanism kept me from air frying larger items or fragile items  my actifry finally broke and i went in search of a replacement  i googled best air fryers and this was number one on the list i can t believe how easy it is to cook with this appliance  the buttons are all very user friendly  the basket is coated in non stick and has generous air holes but they aren t large enough that food falls through  it has been a breeze to clean  i ve had it for a week and we ve made fried chicken  schnitzel  brussels sprouts  tater tots  fries  mozzarella sticks  pot stickers and jalapeno poppers in it  everything turned out great and nothing was hard to clean up  not even the fried chicken  the bottom basket tray is also coated in non stick  i soaked it in warm water for   minutes and it wiped clean i have a family of   and we had to split the fried chicken into   batches  it comfortably fit   thighs in one batch and a breast and   legs in the next  i just kept the first batch on a plate covered to keep warm and then popped them back in for a minute after the  nd batch to heat them up

received this for christmas  it s easy to use  easy to clean  and makes some things super crispy   good  makes amazing french fries but doesn t hold much so have to make several batches for my french fry loving family positives  easy to use  good crispiness on most foods we ve tried  even pre blanched green beans   easy to clean  lots of recipes online negative  doesn t hold much food at one time note  i ve no clue why you would want a wifi connection for your air fryer    think that s just a marketing gimmick

let me just start by saying an amazing product i ve cooked lots of  fried chicken  french fries and other things  at first took me a little time to get use to the flavor with out all the oil but let me tell you i never got sick from my stomach again after eating fried chicken from this air fryer so worth every penny   it takes a little time to get used to cooking your food the way you want but once you do it s amazing so i truly recommend this product

this is awesome  very healthy option and it already has featured timers temp according to which food product you would like to cook it shaves a lot of time off of some products and it comes out crispyi ve already done  chicken  bacon all the time   tater tots  fries  and even steak definitely worth the price and yes it is huge i say each portion is a good     ppli ve never tried other air fryers so i don t know where this one would fall on the comparison level  but as a beginner i can tell you this is great for a first purchase air fryer

never had an air fryer before and did a bit of research before settling on the corsori   it is a perfect size for    people  is incredibly easy to clean  by hand or dishwasher   simple to use and good instructions  light enough to store away in cabinet  works like a charm   we use it weekly for the obvious   buffalo wings  fries  egg rolls  kale chips    believe you will be satisfied with performance

this machine cooks well and is easy to use and clean   however  it fills the house with a burning plastic or burning metal smell which permeates the food as well   i have made several meals in this and washed it per the instructions  and the smell is not going away regardless of the food setting that is used   i am not sure if the smell is from the teflon coating  the heating element or elsewhere in the machine  but the smell is toxic and sickening  and it completely ruins the food   there are many reviews that complain about this   cosari needs to redesign this   i am returning it

not happy with fryer at this time  there is no book telling you how to cook things  just a how long to cook  how do you make fried chicken in it  how do you make crispy fries   and it s a lot smaller than i wanted  cleaning was hard because food got stuck in the ridges  i prob would of liked it more if there was a cook book with it on how to cook with it  so it just sits in my kitchen

our oven broke so we were debating on what to do since it s only two of us in the house  first thought was an air fryer  best idea ever  this thing works like magic  very easy to work with and is not loud at all  also for a little more   you can add their extra pans  a must for us  so far i made chicken with   sides and everything cooked throughly very well   nd was frozen pizza and pizza rolls those cooked very crispy better then oven my opinion  you can fit so much but do not pack as you want everything to cook well update  became my best friend loli ll be adding pictures as i use it

i was so excited to try the air fryer  however it didn t turn on when plugged in   i prepared everything to cook with the air fryer  but i couldn t turn it on   my husband and i spent about an hour to try everything but still the air fryer wouldn t work   i should have tried to turn it on first before preparing the food   i ended up frying everything with oil the old way   i was so disappointed   the machine had a sticker qc passed on it   i returned it   never want to try a product from this manufacture again

after looking into any issues with the air fryer purchased   error code  e   started coming on whenever we started the fryer  worked around it by manually setting time and temp  looked into trouble shooting and read if this error code repeatedly shows to return the product  i called the customer support and only got a person on the phone wanting to sell me a      credit for using my credit card to purchase the card for        return says i had till november   th to return  which would have been fine if the error code showed within that period of time  not sure of my options at this time and look forward to someone contacting me about this issue to further the issue  it is now february   th and we have had to put the air fryer away when it started smoking when we were attempting to cook some fries  everytime we have used it since our first review we have had to reset the temp and the time  sometimes that worked  sometimes it didn t  this was the last  straw when it started smoking and looked like it was an electrical risk  as stated before  reached out to manufacturer and have not been able to contact  i want to return the airfryer but have not way of doing so  never  never will i buy or even consider purchasing anything from this company again   one of the reasons we bought the cosori was it was highly recommended and a fav of amazon

so i had owned a competing brand and it honestly never worked properly  the touch pad buttons never really worked the down key went out completely in the first   months so it was impossible to move time or temp down  it did do it s job and the cooking was so easy i could not bare the thought of losing it for even one day  so i made work arounds that did the trick for all the gourmia s many shortfalls  when the corsori arrived i was hopeful but not overly so because i had tried the ninja foodi first and was also disappointed in it s shortcomings  tried to do too much and did nothing well   so i took out the basket ah ha  square  not circular or semi squarish with a kind of tapering basket but actually square  the basket also seemed noticeably larger even though it was only half a quart bigger  the button functionality is awesome many  many presets and it easy to adjust to whatever time or temp you need  the one con i would say is that you have to empty the fryer basket every time you use it  there is no space because of the size of the basket  other than that awesome machine

i  think i must be the happiest customer ever   lol  i never cooked well in my life and i was pretty much buying food from delis  restaurants  grocery stores for my family  and this can be very costly and not always the healthiest  so i decided to give it a try after all my friends told me about the magical air fryer  i was looking literally for a magical device where i could press a button and ta da  food would be ready  and i found it   it s the cosori air fryer  family is super happy and all meals have been delicious  now my kids think i am a great chef  hahaha prosit s easy to cook and to clean comes with a little recipe book  and i also bought some extra gadgets to cook other plates  has great customer support conswish i had known about it earlier lol      totally recommend it  be like nike and just do it

i had looked for awhile for an air fryer  final found this one   i wanted a tray that would hold more food  this is square with rounded edges so you can fit chicken legs  fish  etc because of the size   other fryers are round and have lower quality  but not cosori   great quality   i love the extended warranty  recipe book and you can see recipes on their facebook profile   this is awesome and have recommended it to friends   love it  though it was a gift to myself and my husband uses it all the time     stars if they rated it to

this fryer does exactly what it s supposed to do   meats are cooked to perfection and they are not dried out   this appliance saves me so much time   i can season and throw wings in the fryer and they re done in    minutes   i also have air fried steak  lamb and chicken breasts in the fryer   i love this machine   my husband  who is very picky about his meals  loves the way the meat tastes   i strongly recommend

i ve been hearing about these air fryers but didn t purchase because i recently purchased a  qt multi cooker  i wanted something versatile but easy to use  i must say i ve used this air fryer   times and have not used my multi cooker at all  what sets the corosi apart is how easy it is to use  the one push cook buttons make everything so easy  the first time i used it  i made potato wedges  had a nice crisp to them   i should ve taken a picture  next  i cooked   ny strip steaks  listen  those steaks were so tender  cooked to perfection   i would like more of a sear on them next time so i may try something different  finally  the chicken wings    baby never in my life have i had chicken wings so light but crispy and flavorful without the grease  i m never cooking friend chicken in a pan again  i m going to try salmon  sweet potato fries  pizza and veggies next  i love the shake function and it s easy to clean  the recipe book is nice but i haven t used it yet definitely worth the money and there is no need to buy a more expensive one  i can t imagine another item in my kitchen that s worth      i am seriously considering returning my multi cooker because of this savior  buy it  you won t regret it

the size of this air fryer is great  you can fit    wings in here  chicken  bigger items without doing several different cooks  performs great  i like the separate basket and bottom which makes cleaning and juggling it easier  it is bulky because of its size  but the material is a little cheap i ve had this for several months and still good  my only complaints are it s a little cheap material and the digital screen can be finicky  the drawer has smoke that comes out so it s not completely shut  and the smell of it isn t amazing  but it cooks fantastically

don t know why my friend chose to purchase this from me  my friends oven broke and i brought this one over  i un boxed it at her house  upon unboxing  product felt okay  we cooked the fryer part is tiny  the features are pretty  but the handle is jacked up and made very cheaply  it also cooked very fast  you can definitely cut your cooking time in half  it even cooks faster than the ninja  the original air fryer  i have a ninja and love that  anyway  she called me to tell me she wanted to keep it  was going to pay me  she is so sorry but the handle broke when she was opening it  i told her no way  i will return it but she insisted to keep it

we ve owned  but rarely used  a much smaller air fryer of a different brand   after deciding to increase our air frying and reduce grease fat frying we purchased this cosori       it s wonderful   lots of room in the squarish basket   the times and temps in the recipe book are spot on   we ve cooked chicken  meats  and lots of vegetables with amazing success   meats and chicken came out with a crunch to the outside but nice and juicy and tender inside   and   this is an important point   with the air fryer there are no meat spatters on the stove top so less cleaning   the basket washes up easily  even after doing pork chops and chicken thighs   we are totally enjoying our new  more spacious fryer and have great plans for future meals

i was doubtful about an air fryer  but this one won me over  with the presets  it is so simple to use  it holds a lot  i often put about two pounds of veggies in it  we use it several times a week from fish to veggies  i bought an oil sprayer and keep melted coconut oil in it to spray on the food  then i add my favorite seasonings  preheat  add food   press preset  and turn on  at first  i forgot to turn it on after choosing the pre set  but i soon got in the habit i highly recommend this air fryer

simple  looks modern  not too bulky  bpa free  fast and easy to clean  placing it into out off is a little tricky    the plastic slider is flimsy  can t use paper as it can lead to a fire    can t overcook anything because of the carcinogen  burnt parts     learning curve with the types of foods      loud but tolerable     beeps when u need to shake      can use your phone to preheat thats convenient    still there are plenty on offerup    bought for baked potatoes   fried tofu and cooking veggies instead of the oven

so the tray that slides into the air fryer is poorly designed    you have to slide this button for the tray to slide in  over time this is going to break or wear away and not work anymore   you have to unscrew the main grill from the tray to clean this  even if you had a dishwasher it would be very hard to clean those two reasons are enough for me to return and realize that im going tohate this thing down the road and realize i wasted my money  its like a bad relationship you know its going to end up bad and migth as well get out now

so far my family and i are loving this air fryer  only have had it for a few days   user friendly  great tasting  perfectly crispy    i did not start out with high expectations either   i had bought an oven type previously it was terrible  fried chicken etc awful   took it back   i ll do another review in the near future on it but can t see it ll change are minds maybe just more food suggestions    hamburgers  corn dogs  pizza rolls  chicken nuggets  fried chicken  blackened salmon fillets  and french fries all have been excellent     will highly recommend this

i think air fryer is a misnomer  this is really a compact convection oven  it has a heater and a fan  it is an intense convection oven  it produces a wide variety of foods with unique characteristics  in addition to mimicking oil frying pretty well  i find it works especially well for breaded chicken and catfish  frozen french fries  frozen breaded shrimp and fish  sauteed vegetables like mushrooms and zucchini  and drummies  i am using my cosori almost every day and it is adding a new creative element to my cooking  i am using my regular oven quite a bit less

i use this everyday for everything we had purchased another   star highly rated air fryer  we sent it back  uneven  unstable etc  this device is the one for us  i use it to heat leftovers  crisp baked potatoes  and for  grilled  cheese sandwiches  my mouth is watering writing this review recommended

love my cosori air fryer  i had a different one that was very messy to clean but this cosori amazingly doesn t get near as greasy as my old powerxl  i wonder if it s the shape or something  i like that it s more square inside  also  it is truly non stick  very easy to clean  it doesn t seem to have a coating on the basket or inside like my old one  so there is no peeling  i like that it has the preheat function which it says is crucial for proper frying  i get good results  but the best thing is how easy it is to clean  food doesn t stick  it is not a chore to clean it like my old one was  i would definitely get this same one again if something happened to it  ive had it several months now  so i know what i m talking about   lol

this is great for making french fries  corn dogs  tater tots  frozen chicken wings  mostly frozen stuff unhealthy stuff  ha   tried a few recipes out of the book when it first arrived  but they came out so dry  it took some trial and error but i ve finally got the hang of it  it does have a mind of its own every once in awhile it won t shut off or pause  but i m overall pleased  paid it s worth just in making the kids fries

we have been using our air fryer now for about   months pretty regularly   roasted veggies  chicken wings  fries  and all sorts of stuff   we love it cosori is also a great brand that stands behind their product   our basket had the   screws that hold the handle start loosening   they have lock washers  but my guess is the frequent heat cycling between cooking and then cleaning allowed it to loosen up   easy enough to tighten up   but i emailed support  and they sent us a new basket free of charge   we can now alternate and the screws don t seem to back off now   very happy with the product  and happier with the support

mom was happy using the wifi app and the internet went out  there was no warning  cable didn t go out  and the food burned  have to unplug the fryer to stop the cooking  if you don t know you need to watch the time and depend on the app  it s a bad situation  plus  you cannot use the machine without internet  you can stop by unplugging but you need the app to start the food

basket size is square and large enough to prepare food for   people  or more    very easy to clean  even in the dishwasher   we were somewhat doubtful that this type of appliance was something we needed  but after a day or two it became a regular in our kitchen  chicken wings  vegetables  pork roasts etc  cook much more quickly than in the oven and it doesn t heat up the kitchen   comes with easy directions and a nice selection of recipes   strongly recommended updated review  we continue to use this appliance more and more over time  it has continued to amaze me with the range of cooking it can do  whole chickens  sausage patties  hamburgers  whole sweet potatoes and more come out perfectly   pork chops in this air fryer are the best we have ever eaten   even better than using the souse vide method   much quicker and easier as well although we have used this air fryer multiple times a week for almost a year  it has absolutely no signs of wear  other products i have read reviews on often speak about the finish flaking off and other defects    but not so with this product  truly a great product that i continue to recommend in the strongest terms

i really love this air fryer   i use it almost daily   it has replaced our old fryer completely   it is easy to use and cooks my food perfectly   after using it constantly for a few months  mine started to have some issues with the door popping open by itself while cooking   i reached out to the seller and they were very responsive  and replaced it for me right away   the new one works great  and i haven t had any issues with it   i appreciate the healthier cooking option for my family  as we can enjoy many of our favorite fried foods without the unhealthy oils

don t buy  impossible to remove tray and basket easily  costs a lot of money to be so difficult to use  pieces are plastic and break easily  it s big  bulky  has no  stop to shake  option for chicken  but mainly it s so difficult to use  if it cooked well  it doesn t   it burns easily  you would be willing to put up with everything but it s not and you should buy something else

only had it for   days  i got it monday it came fast  only took   days to receive it  i got the red one and love it  it goes great in my kitchen  the     quart is perfect for my teenage son and i  no smell  easy to use  easy to clean   dishwasher safe too   non stick and food comes out great  so far i have made chicken wings  chicken legs and salmon in it and everything has been delicious   sooo many things you can cook in it  even cakes and other desserts and toast bread  oh can t forget making bacon too  it came with a recipe book as well over     recipes  so far it s a great product and no issues  happy with my purchase

i was apprehensive about trying an air fryer but had heard a lot about them  totally impressed   not only is the styling excellent for sitting on a counter  but it is easy to use and very easy to clean up   where we live  we can t bbq and this was the unexpected answer to our problem  we cannot believe how wonderful it cooks meat    juicy and brown  i recently roasted vegetables in it to make soup and it was just delcious and so easy  i have a lot to learn but have a list of recipes to try  i actually did   nice sized pork chops and they turned out perfect  we may get a second one and forego the stove   i highly recommend

i was in the market for a deep fryer  i assumed an air fryer to be a silly idea and could never touch the flavor or crispiness of a deep fryer   after having this for a few months and using it practically every other day  the wife was right   i wouldn t say it s absolutely equal  but i no longer want a deep fryer   reliable  easy to use  easy to clean  everything comes out great and it s so very low maintenance

bought this brand because it has been proven tried and true by a friend   love cooking meats in it  haven t had the oven on since getting it   it especially cooks salmon fillets perfectly   still trying to figure out how to make potatoes crispy like fries  but we rarely eat them anyway   am still experimenting with settings that i will enjoy most for the types of foods i cook  since i eat a keto diet  this is perfect   love it

i really love the basket size  the color  the ease of use   and the recipe book is really wonderful  but the burning plastic smell is overwhelming  it was so bad we moved it outside   hoping it would go away after a few uses  my kids were coughing it was so bad   but after   uses  including bacon and peppers  the smell was still intense  so much so you could not smell the food   very disappointed  i had my heart set on this one so so many reasons

i normally don t write review but with this company s outstanding customer service i am writing thus review since covid   in march  most of the restaurants in our state and areas are closed and we have to cook everyday   thanks to this air fryer  it makes our life easier   we used it almost everyday experiencing with all types of meats and vegetables   with so much use and knocking around the external basket was a little dented   i wrote to the company since this external basket was not in the market   the customer service was very helpful and they send me the external basket for free even after the warranty period was over and now i am a very happy customer   we still use the air fryer everyday everything comes out very flavourful and even the skin of chicken is crispy and the meat is still moist   perfect keep up the good work cosori   will buy again once my air fryer run its course

update  since we purchased this  we use it fairly regularly   it gets used  washed  and set out to dry  lately  we have not been as diligent with cleaning and i ve noticed a few things  the screws need to be tightened regularly  more importantly  the sides take a little longer to clean   today  i decided to put it in the dishwasher for the first time because it says  the nonstick basket is removable and dishwasher safe  made with pfoa free and bpa free basket materials    this is grossly misstated  i took it out of the dishwasher and it looks terrible  much of the coating has come off and there are spots all over it  btw  the dishwasher is about a year and a half old  such a disappointment that  i now have to get a replacement basket  those     quart baskets are not easy to come by  anyway  buyer beware i absolutely love this thing  i am just starting to use the app more frequently for different recipes  food comes out as expected  i bought an oil sprayer from amazon as well  helps to really keep fries crispy rather than using a tablespoon of oil like some recipes call for  been trying to convince my wife we need another because lets face it  if you make burgers in it  the fries would not be immediately ready when the burgers finish  same with veggies etc

we have made so many different foods in the air fryer   it s a learning process on  temperature and timing  but nothing we ve made has come out badly  fries are fast food delicious  chicken wings and fingers are just like out of the deep fryer with none of the mess  the basket holds     servings and is very easy to clean either by hand or in the dish washer  i would recommend this air fryer to anyone looking to cook food faster and without a lot of added oil   and just google whatever you re looking to make       there are lots of recipes out there

it smokes like a freight train   i had read some of the reviews saying it emits white smoke but i figured maybe it wasn t bad and i could live with it since it had some other options i wanted     however it pours white smoke and fills the whole house with smoke   i tried putting water in the pan as one person suggested but it didn t help   also the smoke causes condensation all over the air fryer and drips all onto the counter top   i ve had three other brand air fryers and none of them smoked   i don t think this is a defective fryer i think it s just something the cosori does   not acceptable to me  i will be returning and trying a different brand

i never had an air fryer before until now   this is an amazing device and it s so easy to make food that is healthier than frying it in straight oil   there is a nifty recipe book and you can find a lot of air fryer recipes on pinterest   the only issue i had was that some foods don t come out like i would like them  like bacon  i need it crispy  but it was not a deal breaker   i have only had this for about     weeks and i love it

buttons on the display are basically useless   not sure if mine is defective or common   works fine from the app  but don t always want to use my phone to cook  edit         i ended up calling the company and rhey sent me a replacement one free of charge    this one is a little better  but the button issue still exists

update to my initial   star review   cosori contacted me after reading my initial review and replaced the defected fryer with a new one   the replacement works great   i ve increased my review to   stars since they replaced it for me   they still should have taken care of this when i first called about the issue   i would also like them to improve their app initial   star review   cooks great  but the control panel is junk   i called customer service when i first got this and they offered no return on this and instead just said i m not pushing the buttons correctly   not sure what else i can do   i m pushing the buttons and nothing happens   i can sometimes get a few of them to work for awhile after turning it off and then back on but it s short lived   we ve gone to using the app  but that s not always a great solution either   after my wife uses it  i have to connect to the fryer again   this happens every time and is very annoying   if the manufacturer reads this review  you should replace my fryer with a new one

this is the real thing  love it  really  had doubts a few years ago about an air fryer but this thing works  steaks  potatoes  chops corn   on and on edit update still good  whole chicken good  boiled eggs bad  pork roast carnitas good  cod good  pizza good    everything needs experimenting on time and temp and use your eyes  i don t mind the noise  love that is does not heat up my kitchen  and for my wife and me it is great  i use it everyday this is not a miracle product and it has limitations  small basket even on the large unit   however  it does work  no hiccups yet with the electronics   some foods are just better in the big oven or in a gallon of oil still working on boiled eggs  though

i love this air fryer  i have cooked foods from meats  fresh   frozen french fries  potato skins  to chicken tenders all perfectly  i like that it keeps the meats crispy on the outside  but tender  it is so quick and easy to use  also i find it easy to clean the baskets and i can easily wipe it down inside   i have actually bought my son one for christmas  i am sure they will love theirs too

pros  this air fryer performs wonderfully  cooks food to perfection  settings are great  basket is a nice  big size  we use it almost daily and recommend it to everyone cons  we have owned this for six months and the basket is rusting  we don t wash it every time we use it  as many things don t create much grease at all  and when we do we hand wash and dry upside down on the counter  i m concerned that it s going to get worse and not sure i want to pay      twice a year to keep using something even as great as this

i ve pretty much cooked everything in here  from all types of meats  veggies  frozen foods  even deserts  everything comes out perfectly cooked  this has been one of my best investments  i highly recommend it  just make sure to sign up for the extended warranty  i purchased this air fryer back in december       after   year and  ish months it malfunctioned  it began to smoke up and release a burning order  i used it at least     times a week  i contacted cosori via email  and got a response within minutes  their customer service was excellent  a new replacement unit was sent to me  and i m back to using the air fryer

not impressed with this new unit compared to my older non wifi unitthe new unit doesn t seem to cook as well as my older non wifi unit   it doesn t seem to push as much air and thus doesn t get as crisp the buttons also don t work nearly as well   i have a hard time getting it to respond   the wifi app does help with this  but when i m standing in front of the unit  id rather push a button instead of getting out the phone or yelling at alexa to make the changes overall i wish i d kept my old     unit instead of getting this new wifi unit   it just doesn t seem to cook as good

this product has a flush face with no physical buttons to press for your selections   you are supposed to depress the area for your selection and the selection is supposed to light up   you can press all you want and certain buttons may or may not work       most cases they do not work   for this reason  i would not recommend this product   save your money    look for something else   this is a design flaw

this is very needed item to have at home  it cooks fast and the food is super delicious  i ve cooked salmon from costco in it  and it wasn t dry finally but juice and flavorful  the chicken legs we cooked had crispy skin and soft truly cooked inside  very delicious  and i m glad to think that the food we cook in it is a little bit more healthy as cooked with no grease and oil

this thing is awesome    i put off buying  one for a long time thinking  it would be something  else that takes up room and another kitchen appliance  that never actually gets used   i have used it like every other day since it came  cleaning is quick and painless  settings are easy to use and the food it yummy with no oil    wish i d bought it  sooner  whole family  approved

i loved  note past tense  my corsori air fryer  pros  easy to use energy efficient versatile compact affordablecons   a bit loud a bit small lasted only one year  yes  one year  and i had a voltage protector on it  as i do with any appliance that has a circuit board and computer  i even unplugged it after every use  i d used it about     times a week  which is what i consider moderate usage  anyway  about a month ago it turned off while it was running  then on again  it was an anomaly so i just hoped it would not happen again  yesterday i was cooking some chicken breasts in it on a        minute cycle  near the end of the cycle it stopped and started two times  so i unplugged it and tried another outlet just in case that was the problem  i plugged it in  it started again for about   and that was it  air fryer dead

i read a bunch of reviews before buying this  i have used it for a few months now  almost every day  and love it  it seems sturdy and makes things in a jiffy  if your on the fence  just go ahead and get it because it will probably the the best thing you ever do for yourself now i don t make big huge things in it  though i m sure i could because it s very large  i use it for every day food and breakfast sandwiches  i use it for things i never even thought i would when i first got it i used to eat a lot of fast food but now it is much faster to just make it myself

love this product  i just did a video review on youtube between this model and the paula deen     quart model   there is no comparison between the    i am returning the paula deen model   the only issue i have with the cosori is that it is not big enough  other than that this model is excellent  with the paula deen model it left certain things soggy on the bottom even after flipping halfway through cooking  this model does not even need flipping with pre fried foods such as fish sticks  i do shake in between but do not have to flip  digital is also the way to go   i highly recommend this brand and i use it at least   days a week and sometimes multiple times a day  i can also say you are able to cook a   or   pound young chicken in this    you do have to push it down a little bit in the pan to make sure it doesn t hit the heating element but i have been able to do that with no problem  highly recommend

i m really glad i bought this  i do note though  that cooking temperatures and time that automatically show up may be a bit high and long  experiment a bit  i don t like my foods to come out really dark or nearly black  so maybe it s just me  but i find that lowering the temp by    degrees and the cooking time by a few minutes  depending on the food  cooks the food to my liking and the food is safely cooked  buy a food thermometer if you have doubts

if you are looking for a great product in air fryers look no more  i originally owned a smaller air fryer made by a different company  i was very impressed with this air fryer easy to clean cooks in very little time and food taste but way too small   i went in search of a bigger air fryer with the square basket and came across the cosori  wi fi air fryer this is another item to add for a smart home  you may ask why do you need an air fryer with wi fi  i said the same but i find that i use it very often  this app also provides cooking menus of all sorts and you can join a group via facebook to also enhance your cooking experience originally there was an issue when i first purchased product  but i image like anything else when you have mass production there are sometimes flaws  i contact customer service they respond within    hours and resolve my problem to my satisfaction  i love this product i would definitely recommend

i love this thing  most of the air dryers have pretty bad reviews  what i like about this one is how interactive the company appears to be on reviews  so that was the deciding factor in why i chose this  i went with the wifi version  but to be honest probably could have foregone that feature  i have yet to use anything via wifi  this thing works great and i have made so many yummy things in it  it is easily my most used kitchen cooking gadget since i got it  everything from bacon  chicken nuggets  chicken parmesan  empanadas  and broccoli  we are going to do some churros this weekend  easy to clean and it s sized perfectly to make enough food for a family of five  usually in one or two batches  but things cook quickly

i decided to dive into air fryers  i have   instant pots    for home    for work  one for holidays    quart  bought my mom one too  i purchased the corsori air fryer before spending more on an instant fryer    quart  one plate of fries    plates of crispy chicken and one of half potatoes and i was hooked  so i bought the instant fryer the cosori is better than the instant fryer  easier to clean  crispier food  mind you  the rotating roaster and chicken roaster and light on the instant fryer is awesome to see thru the glass door   that you have to clean  as well as the sides of the fryer  and the rotisserie or basket  do get an instant pot  but for air frying  cosori    just bought one for mom for christmas  and i have one at work  and one at home

i m in love with this thing  i put some leg quarters to air fry and let me tell you omg  the chicken was so juicy and crispy the way i like it  i d like to add that i am the worst chicken making in oven person  i will dry out my chicken and my bf and i will eat it in disgust lol   we both ate   pieces of chicken   i also threw in some brussels sprouts and asparagus which also came out delicious  this air fryer is the best choice i ve made hands dwn

after hearing my daughter rave about how much she likes the fryer her sister gave her for christmas i bought one as well  i got the newer digital  without wifi  and find that suits me well  the cosori air fryer is so easy to clean as compared to using an oil fryer the flavor and appearance of the food is great and beautiful  so much so my husband now feels he doesn t need to replace our gas grill  it is so easy to use i just need to get him to learn how to use it  our teenage grandkids use their fryer to do tots and roasted veggies  something they wouldn t have done with an oil fryer

so far so good  i have only had the fryer for a few days  i have cooked frozen french fries  trial and error on time   pork chops and chicken wings  chicken wings did great  pork chop a little tough but flavorful and chicken wings were the best   very juicy and tender  my only complaint is i would like a chart  and even on some of the recipes  that showed the weight of the meat used   you can buy pork chops that are paper thin to over   inch thick  cooking times are not equal and not all fryers are equal  i downloaded a chart off the internet that is a start  so i guess trial and error will be the norm until i can get used to the cooker  but overall i think it s an excellent device especially for the wife and i  now no need to turn on the oven or cook top just for the two of us

i really like the cosori over the insta pot  i tried to make pizza in my insta pot and it came out horrid  lol  lack of circulated heat under food an i put very little food in it as i am cooking for a   year old  so there is plenty of space to expect a nice crisp  but didn t get it  now   this cosori    does very well  i don t even really need to flip it but i just do it for good practice and when i did oh boy i some sizzle when i flipped a chick patty as  if  it was a dedicate heat source from the bottom  that how well the heat circulation is  the buttons could use some reconfiguration but i just i fix the temp and time myself  i rather that than not be able to get my crisp no matter what i do  happy purchase thus far
had two other brands and this one is definitely the best  the flavor is incredible  so easy to use with the digital program settings    super easy clean up too

i just got my cosori     wifi enabled air fryer  so far  i love it   i can literally preheat it from anywhere in the house  it is amazing  i made turkey bacon and cookies so far  they came out perfect  i joke with my husband about it being my new baby   adult wins  also  it comes with a   year warranty  however if you register your cosori  it adds an extra year  so you get a   year warranty for free

the reviews are right  i m amazed and totally hooked  i couldn t be happier with cosori air fryer max xl  i was debating what size of an air fryer to get and thought the cosori max xl would be too big and wide for my needs and my countertop   however  with a family of    it s perfect  i can make all sorts of dishes in a shorter amount of time  it s easy to clean and a healthier option to the fried foods my family loves  the only downside is the air fryer is a tad heavier than i would have liked but as long as i don t move it too often  it should be fine

if you don t have one of these  you re missing out  we live in nyc and have lived on delivery for as long as i can remember  what is cooking  well the cosori air fryer showed us  this arrived right before covid    lockdowns happened  and we ve been cooking with it every day  the recipe book was a great starting point and we tried a ton  now we ve gotten a little more confident and are trying out our own recipes  looks great on the counter  and i hate keeping appliances out  everything has been delicious  cleaning is a breeze  and me and the lady are much more excited about making great food at home  revolutionary

first want to say that i originally had the ninja foodi air fry oven  it absolutely sucked so i decided to return it after a few months of use  i exhausted myself reading reviews of legit air fryers  with baskets  and came across the corsori  i have only used it about     times mainly for frozen foods and it has been nothing short of amazing  quick cooking time and crisp food every time  super easy to clean and is truly non stick in every aspect  i don t know how long the machine will hold up for but it s been great for us thus far  try it out you won t be disappointed

i bought the air fryer with zero expectation  besides  it was on sale on prime day  well   it has exceeded my expectation  i ve made chicken  pork  veggies  fries  and even roasted almonds and walnuts  it s basically a handy little oven on my kitchen counter  although it took a bit of experimenting to get the right  crispness  level  since sometimes things can come out a bit more charred than i prefer  the cleanup isn t difficult  the baskets are dishwasher safe  and i wipe down the interior with a moist paper towel after it has cooled  i wish i had bought the smaller size though      quart is a bit large for two people  and takes up quite a bit of counter space  overall  i m very happy with this appliance

this is my third air fryer all different brands  this was the least expensive but works the best  the second fryer stopped working after the first use  i ve had the first fryer over a year and love it but sometimes i like to air fry side dishes with the main  i also cook for   of us  tonight  i cooked the chicken in this fryer  the chicken came out moist with a crispy coating  it was perfect  so easy to use  didn t even need the directions  it s super quiet compared to the others  it s a keeper

this is my first air fryer and it has become one of my   must have small kitchen appliances   texture and flavor of foods is far better than any instant pot  microwave  crockpot  etc   food is cooked quickly and clean up is a dream   i do line the bottom with tin foil and use  the pre cut parchment paper liners if the item has a sauce or marinade on it     but that is because i m lazy and want the shortest clean up time effort possible   love that it has a square  not circular cooking space to fit more in   best of all it doesn t heat up my kitchen  like using the oven does  summer   no ac
i m in love with this fryer  wow   it cooks quickly  things are crisp and flavorful and cleanup a breeze

i use the air fryer several times a week   especially like using it for chicken breasts  fries both white and sweet potatoes  of course veggies are good in it also have had it for several months now and really like it bought a second one for my daughter in law for christmas and they seem to like it also with both orders they came on time with everything intact the only con is to be sure not to use anything harsh to clean the pans   i did use a scrubber on something that had stuck a bit and it did take the coating off on a very small spot   so now i just soak it a bit than only use the dish cloth to clean it

we used the air fryer to bake our typical frozen mini corn dogs  but it was a fail  it doesn t look like it cooked evenly  it had a very strong teflon smell when in use so it s very unappetizing to eat any food made with the air fryer  the area where the nails are used to hold the handle is hard to clean  there s tiny crevices there with high chance of food debris and grease oil can hide  however  i did like the smart feature of being able to control it from my phone  it s just not worth it if the food isn t cooked evenly

so i was actually getting good results cooking with this air fryer  it just takes a little bit of experimenting honestly i got this as a christmas gift from a family member  i took really good care of it and cleaned it like instructed  one morning i was cooking bacon like i always do every morning  then i started to smell smoke and what smelt like something electrical coming from the kitchen  big billows of smoke were coming from the air fryer and smelled like something was catching fire  i run over turn it off  and unplug the air fryer freaking out  after giving it some time to cool down i unplug it  i m freaking out thing the food must have caught fire even though i used the same settings i always do and never had issues  i open the fryer and the bacon is fine and still slightly undercooked that being said it could have caught my place on fire if i hadn t gotten up quickly enough and i m very disappointed that this product didn t last  i would not even consider a replacement at this point seeing as it s not very safe in the first place do yourself a favor and just research other brands

even though i just got this air fryer yesterday  i wanted to come on and let everyone know that this is an easy air fryer to use  it will take some time for my family and i to adjust the times to what we like  i tried the original settings for french fries they were over done  but i think that s because i used frozen french fries on the french fries setting which is intended for fresh cut from potatoes french fries  my son s pizza rolls were perfect crisp wise but he didn t like them as he s use to the oven where when its heated up the pepperoni in the rolls melts the grease and it brings out more of the flavor and it didn t do that with the air fryer  but we will keep trying  its easy to clean and very easy to use  we are happy and are now looking for even more recipes to try  great product  i will tell everyone i meet who is wanting an air fryer how happy we are with this one  it was the one with the best reviews  best pricing and all around best options

i was very skeptical when i purchased this because i wasn t familiar with the brand  but the number of reviews convinced me to take a chance  and our oven died and needed some way to cook food   i also thought that the whole air fryer thing was a fad  i d had a cusinart air fryer and the instant pot lid  which i didn t like at all  however i am so glad i got this first  i love this because it really is a small convection oven and so it is so much more versatile that just crispy french fries   today i made cookies for my child and i and since our oven is on the fritz  i tried them in the air fryer and in   minutes we had something delicious it is super easy to clean and i am thinking about getting a second one so that i can make multiple things  i love this air fryer

the first one i ordered had a defective keypad  they immediately sent me a replacement and scheduled me a free ups pick up for the defective unit  ups picked up the defective one and delivered the new replacement the next day this was also the most well packaged item i ve ever gotten  it looks and works great  easy cleanup too  i ve used it a dozen times already and it works great

i love how easy it is to use my airfryer  i have used it now to cook salmon  steak  and chicken and the food comes out great  its super quick  i have dinner ready in    minutes  i dont have a mess to clean up after and best of all my house doesn t get warmed up with the cooking which is a reason i was avoiding to cook during the heat wave in california  now i can have my fast home cooked meals every day again  i would recommend it to anyone struggling with eating healthy and cooking at home

great air fryer  i have literally used this everyday since i received it  easy to clean and super easy to run  there are   issues i do have with it though     the screws that connect the handle to the inner basket keep coming loose     there is a minimal amount of steam leaking through the bottom left front of the basket  both do not affect the usability but a little annoying  all around it s a freakin  cookin  machine

i ve owned or gifted six air fryers  three nu waves and three phillips  i ve also purchased an air fryer xl and immediately returned it because of poor cooking  one nu wave broke one month after purchase  they all cooked ok  we cook completely oil free  the cosori is easily the top choice  my standard is oil less crimper cut russet potatoes which i snack on daily as part of my whole food plant based diet  the cosori does easily the best job with the potatoes as well as beyond mest burgers  broccoli and anything the grandkids want  you can t go wrong  we own two

i did a lot of research on air fryers  please allow me to tell you  you will not be disappointed  we have been using the cosori almost every day  the recipes in the book cooks perfectly  we did the vegetables  all the meats with exception of lamb and they all cook just as instructed in the book  i love the fact when cooking chicken you do not have to flip it midway  we actually roasted a small turkey breast without the bone  and it was so moist and tender  it does not take much oil at all  less than a tablespoon   i had purchase the ninja airfryer and although it work sufficient  it could not come close to the cosori  we love this product   and to clean the basket is awesome  you do not need parchment paper for any reason  it cleans very well  the design of the product is well made  very easy to operate  it is very easy to operate  give it a shot

we are bonafide air fryer converts    we bought our    qt  cosori in december  ever since then   gospel truth   we cook      of our proteins in our indispensable air fryer  ready  we cook key west pink shrimp  filet mignon  pork tenderloin   chicken breasts  steelhead  ocean  trout  healthier tastier salmon esque   snapper varieties of all kinds  grouper  why     fast   significantly reduced odors   healthy  most we do is a very very very light extra virgin olive oil coating to adhere spices    super easy clean up we have learned to cook every single protein at     and we almost always use the pre heat  meats take     minutes then flip then     minutes then rest     minutes  steaks turn out phenomenal   even have a slight crust pork goes   flip   because we eat a   oz tenderloin cut we cook fish at     also and     to     pounds generally takes   minutes  we usually go for   minutes  the standard porto setting is     degrees and   minutes    check the fish and then go another   minutes a pound of kw pinks takes   minutes  would be ok at      the flavors and juices are perfect every time  single best appliance we ve ever bought

i have been leary of the whole air frying craze of late   after several friends encouraged me  i purchased this one   it works great   i m single and cook smaller portions of course  but since i got this thing  i haven t used my stove or microwave at all   i ve cooked many different things and it has not disappointed me at all  time will tell if it holds up but for now     it s awesome   i would recommend the accessory kit if you cook for a larger group

like so many others we ordered our airfryer during covid to help diversify our meals  unfortunately  since the first use we ve experienced a smell that has always transferred to our food  we initially thought it was the newness of the fryer  but the smell and taste is still here  i wish i could say it is easy to clean  but we have the hardest time removing the basket to clean  my sister has the same one with no issues  maybe i have a deffective one

the only negative thing i will say is the basket kind of has a cheap feel   so you you feel the need to be very careful with it when handling and pushing it in   other than that it is amazing   i made the best chicken wings i have ever made  and i have tried many methods   better than most restaurants   i have also tried fish  chicken breast  and fries   all with great results   if this thing holds up it will be an amazing part of the kitchen   i like results of things i ve tried much better than instant pot   though there are things that will still be great in the instant pot and can not be cooked in this

always remember you have to heat it first  with nothing in it  they don t seem to tell you that   we have had problem with it burning french fries  it could be caused by putting just a few in the fryer  don t know  also cooking pork chops  it does not tell you how  we used the stake cooking  that seem to work  the taste of the pork chop was good  i believe once we get use to use it and how to cook with it i believe we will love it more  the cook book seem to have been written by a computer not a cook

so the air fryer certainly lives up to its reputation and does cook items as if you fried them in oil  french fries  bacon  shrimp  fried chicken  and even grilled cheese  yes i m sure that sounds strange  are just a few of the things off the top of my head that were cooked to perfection this particular model comes with an easy to understand recipe book that is about     accurate  the missing     is that you may need to play around with the listed temps but once you find the right temp  it cooks perfectly  you can even get away with using some oil as well which many air fryers don t support i docked a star off my rating because despite how awesome and convenient this model is  it has a few minor faults  the screws that keep the tray intact as well as the drip pan intact do loosen up  likely from the heat of the fryer  you will need to periodically tighten them  the plastic front cover of the sauce pan is also beginning to detach  again likely from the heat of repeated use  i have attached pictures showcasing the above statements ultimately  this air fryer has quickly become my favorite cooking tool and despite its minor faults  would definitely recommend it

this product is a big risk  i d advise into looking into a more stable and thorough product the safety hazard is the basket of the air fryer opening randomly  it can be    minutes into cooking    minutes preheating whichever  i ve made precautions and made sure it is securely closed but the problem still persists the last incident it happened  the basket popped out and fell off the counter  the basket was in separate pieces and i burned my hand trying to pick it up  on top of that i lost the food i was preparing and had to prepare some more

i have to say i love how this works and makes meal preparation really easy  however  the coating that the pan comes with had started chipping and bubbling  i fear l may even have eaten some of it  i have used this machine less then    times  i would avoid

only lasted   months updated review  i loved this air fryer and used it daily  sadly the handle that attached to the basket came apart after   months i love it  my meat is always nice  tender  and juicy  it s so easy and cuts my cooking time in half  all you do is season the food and put it in the basket and time it  it has made my life so much easier

i don t normally post reviews  but i have to commend cosori for their exceptional customer service   no one likes to deal with an appliance that quits working   the fan quit working on my air fryer after about   months   i contacted customer service to find out the process for dealing with the warranty   it couldn t have been easier   i provided a video of the issue and proof of purchase   my air fryer quit working one week ago today and this morning my replacement was delivered   i couldn t have asked for better customer support   i love my air fryer and use it almost daily   i use it to cook chicken wings  steak  and for reheating   i love it and would definitely purchase from cosori again

this is the best air fryer i have ever had  and i ve gone through a few  this cosori wifi air fryer works miracles of food  i have baked  fried  and reheated using this unit  baked things like single serve pizza slices  potatoes  chicken  etc  made fries  onion rings  chicken nuggets  and much more the issue i have with the unit  however  is a similar issue reported by another reviewer  wherein the front panel buttons are not entirely responsive  we can sometimes get them to respond  using the full pad of your finger  rather than a finger tip  it s annoying sometimes to get things to start due to this  and at times  just resort to using the app to start the food cooking  all in all though  the issues are minor compared to the great benefit of not having to heat oil  and also wait for the oil to cool after  and the added health benefit of not having to ingest so much oily food is a plus  highly recommend this product  hopefully the company releases a v  unit with more responsive buttons  or a fix for this one

this thing has changed my life  i love love love the cosori air fryer  it s easy to use  hold a lot of food  and cooks everything i ve put in to perfection   i stayed away from cooking fried foods because i m lazy  this completely takes the time and mess out of frying   amazing one little piece of advice though  don t add any oil to the food unless you re going to stand by and babysit the cooking process   i discovered early on that extra oil isn t necessary  and it will overcook your food very quickly

i purchased the cosori air fryer max xl     quart  because of the recommendation on a cooking site   i am delighted with it   even though i live alone  i chose to purchase the larger     qt because i frequently cook extra servings   either for leftovers or to freeze and have later   i decided better to be extra large than to be too small   i ve not been sorry   i love that it bakes biscuits  fries bacon and will still make french fries and does not heat up my kitchen   that s especially important in the summer

so far   used to  fry  shrimp  french fries  chicken wings  bacon and veggie mix   everything turned out great  clean up is very easy   my challenge is training other family members how to use it   warm up temp  timing  turning and to keep their fingers off the release button the air fryer is quicker  doesn t use a lot of oil  big savings on olive oil   doesn t heat up the house  reduced energy use   easy clean up and time saving

easily the best purchase i ve made this year  i heard all the hype about air fryers and was hesitant that it would be similar to the instapot hype  which i found to be disappointing   but this exceeded the expectations and the hype works amazingly for reheating leftovers or for quick lunches for kids   frozen nuggets  pizza rolls  etc for dinners from scratch at home  i ve used it for eggplant parmesan  milanesa  general tso s chicken  and sweet potato fries  all have come out great
