the only thing wrong is that i didn t own this sooner  man i wish i had one when my kids were smaller  i love this thing   it cooks almost anything without heating a huge oven and even cooks it better than an oven  i have cooked almost everything  bacon  biscuits  burgers  fries  wings  muffins  great also for reheating things like leftovers from a restaurant or whatever  my teens like it too because it s easy  it s fun and i hate to cook  i think it s because it s easy and so far everything has been so good in it  my only regret is that i didn t by two  lol  i seriously love this

i had a phllips xl air fryer for   to   years now and it seemed like it was on it s  last leg  so i decied to see what amazon had  seeing this is the best rated air fryer decided to give it a shot with all the positive reviews  this air fryer does not disappoint  way easier to clean my phillips basket had a metal mesh and food would always get stuck in it  this one being non stick cermaic address this problem  and this air fryer is way mor consistent heating the food  night and day difference

this air fryer is money well spent for both your health and wallet  for       this air fryer is amazing and your waist will thank you  with air fryer foods  you can have a similar texture of fried foods without all the oil  most recipes i ve made in this air fryer  i haven t used more than     tbps of oil  tops  usually i don t even use oil  just some cooking spray i ve made fries  obviously  both fresh and frozen  panko fish for fish tacos  wings  bacon  fried chicken and even roasted a full chicken  everything comes out amazing  crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside  i was skeptical to buy one of these things  but after a lot of research i finally caved and i m so glad i finally purchased one  don t think you can only make food in the air fryer that are normally fried  you can pretty much use this air fryer for anything you d put in your oven this is the second air fryer i purchased  the first one was cheaper and after i tried it out  i liked it so much i invested some more and got this cosori  it s bigger and had some nice extra features the cheaper one didn t  it also comes with an awesome recipe book  i m so glad i finally bought one  i ve convinced my coworkers to do the same after showing them some of these pics in my review  don t hesitate and buy this air fryer  you won t regret it

so far i ve only made one thing in the air fryer  i was super excited to get one after falling in love with my boyfriend s  i m not sure was brand but was very basic    no touch screen   i was excited this one had a lot of features and had a nice sized basket  during set up i really didn t want to connect the device to my phone but i had to download an app  make an account  sync fryer to app    and finally i could start cooking  i started with turkey bacon and   minutes into it cooking it smelt like burning plastic     so i m hoping that will go away but i made sure to remove all the packaging and i washed the basket before cooking  i also feel like i had to force the basket in an out of the fryer  was just hoping for something a little easier to use

i know  yet another kitchen appliance gadget  but this is definitely worth the space it takes up  when not in use it tucks under the cabinet  when in us it needs to have nothing above or behind or around it  it is extremely easy to use and clean dishwasher safe   we have cooked all sorts of dishes in it  would highly recommend this appliance

we gifted my single brother a small version last year that he used many times   this year he asked for a larger one so he could cook more bigger items at the same time   he absolutely loves this model   the settings are easy to use and the cookbook has given him new dinner ideas   cleanup is also fast and easy   just what he needs  now i m waiting for our older  different brand  to die so i can get this upgraded model for us

i unboxed the air fryer  plugged it in  pre heated it  and got to use it once  now  the air is not working at all  cannot utilize functions  very upset   also   when i first edited unboxed the air fryer  there wasn t a manual and or recipe book inside like i was lead to believe when i purchased it  the company said they would send one  never received it  they said it was available on the internet  but that is another issue  not a great experience to say the least

update  never received the replacement basket  still don t know where it is after    emails back and forth  yesterday i noticed that now the nonstick coating is peeling off of the inside of the bottom basket  it s been used maybe    times  i have requested a refund and that has been approved  which will take at least   weeks  if they stay on schedule  it has been a frustrating experience dealing with the inferior quality of the device as well as poor service  at this point i can only conclude that the device is meant to be a throwaway  use it a couple of years  then toss it and buy a new one  definitely not for me and not what i was looking for  i will update if there are any issues with the refund  by the way  your refund is a gift card  not reimbursement it cooks great tasting food but i have a significant issue with the screws that hold the handle onto the inner basket coming loose after each use  i suspect the expansion and contraction of the metal is causing it but surely there s a better way to secure the handle since this fail point could cause injury to the user  people that love this machine are going to say so what  just tighten the screws  but that shouldn t be good enough for anybody  from what i have read  this seems to be fairly common and my daughter s machine has the same issue  i don t have high hopes that the replacement basket i requested will perform any better but i will update if it does

we have used this air fryer about twice per week since our purchase in early april  i wash it on the top shelf of the dishwasher  per instructions   this week i was taking it out of the dishwasher  and found both rusting  there was nothing wrong when they went in  but unusable now  the manufacturer better take care of this problem

i ve had this almost a year now and felt i should finally drop in a review  it does a pretty good job  if not for the fact about a third of the buttons are very difficult to activate it would be a really good product  it claims to be a digital interface but from my experience it is not  it doesn t act nor feel digital and is probably the reason a lot of its buttons take many many touches taps to get any response from  the product finally started to throw an e error and at this point doesn t seem as if it is going to last much longer  the non stick coat is failing and overall i will say it has been a lukewarm experience overall

easy to use and clean  make sure you have space around it to keep the heat away from the wall plus room to pull out basket to turn food  i sat it on a wood cutting board to prevent darkening of my formica countertop  a friend said to watch out for that  with enough room to pull out the basket and set it on the wood while working on the food   made keto fried chicken which was crisp and juicy

the fryer is outstanding for cooking if you can get the touchpad to do what you want   several keys on the touchpad either do not work or it takes multiple touches to get it to set   i have given up and just cook things at the temperature and time that it has on it when it is turned on   i would give it a five if the touchpad worked   however  i can t recommend this to anyone else based on my machine

we ordered our cosori in july and it had the strangest odor  we aired it out thinking that would solve the issue  but the odor persisted and permeated the food   luckily  despite being past the amazon return window  cosori had us supply them with proof of purchase and batch number and immediately sent a new one   the new one has no odor we assume something was wrong with the batch of our original air fryer   we are psyched to use it

i love this product sooooo much before i purchase this  i shouldve got the smaller version because it s really big and it s taking up a lot of space in my kitchen but  i cooked a steak in this air fryer once and it tasted so good i love how cooking my food in this air fryer saved me a lot of time  when i used to cook my steak on the stove  it ll take me about      mins  depending on how cooked i want it  but it literally took me      mins to cook the steak be aware that it does make a lot of sound when you use it  but it s not to the point where it bothers you also  stay away from the air fryer when it s being used

do not buy     i purchased this product and it worked for maybe a month  which was the exact amount of time they give to return   so therefore i basically threw away      into the trash   product is trash  i buy a lot of things on amazon and they ve always been great with returns  but this company would not even exchange the product  i called and wrote emails  they basically said too bad

i love this air fryer i will start by saying  i don t ever leave reviews for products unless i absolutely love them  i m a person who does thorough research before i buy a product  and rely heavily on reviews  i saw this on amazon day and got a great deal  so i figured i d give it a shot  after hours of contemplation   figuring at the very least i just had a regular run of the mill air fryer that may or may not impress me  fortunately i was not disappointed  as long as you re willing to play around with settings and try to make things a few times without expecting perfection off the bat  you will be happy  read what works for others online  pinterest is great  i use this to cook an assortment of foods  but also enjoy using it to reheat almost anything i can my boyfriends only discrepancy is that he expected it to be a quicker way to heat everything up  he s an instapot guy     so don t expect everything to cook instantly  but it is a much healthier way of cooking  i will also say that many foods i make have a very short cook time i will also say that i am so obsessed with this product that i bring it with me to a lot of locations  and find myself wishing i had it when it s not with me lol would buy again

buying this was such a great purchase  completely changed my view in cooking  i m still getting used to it and how it works but i m in love  i did realize that it makes a really big difference to preheat the air fryer  it takes   minutes  but it is definitely worth it  i love reheating pizza i can t even taste the difference from when i bought it  the noise is low and at times gets a little higher but it goes back to being low  nothing to loud  it s so very easy to clean the basket however the inside always needs a little bit of work but be careful what you clean it with because you don t want to damage the coating inside  and be very careful with the basket when it s hot i have burned myself a few times when i get distracted well taking the food out

this is outstanding in every way except how you use it it cooks great  it s even  consistent and fantastic unfortunately  it is paired with the worst control pad known to man  it s a quasi touch interface and it barely works at all  thus rendering the product useless skip this one until they give you actual buttons

changed my life  if you don t have an air fryer  get one  this cosori is fantastic because it is larger than the round ones  i have another air fryer  which was a gift and i loved it  but smaller  just needed a second one for our  nd home  and i wanted bigger  the ease of use  faster cooking times  better flavors and healthier cooking makes me happy every time i use  no hot kitchen from using your stove oven in the summer  baked potatoes  any potatoes  come out fantastic  meats  chicken  pork chops  steaks  are delicious and moist juicy  i haven t baked anything in it  but plan on doing  once you start using  you won t ever want to turn your oven on  can t say enough about air frying  and this model is fantastic

the cosori was my first af so i was a bit intimidated  not really knowing much about them  i can honestly say it s my fav kitchen appliance now  was very happy about tossing out the old grungy deep fryer  between cookbook owner s manual that came with it an awesome fb cosori group i mastered it in no time  i love that it has a square basket as opposed to the normal oval basket  another thing to consider is the excellent customer service and   year warranty

the food comes out amazing in this fryer   but within the first week we noticed the basket would esaily dislodge itself  popping open  and the fryer would turn off   sometime it would just pop an inch or two   and sometimes it would straight up eject out and fall on the floor   we even tested on ways we could push the basket in  adding pressure up  down  or side to side   anyone who lived through the infamous blinking nintendo screen will know what i m talking about   then we d hold our breath to see if it was going to pop itself out   sometimes it worked     sometimes not over the past couple of months we kept saying  should we return this thing   the food is great but it keeps popping out    well today it finally killed itself   despite being at the back of the counter with about     feet of clearance in front of it  it ejected onto the floor   this time  in addition to ruining my food all over the floor  some plastic snapped off and the cage got bent and no longer fits into the housing

this is basically a small convection oven   as such it is much more efficient than my large oven when making small meals for one or two people   it also replaces the frying pan and eliminates the grease splatter on the stove cook top   the french fries are great and it does well in cooking things like chicken leg quarters   i wondered if this would just be another semi useless kitchen gadget  but it has proven very useful   i use it almost every day

i like this product sooooooooooooo much  it s so convenient and healthy  i don t need any oil with this cooking  still taste so good any kind of meat and vegetables match so perfect  also  i can make dessert or cake with this  besides  there s no smoke and food will be done in very short time  the most valuable product for kitchen

we purchased the cosori after doing our research at  youtube university  where we watched a comparison between a cosori and the new air fryer from the instant pot folks  what cinched the deal   cleanup   we also were shopping for an air fryer that would best replace the simple recipes we would bring out our deep fryer such as fries  tots  fish and chicken  we are glad we followed the kiss principle and are delighted with the value our new     qt cosori brings our kitchen  table and diet

honestly  we reseached and shopped a ton before buying this and now that we have had it for a month i m saving you the time  just buy this one you will love it   for our family of   we use it minimum once or twice per day and the food turns out perfect and kids love the flavor without having to fry in oil

i loved the way this air fryer worked   easy to use  makes great food  but the buttons stopped working after three months   the basket is hard to clean  and if you don t clean it thoroughly every time  it gets gunked up   the square basket size is definitely better than the round ones  you can fit more into it   the shape and size also is a very efficient use of space seller reached out after my review of the buttons failing and replaced my unit  so its all working now   thanks cosori

i had high hopes for this air fryer   especially after all the great reviews  unfortunately  the touch screen doesn t work i even got a replacement unit  and the second machine had the same issue  some buttons would not work at all and others would only work if you were lucky enough to push them the right way after trying   or   times  others have had this same issue  so i think there must be a certain batch of these that are just defective cross your fingers if you decide to order  and maybe your machine won t have this problem  i ended up buying the instapot   quart air fryer instead

i had a small af which i found basically useless  after watching prohomecook on youtube and researching  i ventured into the af game with the cosori primarily cause it cleans up so well based on the reviews air circulation is great  super easy to use pre existing programs or set your own and best reason   easy to clean  microwave   air fryer makes food  especially trader joe s chicken pot pie and sheperd s pie  taste so much better without the       minute wait for a stove to heat up and bake the food  i have baked lasagna  ziti  chicken  fish  steak  appetizers  eggs and burgers   so far  i prefer steak on the outdoor grill but i was able to get a very good medium rare steak straight from the fridge about cosori support   i received as a gift the wrong size cooking accessories  for the   qt unit  for xmas and cosori support stepped up and arranged a replacement  long story but the seller  ahem  walmart marketplace  would not replace refund   they were fast and efficient  what you want in customer support highly recommend

cosori stand behind its product  i had a concern with my airfryer and their customer service team did not disappoint me  they are very responsive to my concern  the product is really good  the food that i cooked from it is very tasty and crunchy  like it was deep fried  i had this thing called  enoki mushroom test   i have another airfryer  nuwave xl airfryer  and i couldn t get a crunchy enoki mushroom from it  it is precisely for that reason that i bought this and give this a try  i did not go for the very expensive philips airfryer  why would you pay more if you can get the desired output for less  so anyway  i managed to get a crispy enoki mushroom here   and surely it passed my enoki mushroom test     i rarely post reviews and i feel i need to post a review for this product because it deserves it  go buy this  you won t regret it

quise esperar un tiempo para opinar luego de usar la olla estuve enamorada al principio porque primero si asa las alitas   papitas y las deja realmente sin grasa y doradas   luego las costillas de cerdo son muy buenas porque todo queda sin grasa  tengo que llevar comida para mi trabajo y la comida permanecia suave  ademas la limpieza es super facil y no hay que restregar casi nada   pongo a cocinar y solo espero el momento de revisarlo y luego al final lo saco y listo los contra  no todo queda bien en ella  no asi un bistek de res  queda fatal  o un pescado   hay cosas que quedan mejor en la sarten o el horno convencional   si quieren una mejor idea  visito a unos amigos que se compraron un hornito electrico y es mucho mas funcional que esta olla definitivamente

i love this air fryer   very easy to use  cooks super fast and needs no oil  not any more noisy than your microwave and the coking drawer is non stick  really easy to clean  fully digital  and comes with a recipe book and instruction book  it is just amazing and i wish i had bought it sooner

i highly recommend this airfryer  no hot spots  has a pre heat setting  cooks evening and easily   not a lot to say about it  but easy to clean and does it s job quite well  fits in plenty of food  looks quite nice on my counter top as well  saves a hell of a lot of time cleaning the kitchen too  i cook sausage  hot dogs  hamburgers  scallops  chicken wings  potatoes  french fries  fish   love this thing

i ve just returned this fryer   the smell of plastic was terrible   i tried everything suggested to get rid of the smell  running it empty for long periods of time  scrubbing it  running it with lemon and vinegar  with no success   the corner where i had it still smells  also  the latch broke easy   also  it is quite loud   find something else  preferably metal

large enough to cook    short kebobs  with a small insertable rack i made  or    large meatballs  or a serving of fries for   freedom fries loving americans  everything comes out awesome  my microwave broke and i haven t replaced it in months  i put a little pyrex bowl in the air fryer to heat up leftovers in the same amount of time  but better quality reheat  i even lined it with tinfoil  put bits of graham cracker down  layered mini marshmellows and chocolate shavings and made toasted smores nachos in   mins on the steak setting  endless goodness and no radiation like with microwaves

i would have given this   stars  but     the recipe book states to flip the chicken wings half way trough the cooking time limit  the pre set for chicken is    min at      there is no warning to stop ad flip said chicken  the pre set for fries is also    min at      guess what  it automatically pause at    min  and tells you to  shake the fries   so  when i cooked wings on the pre set fries setting       perfect  i would have given this   stars   had it the  flip  warning at    minutes for chicken  no smoke  very little odor when cooking chicken  very good product  i also cooked quiche  again        perfect  amazon had this on sale for       a day after our current fryer took a dirt np  and this one is pretty amazing  last one        pretty bad  buy this  period  i also recommend buying the kit for the cooking peripherals  well worth it
item came with a large crack on one side about    wide  i was willing to keep it anyway but i made some french fries and it only crisp the top and bottom and in the middle it was still a bit raw

perhaps i hadn t thoroughly researched air fryers before buying this one  and therefore did not understand that you absolutely have to clean the heating unit between uses or there will be a wall of smoke pouring from it while cooking   with that understood  i now clean it between every use and i still love this thing   it s amazing   my bacon comes out absolutely delicious and all my wing ding recipes have been better than anything i ve made on the stove or in the oven   i m sorry i waited so long to buy an air fryer but i m really happy that i bought the cosori

everything comes out so perfectly   frozen oreida tater tots took   minutes and were cooked perfectly then i used the sourdough i made earlier in the day yay covid hobbies  and buttered one side of each slice  sprinkled with some shredded cheese and cooked on the bread preset for   minutes this thing made a better grilled cheese than the panini press or stovetop i cooked breakfast sausage links this morning      degrees for   minutes and done  omg good i love this air fryer so much  i wish i had bought it sooner the app paired effortlessly  and i ve had no issues with the wifi literally my only complaint is that the beep is so loud and i wish there was a way to turn it down off

love my air fryer   i am glad i got the big one too  the tray and cooking area is a bit small to me  and this is one of the larger ones   you can fit maybe     chicken thighs in the cooking tray   super easy to use and the food looks great after cooking  it would have been nice to have a stack able tray so you could cook two trays of wings at the same time  however  not sure if that would cook evenly with the air circulation  either way its a thumbs up

i m an overthinker   i watched way too many videos and read way too many reviews before deciding on my cosori   i purchased an air fryer with the thought that circulating air is going to dry out meat and taking the fat out of fried foods is going to make them like cardboard   wrong   i was most concerned with vegetables which it does amazing on   crispy kale chips  awesome roasted broccoli and cauliflower  brussell sprouts etc   i finally tried meats and have not been disappointed   so far i have only tried tilapia and chicken breast and both were wonderful   looking forward to trying more the cosori is easy to use  very self explanatory but comes with a nice directions booklet as well as a good time chart for cooking the basics and a recipe book   it s super easy to clean at this point but i ve only had it a couple of weeks   the only problem i have at all is the plastic latch that moves to allow you to pull the basket out  on mine it takes some manipulation to push it forward   i think i probably have a faulty one but i ve learned to deal with it in spite of the plastic latch this air fryer is a great purchase   i wish i had gotten one a long time ago

i purchased this as my first air fryer and cannot compare it to any other brand   my family uses this almost daily and could not be happier   i love that we can just take any frozen food and put it directly into the fryer and within a few min the food comes out almost perfect   french fries and onion rings come out so crispy with no oil   chicken  steaks  and pork chops all come out better than i had made on the stove or in the oven this machine has paid for itself many times over   if you are looking for an air fryer  then i highly recommend that you give this a try

its been almost a couple months since i purchased this  i use it     times a week for cooking dinner or lunch  i use it to cook breaded okra  potato slices  papad  fryums  spicy raw banana andhra style etc  cleaning both the trays with soft brush and dish soap is not enough  it has the air vents which are hard to clean  presets are easy to work and straightforward to work  only thing missing is an option to place properly metal or wooden skewers or skew sticks so that we can air fry veggies or kebobs  a little pricey but i am hoping it lasts for many days with proper maintenance

i have been researching air fryers for   months and ended up buying this one  from unpacking  through setup  cooking instructions and cosori recipes  this air fryer has exceeded my expectations  the product is intuitive to use  the fryer is very well put together  the basket and cooking surface cleans up easily  the user manual is very well written  the recipe book even better  the cosori website has recipes and other useful information  i have become a cosori fan  if this is the end to end experience they build into their products  wonderfully surprised

we re using this thing at least five or six times a week  it is fantastic and is also good for reheating pizza slices if you re into that type of unhealthy food we do not use the smart feature so i don t know how useful it would be btw  i love pizza

i love airfryers  this is my second one  i gave my first one away as it was too small and i had to cook per person  i bought a bigger one so i could cook in one step  temp and times recommended are spot on so far  fish and meats comes out perfect as do roasted veggies and baked potatoes  so handy cooking appetizers when company comes  it s quiet and easy to use  i use foil or parchment paper liners to save on cleanup but the dishwasher does a great job

having an air fryer has been a life savor  i love this air fryer and it has made my life much easier  it was so convenient and easy to make meals while pregnant with this and now postpartum with a newborn  i love the different buttons you can push that have specific settings times for each thing  it also comes with a book full of recipes that i haven t used yet  but i m looking forward to making some of them soon

amazing air fryer  this has completely transformed my life and i am obsessed with it  i use it all the time and it really crisps up different foods and makes amazing food overall  comes with a super cool cookbook and i think everyone needs an air fryer in their kitchen  very simple and easy to use and set up and fits a good amount of food
this thing is garbage the door won t stay closed so i can never cook in it  with the virus coming around i never got it sent back but trust me it s a piece of crap don t waste your money on it

this is our second air fryer  the first is a bit easier to set the timer and temperature on  but this one has a larger interior and much easier to clean  was able to cook about   lbs of boneless turkey breast for thanksgiving in an hour  which was perfectly crisp on the outside and deliciously juicy on the inside we typically use it for tater and veggie tots  but we ve also made some delicious mini fruit pies and pot pies in this as well  it s also fairly quite compared to the our first air fryer  and doesn t leave such a strong lingering cooked oil smell

this product is fantastic kitchen appliance that i have already recommended to many people   you won t be disappointed cosori s customer service deserves a sixth star   i needed to contact them about a struggle i was having with one of the buttons   long story short  i was quickly fedex a replacement after they verified the problem great product and great shopping experience update  i can t emphasize enough how great their customer service is   they are a very customer friendly company and exercise good judgment in resolving problems

i am    years old and still cook from scratch  most of the time  never do frozen foods  fast food  and restaurant food once in a while  i bought this on a whim and am so happy that i did  i use it several times a week  i ve done chops  burgers  a beef roast and several vegetable dishes  i have never been  a person who baked despite my mom being a wonderful baker  i have now baked a variety of tarts and hand pies  despite ready made crusts or biscuits and canned pie filling  everything is delicious and quick  i did prepare my own blueberry filling with fresh blueberries  my next project will be pretzels i would recommend this to anyone of any age  i think this xl size is good even if you cook for one or two  this is a large machine and i thought it would be too heavy for my arthritic hands but it is light  the only problem would be storage space because it is large if you don t have the counter or cupboard space

i am    years old and still cook from scratch  most of the time  never do frozen foods  fast food  and restaurant food once in a while  i bought this on a whim and am so happy that i did  i use it several times a week  i ve done chops  burgers  a beef roast and several vegetable dishes  i have never been  a person who baked despite my mom being a wonderful baker  i have now baked a variety of tarts and hand pies  despite ready made crusts or biscuits and canned pie filling  everything is delicious and quick  i did prepare my own blueberry filling with fresh blueberries  my next project will be pretzels i would recommend this to anyone of any age  i think this xl size is good even if you cook for one or two  this is a large machine and i thought it would be too heavy for my arthritic hands but it is light  the only problem would be storage space because it is large if you don t have the counter or cupboard space

alright so i didn t really know too much about air fryers until recently  picked this up around christmas time and it s really a fantastic appliance to get low fat fried foods  we ve done home style fries  sweet potato fries  chicken wings  you name it  it all came out great and very tasty  it s nice not having to use oil and we know it s healthier  did a lot of research and this is the model you ll want for just sheer capacity alone  a lot of the other air fryers just don t have enough room in them  this one does  highly recommend

i don t normally write reviews but this one was review  worthy  this is a must buy  i have probably made chicken wings in this   times a week since i got it and they are the best wings ever  hands down  so far i have made  chicken wings  bacon  asparagus  salmon  chicken  grilled cheese and they all have turned out perfect every time  there is no learning curve and it comes with easy to follow directionsthe best part is it comes out of the box ready to use

love this machine especially for fries the cook book that comes with it is the best way for making the fries  i m still learning to adjust the times on different sizes and cuts of meats because the cook book is a little off on the times of how long to cook and i don t like rare meat but i m still experimenting  it s terribly easy to use and it is a whiz to clean up  i love it  it makes good grill cheese sandwiches too

let me say in a nutshell  without writing a lengthy  review it is simply the best i had used so far the price i paid for the cheap brand why i say cheap brand the teflon coating started peeling off within three months of usage   the residuefrom cooking chicken drumsticks etc was hard to remove by simple washing  in contrast this one is a breeze to clean  apart from this it evenly cooks the food of course  you have to turn it one time that is it  the timer for each variety of food is on the dot  previous one i had to increase the temperature and the minutes for the food to be cooked evenly  thank you cosori for the wonderfull product

this appliance has changed my life because i no longer have to clean the stovetop  convection traditional oven  or microwave convection oven  this does not fry  it is a convection oven  it is so easy to clean by hand but is also dishwasher safe   it is large enough for a family of four  it is easy to convert recipes by reducing the temperature and time  but the recipe book is terrific  it looks good on the countertop  i will never fry again  did i mention it is easy to clean

this was the first meal i made   cajun salmon and prosciutto wrapped asparagus  i really hate fish but my husband got this huge lake salmon and i thought it would be a good thing to try with the new air fryer   the asparagus was in the cookbook that came with it and the salmon recipe i found on allrecipes  cooked the asparagus first  which was a little fussy but it turned out perfect  i ve never cooked fish that wasn t breaded  deep fried and frozen  so the salmon was a challenge   i didn t know big fish have scales   lots of them  but i followed the simple recipe and had to cook it a little longer than it said  but after    minutes plus a   minute rest these very thick fillets were perfect  tender and juicy and didn t taste fishy  i made a sauce with homemade mayo and brava sauce  we just had to dig in  which is why i forgot to take any before eating photos  the meal was nearly done when i remembered to snap a quick pix my only complaint would be that the paper bound cookbook that came with it disintegrated the very first time i used it  pages    to    just fell out when i opened it

i ordered this back in march and it says it has wifi capabilities  i couldn t figure out how to use it from the vesync app but recently revisited it and realized that my air fryer doesn t even have the wifi icon to get wifi  i feel ripped off  i wish i realized it sooner

i only hand washed this never put it in the dishwasher   i used it regularly but not harshly   the photo looks like what would happen if someone were to slam it on the counter or something   i never did that of course   the handle suddenly fell off  the plastic broke  screw came off  etc     all i did was pick it up and the basket dropped off from the handle   thankfully it wasn t hot at the time and it didn t fall into anything else i will attempt to contact customer service and update this review depending on how they respond

the biggest problem that i have with this and maybe i am doing something wrong  is     i have trouble with the latch  the clear plastic thing a majig is difficult to push open with my thumb  it takes too long to open the drawer   anybody have this same trouble  everything else is good  still disappointed though that i couldn t get the white one  which was more expensive for some unknown reason i don t feel that i got a satisfactory answer on the pricing from the sellers no idea about the rating where it says  flavor   i don t know what that even means thanks angela

this was a most wonderul purchase  i got this on prime day and couldn t be happier  i like to cook and i already had an insta pot but was interested in an air fryer  this    air fryer is perfect  it is so simple to use and is a true sit and forget appliance that is super convenient for the cook  i have found the presets to be right on target but if i don t i can adjust  the food comes out tender  well done and flavorful    i look forward to many years of use

this thing is the bomb every i ve made gas turned out great  porkchops come out      cooked and not   second overcooked  whole chicken  no problem  if you get the spices right you can make a whole chicken juicier  tastier  and bigger than whatever rottiserie chicken at the grocery stores  cornish hens are the bomb and you don t even need to know how to bake  you just have to follow recipes the recipe book that comes with is a nice starter and you should try it  lots of good stuff there  however  you can find lots of easy recipes online too don t cheap out and get the smaller one  get the bigger one  even if you are only cooking for one  why  because if you want to make  say  more than one batch of steaks or a whole chicken the bigger one is going to be the best one super easy to clean  easy to use don t forget to preheat  all those reviews saying this doesn t work are due to not preheating if you are a single guy who struggles in the kitchen and want good home made meals that taste like you know what you are doing this is it  as long as you can read and follow instructions you ll be fine highly recommended

i love  love this machine  once sister got three of us sisters to get it based on how much she used it and loved it  when i want restaurant quality onion rings or french fries i make them in my air fryer  the quality is amazing  i love air frying beets  zucchini  cauliflower  broccoli  anything   this machine has gotten me loving vegetables ever so much more  one sister said anything from the freezer should be cooked with the snowflake preset  i have never had an issue when i ve used that  from all my fried appetizers to pierogis  egg rolls  dumplings  potato skins  i tell all my friends to buy this one now  highly recommend

our air fryer basket had broke so i figured it was time to get a new one  the one we had was great but an eye sore on the counter so i was constantly taking it out of the cabinet  while looking i decided why not get one that matches my kitchen so i could leave it out  this is beautiful  it s sleek has tons of options and i like that the basket doesn t lay flush on the bottom  i immediately tried it out and i was pleased with the cooking and the buttons were easy to use  dont hesitate to get this

love this air fryer  so easy to use and this is coming from a single dad with limited cooking experience  there are numerous pre sets for all types of food  i have cooked sweet potato fries  regular fries  bacon  hamburgers  fried chicken  chicken wings and roasted vegetables  all tasted amazing this system is self contained and really easy to clean  the only negative would be the size of the unit  it does take up quite a bit of space on the kitchen counter  it is worth it to me

purchased this product          it was great  easy to use  cooked evenly   i thought i hit the jackpot   i used it about     times a week  but then in december       the buttons were getting temperamental specifically the temp time button which is a big deal   i couldn t adjust the temperature or length of cook time   i had emailed cosori since the customer service was unavailable due to the pandemic   i did not receive a response   i called their customer service   finally got to talk to someone   since i m within the warranty timeframe  the issue is covered   i had to send pics of my order details  a video of it not working   the sticker on the bottom of the unit with the batch number   i m not sure if they ll send me a replacement  but i ll update my review with the outcome

i originally received a damaged product  but it was replaced within a week  i have had it less than a month  and am very happy with the results   i ve cooked wings  steaks  chicken  burgers  fries  veggies  salmon  etc  it is not too loud  but does make noise from the fan  i have not had any issues with excessive steam  as some other users experienced  the only thing i have noticed  is the cooking times are more of a suggestion  especially for things that may very greatly in size  a thick cut bone in steak is going to take at least double the time for the preset

this would be great if it wasn t poorly put together i have had it for about a month or so and the entire basket and drawer came apart  i am pending the seller to send a replacement lets see if they try to make it right they made it right  i guess the first basket was a fluke because this second one was very strong  great for the price and amazed by wonderful customer service

i was so reluctant about this purchase and i couldn t have been more mistaken  turned out to be one of the best purchases i ve made on here  now granted it s only been a week  but i haven t used my stove or oven since  it s so easy  and the food quality and flavor are better  i have much more options now  i ve made anything i couldn t trust myself to cook before lol  rack of lamb  lobster  salmon  even fried oreos  in absolutely no time  i love that i can operate it from my phone  and the shake the the reminder is awesome  the     qt is a perfect size  not too big  not too small   not to mention affordable

the fryer is easy to look at but the positives end there  couldn t get it to power on but after using different methods  tapping  pushing  holding  etc  using my thumb was the only way it turned on  took    minutes to set time and temp to boil a couple of eggs  however  fryer turned off after five minutes  needless to say i didn t get beyond the eggs  cannot understand how this cosori received such high ratings  maybe i got a dud but i m not willing to give it a second try  it was boxed up and sent back

i m a bit of a kitchen snob  i hate gadgets  i don t need an egginator or a peel o matic       i m happy with my knives  my skillet  my crock pot  my kitchenaid and a few basic things  the only reason i ordered this thing is because my adult son wanted one  and because it s one more thing i can add to my nerdy smart home that being sad  this thing is awesome      i had no idea how easy this could make life in the kitchen  we ve had it for two days and already we ve managed to air fry side dishes  veggies  snacks  wings  cherry pies  and the list goes on on and on  it s easy to use  very spacious  easy to clean  and everything we ve made has been fast and delicious from a smart home perspective  we re finding the app is more useful than the alexa connectivity  there may be more to it than i realize  but there s very little guidance as to what it will actually do with alexa  where the app is simple  clean  and easy i can t recommend this unit enough  if you re in the market for an air fryer  this is the one

i didn t open the box of the cosari air fryer for a few weeks because i was dreading trying to figure out how to use a new appliance  big regret  this air fryer is so easy to use   super easy to clean  i ve baked potatoes  cooked bacon and french fries  roasted turkey   everything has come out beyond my expectations  the other great aspect is that there is no hot oven air   i will be using this air fryer all summer long  i chose cosari because of the reviews about how easy it was to clean  also  it has a larger basket capacity  great price too

this air fryer gives off a bad plastic or electrical smell when used    two days after use  i am still trying to rid the house of this odor   i returned it for a refund because i did not want to take a chance trying another one

i love this air fryer  i mostly use it to make veggies or reheat leftovers  it s makes reheated pizza perfect  better than fresh actually  but for an xl it still doesn t hold a ton of stuff  that s just how air fryers are  best for     people  also a little annoying to hand wash and dry  but it s negligible  it s still my favorite fun kitchen gadget

virtually everything about this fryer is perfect  everything i have cooked in it has come out great  french fries  chicken tenders  bacon  toast  pizza  reheated pizza   was just like fresh cooked  baked red potatoes  etc  clean up is always a breeze  nothing is ever stuck to it  the only oil i use is spray olive oil from a pump pressure spray and usually very little the one and only thing that i was not impressed with is the recipe book  when i first opened the book the backing split and all the pages fell out  good thing i can get all the corsori recipes online

i can t believe i didn t know about air fryers and have one sooner   i love this machine   i have done pork chops  steak  bacon  breakfast sausage  frozen egg rolls  green beans  brussel sprouts and more   all turn our excellent   was really surprised with the steak  it was awesome and the pork chops come out tender  juicy and better than any i have ever had   use this almost every day   cleans up super easy and cooks things in less than half the time of a traditional convection oven   if you don t have this  you need it

this would have been been prefect if it lasted longer than   months  my unit randomly cuts off in the middle of usage

i became a pescatarian this year and i ve really missed fried chicken  so i needed a fish alternative  i m so happy i invested in this    i can fry a whole catfish no problem  and would you believe it tastes better than regular fried fish in oil  you can really taste the flavors of fish and shrimp in this thing  i highly recommend it i got the biggest size to accommodate a whole fish i lay it diagonal in the tray  cook it on one side for about       minutes then flip it over on the other same time on the default degree setting for fish

we love our air fryer so much we cook just about every dinner in it    we bought it at the beginning of quarantine and have used it daily since  when you cook your meat it is so juicy and crispy   quick   bacon crispy in   minutes    what     no splash no mess   it even impresses my very hard to please husband  he has even learned how to use it when he know my kitchen is closed  lol   the only issue we had is the screws started to come out of the basket and base area  we just kept screwing it back in until that no longer worked  the machine was still useable   so i called customer service and they were very helpful    they called me back in a timely manner and then we started to email back and forth and within a couple emails they quickly resolved our issues    they have us a full refund  you know what i m gonna do    buy the same air fryer    that way i can cook meat in one and side dishes in the other  side note my sister bought an air fryer different brand  and it is nothing like this cosori    hers smells like burnt plastic when she uses it and it was the same cost as this wonderful machine   go with cosori   they are the best   so is their customer service team

excellent although not as quiet as i had expected  i love it though and hopefully the nonstick surface doesn t peel off like my other one if a different brand  opening and closing also seems different or not smooth but maybe i m not doing it right  the food cooks exactly like the photo in the recipe book that it comes with and it s very tasty  the mongolian chicken wings are delicious  i highly recommend this airfryer

the unit was working really well until the part that holds the handle on the tray melted off  not sure why this piece was made from something that can melt  i am very disappointed and would advise that you order a more reliable product and manufacturer

i wasn t sure i d use this much  but after having it for a few weeks i m not sure how i managed to cook without it  i don t like to spend a lot of time cooking  so this has been a huge help  i ve made chicken wings and buffalo wings  fish  roasted brussels sprouts  homemade potato wedges and fries  even the kids admit that store bought fries and nuggets taste better when i make them in the air fryer  extremely time saving when i m hungry and don t want to spend a lot of time cooking   and cleanup is almost as simple as rinsing it out  light scrubbing and the nonstick surfaces are easily cleaned   i also prep a few days worth of meals  between this and my instant pot  my meal prep time has been drastically reduced

our first air fryer ever  this machine is extremely easy to use and understand  recipe book included has loads of really nice recipes  made my fried chicken today  pan fried some  just in case we did not like the way it cooked in the air fryer  we did not use their recipe  just mine  it was better than the pan fried  and used only   a teaspoon of oil     i reheated the leftovers for dinner in the air fryer  the chicken came out hot and just as crisp as if it were just made  we have also made salmon in it  perfection    excited  to keep trying new things with this wonderful machine

wow  what a difference from our last  big name  brand which conked out after    months i highly recommend using parchment squares which makes cleanup a breeze  what you re going to love is how quiet it is  the difference is significant the presets are helpful especially the preheat  don t put food into a cold air fryer  just as you wouldn t out food into a cold pan all in all i am thrilled with this air fryer

i ve only had it for a couple days so i ll update my review if i change my mind but so far my family loves it  i ve made pork chops  chicken wing  kids chicken nuggets  fries and quesadillas   they have all turned out great and i can t believe how crisp the outside of the food gets  it s so nice not to have to turn on the oven for small items like a  quesadilla

i normally do not buy countertop cooking tools  i m really glad i bought this one  i live alone and use it more than frequently  i use it to cook my proteins and i also use it to warm them up  i put leftover meats in and turn the cooker on to preheat  my leftovers come out hot and crispy unlike a microwave where they come out hot and gooshy  iot cleans easily  the only thing i don t like is that it is large and must stay on the countertop  even though i measured it was larger in life than i thought

i was a little hesitant to buy this style of air fryer  as i had a larger one previously that i loved  but i didn t have as much counter space at this new house  so wanted to try to find one that could still fit a decent amount of food in it  but that didn t need to be on the counter permanently and didn t take up as much room   well  this is perfect   we are really happy with it  it has a ton of pre set features for veggies  fish  meat  etc   and is super easy to clean   the recipe book that comes with it has some really good recipes and with just the two of us  the portions are ideal   i like the square basket shape and the size of the area for placing the food is great

my family absolutely love the cosori air fryer  we have used and owned various toaster ovens and convection ovens for years  but this cosori air fryer by far is our favorite  it is very easy to use  my    year old cambodian mom can use it with ease  we cook various things including chicken wings  nuggets  fish  ribs  frozen fries  fresh fries  tater tots  chicken thighs  roasted vegetables  toast  etc  we toss it in and that s it  the cleaning is also very easy except the side grills require a little more attention  highly recommend this

have had the air fryer for about   weeks and very impressed with the product   our family has used the appliance about    times and the meals snacks we cooked have been delicious   i  like others who have commented  was reluctant to purchase an air fryer  but i am pleasantly surprised with the ease of use and the taste of the food we ve cooked   for those looking for an air fryer  i would recommend this product due to the simplicity of the controls  the ease of use  and the simmpleness of cleanup

amazing product i ve been wanting an air fryer for a couple months now  and since going vegetarian this is the best kitchen gadget i have invested in  there are so many different things that i can use it for  so far i ve made tortilla chips  fries  sweet potato fries  roasted potatoes  and bread  i m obsessed  pros  super easy to clean bc of the nonstick surface  doesn t heat up the entire kitchen like an oven  amazing safety features   high tech  for only       looks nice on the counter  variety of uses  great recipe book included  awesome shake feature  fast cooking  pretty big basket cons  temperature doesn t go lower than     f  have to be more cautious as to not burn food  the smell from past foods sometimes remains in the fryer even after cleaning but it s not a bad smell  more like that grease smell that s always around fast food fryers  pretty loud button sounds and beeps  cant cook at midnight without waking the whole house up overall this is the best purchase i ve made for my kitchen and when shopping for new kitchen gadgets i will definitely come back to the brand first

we was really looking forward to our new air fryer  however the buzzer beeper on this item is the same noise and loudness as our smoke detectors which tend to send my german shepherd into major panic causing stress and detection to us and the house   discovered that you can remove the top by gently prying up around all the sides to gain access to the circuit card   the buzzer is labeled on the circuit card buz  in the attached picture   just disconnect the power cord and use needle nose plyers and twist it off the circuit card and it will come off   put the top back on and plug into the outlet and off she goes  air fryer without a buzzer or beeper    back in business  pictures attached with top  circuit card  and peizo removed   enjoy quietly without german shepherd attack

i really wanted to like this air fryer  but unfortunately the buttons on the fryer didn t work     of the time every once and a while i would finally get a button to work  i thought maybe it was a one off issue and tried it two more times but all three of the units i received had the same issue and only one of them was able to get connected to the app which allowed for it to be used but without the main buttons on the unit working i couldn t keep it

wasn t sure what to expect  had held off on buying an air fryer  because i didn t really understand them well  a friend s wife kept telling me that she uses it all the time and how great hers was  actually saw her use hers one weekend and thought time to do this  bought the cosori and love it  i thought what the heck  i ll make buffalo chicken wings  verdict  tastes just like the restaurant  again  i didn t understand how an air fyer worked  so i thought there was hot oil at bottom and air would circulate throughout  nope  not how it works  no oil  but i will tell you this  those wings tasted every bit like they were  fried   they were delicious  highly recommend

all i can say is   if you re a foodie  you need to have this in your kitchen    it s quick to learn the device  presets are built in   so press a button and your selected meat or other foods are done    and it is easy to clean  the tray basket pops out and any drippings are a breeze to remove from the nonstick surface   lastly  the cooking speed is fast and thorough  because the heat circulates around the food   the only thing you have to be ready for is the operating asdound of the device   it can be loud  but what do you expect from a unit having a strong fan to move that heat around   look  its versatile and sturdy   a rare thing in today s market of kitchen appliances  make the investment   you will not be sorry

i have to admit  when my husband ordered the air fryer i gave him a hard time about having another kitchen appliance on the counter   but we have enjoyed this air fryer immensely   we cook something in it almost every day  whether it s meat  fish  veggies  cheese curds   everything comes out delish and cooked perfectly   i would say my favorite are the roasted veggies   easy to use and clean up   just soak it in the sink for a while with some soap and warm water and it cleans right up

this new air fryer is a great addition to our kitchen s cooking tools   large capacity  very user friendly  beautiful red color  no finger prints  light weight  delicious results and not noticeable heat add to the cooking areas  amazing selection of presets to make it so easy to use with great results   after we got ours we bought another for a gift to our daughter s family   they rave about how everyone in the fast paced family gets fast hot cooked food home rather than eating fast junk food away from home

i waited so long to buy an air fryer because so many people would tell me oh i dont like it or they said so much was wrong  well i decided i loved the look of this one and i finally wanted to try it for myself  i am so glad that i did   i use my cosori everyday  i have made wings  cheese sticks  chicken breast  pork chops and so much more in it already and i have only had it maybe   weeks  the meat comes out so juicy  i cuts my cooking time in half almost with a family of   i am able to set down and enjoy dinner without having a huge clean up after as well  best choice i have made  oh and i tested my cosori with someones nuwave  just to see the difference  lets just say my cosori won

a year ago  i purchased the newest modal of cosori air fryer  without the wi fi feature  and immediately enjoyed using it   i am almost totally blind and so had bump buttons placed on the different settings on the front panel and thus made it easy to use   its larger square size basket is roomy and a good shape to hold a whole chicken or for laying out a row of veggies   its simplicity and quick cooking have made it more convenient and fun   i also should mention the company s excellent customer service   recently  the cosori air fryer stopped working   i contacted the company and was offered a refund but i wanted a replacement and they obliged   so  i got a replacement within a couple of days and happily am using it every day once more   they asked for the old one to be returned to inspect and that tells me that the company is a conscientious one

easy to operate  some recipes needed to be cooked few minutes longer than suggested by the recipe book  same goes for preprogrammed dishes  not a problem  though  once you experiment few times  lemon garlic chicken was  actually  better than i ever tasted  cooking times  for most dishes are pretty fast  so far could not get a good steak from it  could have been problem with the meat itself  i gave this unit as birthday present to friend of ours  and he was praising the steak he cooked in it

very nice product  worth the money i love the color  it is red and beautiful  i should have gotten more red cookware  it looks so pretty  also  it makes my frying process way way way easier  i don t need much oil  and it can taste just like tea fried recipes  also  the size is very good too  i use it for one to three people  and it portion is just perfect  love it

have had the af for about   weeks and love it   the design is attractive which is important since it will live on my countertop   the inside is easy to clean non stick   operation is intuitive   also appreciate the   year warranty offered to amazon customers   contacted cosori customer service with a question and received an email back within   hours   can t beat that   if i didn t already own an instant pot  i would buy the cosori pressure cooker based on their service alone

i am very disappointed in the quality and build of this airfryer  i ve had this product since christmas     months  and within that time  the plastic handle on the basket has cracked  with plastic breaking off in chunks and slivers along the back side of the handle  in addition  the basket often pops out during the cooking process  creating the need to put a heavy object in front of the door to keep it closed  based on reviews i have read  others have also experienced this issue  the cosori brand unfortunately seems to have some quality controls issues with the build of their pieces  once you figure out the best settings to use based on the food you are cooking  this airfryer makes tasty and juicy food  however the quality issues with the product overshadow the positives  based on the price point of this model in comparison to other airfryers on the market with good reviews  this product should quality should be higher and these issues should not be occurring

this device would be relatively easy to use   if the touch display worked  within a few minutes of setting it up  i found the touch control panel to be unusable and downloaded the  primitive  app the app does the bare minimum  it does not offer noteworthy customization or complex custom presets   it would not be difficult  from a software engineering perspective  to allow multiple temperature settings in one preset  so this is disappointing at best  the screws on the basket handle required frequent tightening starting after the first month of using this  the product isn t complete garbage  but it wasn t worth the money clean up is actually very easy with the device  and the cooking method works as advertised  but i would still rather have gone with a more reputable brand  like i usually do these days   it s most unfortunate because this would have been my favorite kitchen appliance  had they finished the job  another great idea ruined by shoddy craftsmanship and uninspired software development

there is not enough to say about the world of air frying  i have used this gem at least once a week  whereas most other cooking appliances are used once every couple of months  crockpot  pressure cooker  etc    that has earned a prime spot on my kitchen counter the recipe book that comes with this one is great  for those who like salmon  there is an excellent recipe for you as far as features  this fryer has all of the features that most others have on the market  the only annoying thing i ve noticed is i m still getting used to the button settings  if you do the wrong sequence  or press the power button like i do  then it will reset and you have to start over  for some reason my brain is trained to hit power instead of the play pause button all in all such a great investment for everyone s kitchen

this air fryer has inspired my    year old daughter to cook   what more can i ask for  aside from the fact that this air fryer cuts down cooking time tremendously  what i love most about the product is the cookbook  the recipes use ingredients that everyone should have in the pantry and they take little to no time to prepare  we have worked through half the book and most all of the recipes have been flavorful  we are in love with the air fryer  the cookbook  the clean up time is awesome and it has allowed for my family to bond more in the kitchen  its like the new toy that everyone wants to play with  it s totally awesome

love how it makes fried food taste like fried foodi lost two screws in the dishwasher and two others i m constantly having to tighten   not sure whythe buttons are hard to press and can be frustratingthe online app is amazing and my favorite feature   would by a different brand with wifi if i could do it again

wow  just wow  cooked vhicken breasts in    minutes  used recipe book  super crispy  i was expecting soggy   nope  surprised me i had to a double take  make entire house smell like subway  not super quiet  sounded like it was powering up to take off  but it is amazing  id buy again in heartbeat  ive only used twice so hopefully it lasts a long time  perfect for   people  i even just ordered the inner attachments as i love it so much

love this fryer  great size for a family of     basket is easy to clean  but now that i ve been using it for   months i ve learned it s important to clean the area of the fryer unit that s left open when you remove the basket   i never read any of that in the maintenance facts   so  be sure to clean that area of your fryer   i m working to get off some build up today only reason i didn t give a full   star rating is because sometimes the touch screen on the unit does not respond to my touch   when that happens  i just get on my phone and use the wifi feature to get my unit going   love the wifi feature  it even lets me know when my family is using the unit  when i m away from home

because there are only two of us at home  i purchased the smaller     quart cosori air fryer   i thought it would be easier to store   it is very easy to use and cleans up beautifully   we took it to our vacation home  and used it there   then decided we needed to buy the     quart one for home  and leave the     quart on at our vacation home   we cooked a whole chicken in the big one and decided it was better than any cooked chicken you buy at the store   we are glad we got the     quart one for home  even for the just two of us   and it is just as easy to store  and clean

i was in the market for months trying to find the best one  i ve used a couple of friends and had something specific in mind  wanted it big enough i didn t have to make multiple batches  went for the     quart and i m impressed  if i can t cook in it i really don t cook turkey burgers  chicken setting for    min  flip once  so nice didn t have to sit and wait at the hot stove and have juices splatter everywhere chicken breast  chicken setting for    min  flip once  so juicy and soft i cook a lot of my frozen veggies in here reheated a cheesesteak and it was soooo crunchy on the outside tbh better than when i first bought it my roommate made skinny taste bagels in here so perfectly  clean up is super easy just   things to clean really  i couldn t be happier  def recommend

this air fryer works great   anything i ve cooked in it has come out outstanding   any type of chicken i ve cooked has been amazing   chicken breasts are very tender and there s no need to cut into thin slices   thighs and drumsticks are better than a restaurant and the best part   no deep frying in oil   just a little dab of olive oil spray and that s all it takes for a great crunch   my salmon has come out delicious   it may take less time than it calls for in the cook book   i pretty much set my own temperatures and time limit   the only thing i can say that i disliked about it was it smelled a little like plastic for the first couple of uses but went away thereafter   i like the fact that it is pfoa free   bpa free and the size is perfect for my counter space   i ve seen some of the comments with a less rating but i have not had any issues with it   it has worked pretty good for me   i would recommend this product

this product has been amazing and a great addition to my kitchen  extremely easy to use and so nice to not to have to stand over a skillet while cooking   i just pop the food in there and do something else until it s done  clean up and easy and it comes with a recipe book  the customer service was amazing after i somehow lost the screws that attach the inside basket        recommend

i purchased this item because i lost my spouse and did not want to spend a lot of time preparing meals and cleaning up afterwards  the ease of use and time to prepare meals is easy and the clean up afterwards is great  i used to eat a lot of grilled foods on a vented cook top so the flavor is not quite the same  however the health benefits are great as i have lost weight from eliminating the fats  and butters  i am still experimenting with new items and times with good results  start at a known temp for an item and play with times  i start with short times and work up from there until i determine my desired level of being done  works great for frozen meats in case you forgot to take them out of the freezer

this air fryer is amazing  you don t even need oil to make something really crunchy  i love using this for making quesadillas   tip  if you make a quesadilla sandwich make sure you stick the top tortilla to the cheese and inside toppings  or else the tortilla will be sucked up to the top of the air fryer and it will burn

first   would not have purchased this product had i known more about it   seems to overcook items such as chicken wings and vegetables if you go by the presets or recommended settings  second  there isn t a feasible way to determine if raw items such as chicken or fish will be actually cooked through   in an oven  you can bake a chicken for       hours and you know it will be cooked through   also we tried to call  cosori company well into their posted hours and were advised the company was closed   we left a message and it took them a week to respond  also  the digital touch screen is very temperamental   touching directly  didn t really turn it on   i had to almost wave my finger gently across the blue light for it to respond   it took several attempts to turn the unit on

why did i wait so long to purchase an air fryer   don t hesitate a minute to purchase this   it is very easy to use and takes up only a small portion of my countertop   it has a large basket and can hold a large amount of food   i have used this to make fajitas  wings  sausage and peppers  pork chops  etc   it is great to use in the summer   it doesn t heat up the house like my oven does  it is very easy to clean as well   well worth the price

delivery and receipt of products are very punctual   after several weeks of continuous use  the product performs well   it feels so easy to use   i didn t know how to cook  but now i can make a lot of delicious dishes with this air fryer   and easy to clean   easy to use   highly recommended
